However , it does not last long . A few minutes of brisk walking brings [them]2497-them to [the clear space in midwood]2498-the clear space in midwood — the sandy spot railed round with palings where [[his]2365-the professor Majesty of [Saxony]154-saxony 's pigs]2499-his majesty of saxony 's pigs have [their]2499-his majesty of saxony 's pigs daily rations dealt out to [them]2499-his majesty of saxony 's pigs . There [the girls]2500-the girls sit down on the wooden bench provided for the accommodation of [admiring spectators]2501-admiring spectators . Many dark forms have already arrived , and are rooting and grubbing hither and thither . [They]2497-them have immensely long noses , long dark hair large dark ears ; hind - quarters that run away like hyænas , and a general air of absurdity and unpiglike pigness . Amongst [them]2497-them are [several fierce - looking old gentlemen with [their]2502-several fierce - looking old gentlemen with their ugly lips lifted over formidable tusks , shaggy as bears , and with their long grey hair wet and shiny , as if they had been rolling in some muddy place ugly lips lifted over formidable tusks , shaggy as bears , and with [their]2502-several fierce - looking old gentlemen with their ugly lips lifted over formidable tusks , shaggy as bears , and with their long grey hair wet and shiny , as if they had been rolling in some muddy place long grey hair wet and shiny , as if [they]2502-several fierce - looking old gentlemen with their ugly lips lifted over formidable tusks , shaggy as bears , and with their long grey hair wet and shiny , as if they had been rolling in some muddy place had been rolling in some muddy place]2502-several fierce - looking old gentlemen with their ugly lips lifted over formidable tusks , shaggy as bears , and with their long grey hair wet and shiny , as if they had been rolling in some muddy place . Every moment there is an arrival ; a fresh pig , [two fresh pigs emerging from the wood and trotting hastily , with ears anxiously erect]2503-two fresh pigs emerging from the wood and trotting hastily , with ears anxiously erect , to the rendezvous , afraid of having arrived too late . About [the whole family]2504-the whole family , when united , there is a general unamiability ; a spiteful biting and nipping at each other ; a squeaking and angrily grunting ; a wrathful pursuit and hasty flight . The little piglets , tawny - coloured and striped like tiny tigers , toddle sweetly about in [their]2497-them artless babyhood . Irresistibly attracted by the childlike graces of one of these latter , yet smaller , more striped , weirder than [its brethren]2505-its brethren , [Sarah]135-sarah has run after [it]548-it , and is now scampering in pursuit round [the arena]2506-the arena . [The Professor]2365-the professor , relieved at having found [a sandy spot]2508-a sandy spot , is standing , stork - like , at a little distance off , poised on one leg , and cautiously seeking for traces of moisture on the sole of the other boot . Once more [Rivers]143-rivers and [Belinda]134-belinda are alone . "[0-i] [I]0-i will be the death of [her]548-it ! " says [the boy]2509-the boy , with an angry smile , shaking [his]2509-the boy fist in the direction of the sportive [Sarah]135-sarah . But apparently [the latter]2394-the latter 's ears are nearly as long as those of the objects of [her]135-sarah chase . "[0-i] Whom will [you]0-i be the death of ? " [she]135-sarah cries , desisting suddenly . "[0-i] The mischief is in the pig ! [I]0-i can not catch it ; and [I]0-i am sure [I]0-i do not know what [I]0-i should have done with it if [I]0-i had . Well , " having by this time come up to [them]2511-them again , "[0-i] of whom will [you]0-i be the death ? " "[0-i] Of [you]0-i , " replies [the young fellow]2512-the young fellow stoutly , though in [his]2512-the young fellow heart [he]2512-the young fellow is a little scared at the unexpected distance to which [his]2512-the young fellow threat has carried . "[0-i] Yes , of [you]0-i , " looking full at [her]0-i with [his]2512-the young fellow straightforward , handsome , angry eyes ; "[0-i] at least , if [I]0-i am not the death of [you]0-i , as [I]0-i should like to be , [I]0-i will be even with [you]0-i some fine day — see if [I]0-i am not ! " [She]0-i looks back at [him]2512-the young fellow , coolly pondering , but does not answer . A flash of almost compassionate astonishment is darting across [her]0-i mind that [any man in the possession of sight , health , and vigour]2513-any man in the possession of sight , health , and vigour — [any man , more especially at the most inflammable of all ages]2514-any man , more especially at the most inflammable of all ages , can look at [her]0-i with the unsimulated indifference , slightly coloured with dislike , that this [Rivers]143-rivers is doing ! At once [he]2512-the young fellow rises in [her]0-i esteem . Turning away , [she]0-i walks thoughtfully back to [the pigs]2515-the pigs . By - and - by , as through the long , light evening [the girls]2500-the girls bowl smoothly homewards , before the shy white stars look out , [Sarah]135-sarah suddenly breaks the silence that , for several quiet miles , has lain upon both . "[134-belinda] [Belinda]134-belinda ! " [she]0-i says abruptly ; "[134-belinda] by all laws , human and divine , that bouquet was [yours]0-i ! The gardenias are now the colour of old leather , and smell rather nastily than otherwise ; but , such as they are , they are yours ! " And even on these terms , poor [Belinda]134-belinda is glad and thankful to have [her]134-belinda nosegay again ! Upon [the fair town of]2517-the fair town of [Dresden]2-dresden a new morning has opened — opened in sunshine , joy , and lusty growth . For one blossom - bunch that swung fragilely on the pear - tree yesterday , there are twenty to - day . The slow small leaves are beginning to break less timorously from their outgrown sheaths . [I]0-i do not suppose that [Belinda]134-belinda can have grown in the night ; but about [her]134-belinda , too , this morning there is a look of expansion and spring : as if [she]134-belinda also were uncurling [her]134-belinda leaves and disclosing [her]134-belinda shy buds to [her]134-belinda sun . [The two girls]2379-the two girls are sitting together in [the pretty be - hyacinthed , be - china'd , Anglicised salon that looks to [the street]458-the street]2519-the pretty be - hyacinthed , be - china'd , anglicised salon that looks to the street . The morning sun does not shine on that side of [the house]2521-the house , and it makes [the room]422-the room dark ; but so it is , that all the blinds are drawn to the bottom ; nor does either , as would seem natural , make any attempt to pull [them]2379-the two girls up again . "[0-i] So [you]0-i never did it after all yesterday ? " [Belinda]134-belinda is saying in a tone of disapproving surprise . [Sarah]135-sarah shakes [her]135-sarah head . "[0-i] No ; [Love]137-love 's chain still binds [us]549-us ! " [she]135-sarah answers , making a face . "[0-i] [You]0-i will do it to - day ? " "[0-i] No ! " "[0-i] To - morrow ? " "[0-i] [I]0-i think not . " "[0-i] The day after ? " "[0-i] It is improbable . " "[0-i] If [you]0-i are waiting , " says [Belinda]134-belinda , stopping in mid - row of the stocking [she]134-belinda is knitting to look severely at [[her]134-belinda sister]2366-her sister , and speaking with an extremely clear and decided accent , "[0-i] for [me]0-i to do it for [you]0-i , [you]0-i will wait , as [I]0-i told [you]0-i yesterday , a very long time . " "[0-i] [I]0-i am aware of it , " replies [Sarah]135-sarah calmly . "[0-i] Since [I]0-i realised that [you]0-i are engaged in a little pursuit of [your]0-i own , [I]0-i have abandoned the idea . " "[0-i] Pursuit ! " cries [Belinda]134-belinda , with a shocked start , and crimsoning . "[0-i] [You]0-i are [the first person who ever dared to say that [I]0-i pursued [anyone]494-anyone]550-the first person who ever dared to say that i pursued anyone ! " "[550-the first person who ever dared to say that i pursued anyone] [You]0-i would have been much pleasanter if [you]0-i had , " rejoins [Sarah]135-sarah coolly . "[0-i] Well , do not let [us]552-us quarrel over a word ! [I]0-i did not say what part [you]0-i took in the pursuit — whether [you]0-i were [the hunter]553-the hunter or the hare ! " But [Belinda]134-belinda has stooped [her]134-belinda angry , blonde head over [her]134-belinda stocking , and is speechlessly knitting [her]134-belinda resentment into it . "[0-i] After all , " says [Sarah]135-sarah , discourteously jerking the slumbering pug off the sofa , and throwing [herself]0-i down on it , "[0-i] it is very unselfish of [me]0-i . [Nobody]2422-nobody gives [me]0-i the credit for any virtues , but in point of fact it is almost entirely in [your]0-i interest that [I]0-i am acting ! " [She]0-i pauses for a moment , expecting to be asked for an explanation , but [Belinda]134-belinda deigns no syllable . "[0-i] Supposing that [I]0-i did give [my]0-i Solomon the sack — by - the - bye , what a neat alliteration ! [Swinburne]155-swinburne might have made it , " continues [Sarah]135-sarah , yawning—"what[155-swinburne] would become of [me]0-i during all those rural excursions that [I]0-i see stretching ahead of [us]555-we in long perspective ? [We]555-we could not let [you]0-i and [young Rivers]143-rivers set off upon [them]556-them tête - à - tête ! [we]555-we really could not ! It would pass even [Granny]156-granny 's and [my]0-i latitude ! [I]0-i search the horizon in vain for a sail ! — [I]0-i mean for [anyone else to pair off with]557-anyone else to pair off with ! [My]0-i life would be spent in trying to look the other way , and in intercepting fond glances that were not meant for [me]0-i ! " "[143-rivers] And so , " says [Belinda]134-belinda , lifting [a head whose cheeks still blaze , and speaking in a withering voice]2524-a head whose cheeks still blaze , and speaking in a withering voice , "[558-he] and so [he]558-he is to wriggle on the hook a little longer ? How much longer , pray ? " "[558-he] How much longer ? " repeats [Sarah]135-sarah , with a malicious look ; "[558-he] why , [you]0-i can answer that better than [I]0-i ! As long as [young Rivers]143-rivers wriggles on [yours]0-i ! " [Belinda]134-belinda winces . Who — high - strung and palpitating in [young love]2525-young love 's first ecstasy — would not wince at such a phrase ? "[143-rivers] Come , now , " says [Sarah]135-sarah , sliding off the sofa again , assuming [her]0-i cajoling voice , and sitting down on the parquet at [[her]0-i sister]2366-her sister 's feet , "[143-rivers] tell [me]0-i a little about [him]558-he ! [I]0-i have confided to [you]0-i so many touching traits about [[my]0-i beloved]559-my beloved , and if [you]0-i are good [I]0-i will tell [you]0-i plenty more ; but confidence should be reciprocal : what is [he]558-he doing here ? Why has [he]558-he come to [Dresden]2-dresden ? " "[558-he] [He]558-he is learning German , " replies [Belinda]134-belinda reluctantly . "[558-he] H'm ! [I]0-i wonder how much [he]558-he has learnt ? " with a dry laugh . [Belinda]134-belinda 's sole response to this pleasantry is to push [her]134-belinda chair back very decidedly , and isolate [[her]134-belinda sister]2366-her sister on the floor . "[0-i] What does [he]558-he do when [he]558-he is at [home]2345-home ? " continues [Sarah]135-sarah , taking no notice of this evidence of displeasure , and obstinately pursuing [her]135-sarah catechism . "[558-he] [He]558-he has just left [Oxbridge]5-oxbridge , " rather sulkily . "[558-he] Where , no doubt , [he]558-he took several Double Firsts ! " with an ironical smile . "[558-he] [He]558-he rowed stroke in [the University Eight]561-the university eight last year , " very precipitately , and reddening under [this fleer]2528-this fleer . "[558-he] Is [he]558-he [[his]558-he own father]562-his own father , or has [he]558-he [a father]563-a father ? " "[558-he] [He]558-he has [a father]563-a father . " "[563-a father] And what is [the father]565-the father — what does [the father]565-the father do ? " "[0-i] [I]0-i believe — [he]558-he is in business , " grudgingly . "[558-he] In business ? " with raised eyebrows , and an accent of surprise and dissatisfaction . "[558-he] Well , " more cheerfully , "[558-he] there is business and business ! Have [you]567-his any idea what sort of business it is ? " "[567-his] Not the slightest , " very curtly . "[567-his] It is a liberal age , " says [Sarah]135-sarah philosophically , "[373-one] but [one]373-one must draw the line somewhere . [I]0-i draw the line at artificial manure ! Come , now , have [you]567-his any reason for supposing that it is artificial manure ? " [Belinda]134-belinda laughs a little , but most unwillingly . "[567-his] [I]0-i dare say it is . [I]0-i never asked . " "[0-i] Do [you]567-his remember , " says [Sarah]135-sarah , "[567-his] [the little Frenchman , covered with orders — Legions of Honour]569-the little frenchman , covered with orders — legions of honour and [Saint Esprits by the gross]570-saint esprits by the gross — that [we]571-we met at the ball at [Cannes]24-cannes , who told [me]0-i that [he]558-he was ' dans [le commerce]572-le commerce , ' and when [I]0-i inquired what branch , and suggested that perhaps [he]558-he was ' dans les vins ? ' answered grandiosely , ' Non , mademoiselle ; le suis dans les bougies ! ' " A pause . [The pug]2529-the pug has arisen from the cold par quet , and , with [her]2529-the pug tail still half - mast high in the enervation of slumber , has stepped delicately on to [Sarah]135-sarah , and cast [herself]2529-the pug with a deep , slow sigh upon [her]2529-the pug warm lap . "[567-his] [[Your]567-his friend]573-your friend does not look as if [he]573-your friend were ' dans les bougies , ' " says [Sarah]135-sarah presently , with an air of thoughtful generosity ; "[573-your friend] still less dans le — [I]0-i declare [I]0-i do not know what is the French for artificial manure ! How [Granny]156-granny has neglected [our]571-we educations ! " But [Belinda]134-belinda is not attending . [Belinda]134-belinda 's head is raised , and upon [her]134-belinda face has come a look of blissful listening . [Her]134-belinda fine ear has detected a footfall in the anteroom outside — a footfall that not even [Slutty]157-slutty , [the pug]2529-the pug , has yet suspected ; a step that [she]134-belinda has discriminated from that of the flat foot [Gustel]158-gustel . "[567-his] It is [you]567-his , is it ? " says [Sarah]135-sarah , in a not particularly exhilarated voice , scrambling to [her]135-sarah feet as [Rivers]143-rivers , ushered in by [an infant English page who divides the cares of the ménage]2531-an infant english page who divides the cares of the ménage with [Gustel]158-gustel , enters . [She]135-sarah gives [him]567-his two contemptuous fingers . Of what use to give more to [a man who holds them as if they were a bundle of sticks]2532-a man who holds them as if they were a bundle of sticks . [She]135-sarah might have given [him]567-his ten , or twenty , or none , for all [he]567-his knows . [His]567-his eyes have strayed away over [her]135-sarah , to [him]567-his , totally irrelevant head , and have fastened on [[his]567-his mistress]2533-his mistress , asking eagerly if this can indeed be [she]135-sarah , alive and real , whom all night long [he]567-his has pursued through [his]567-his radiant dreams . "[567-his] Perhaps [you]567-his can help [us]574-us , " says [Sarah]135-sarah , with an innocent look . "[567-his] [We]574-us have just been wondering what the French for artificial manure is ? " [He]567-his does not hear . [Belinda]134-belinda 's hand in [his]567-his is making summer in [his]567-his veins , and [his]567-his happy eyes are drowned in [hers]134-belinda as happy . But [Belinda]134-belinda hears . "[135-sarah] [Sarah]135-sarah is speaking to [you]567-his ! " [she]0-i says , low and hurriedly . [He]567-his turns round reluctantly with a start . "[135-sarah] [I]0-i beg [your]567-his pardon ! [I]0-i — [I]0-i — did not quite catch what [you]567-his were saying . " "[0-i] [I]0-i was only asking [you]567-his if [you]567-his knew the French for artificial manure ? " [she]0-i answers demurely . "[567-his] For artificial manure ! " repeats [he]567-his , astounded . "[567-his] Of course [I]0-i do not ! Why should [I]0-i ? Why do [you]567-his want to know what is the French for artificial manure ? Is it a riddle ? " Even for [his]567-his explanation [he]567-his has turned again to [Belinda]134-belinda , as inevitably as the sunflower to the sun . "[575-we] [We]575-we were only talking of — of — agriculture ; were not [we]575-we , [Belinda]134-belinda ? " replies [the other]2396-the other , smiling malevolently at [[her]2396-the other sister]2366-her sister 's obvious , and to [Rivers]143-rivers incomprehensible , discomfiture . That [his]567-his Egeria could look foolish , as [she]0-i is indisputably doing , would never , indeed , occur to [him]567-his ; but nothing short of total blindness could prevent [his]567-his seeing the sudden cascade of scarlet which has poured over [her]134-belinda . For one instant , indeed , the blest idea has darted across [his]567-his mind that this lovely flag may be hung out for [him]567-his ; but [his]567-his humility — for real love is ever most humble — at once dismisses the scarcely formed thought as too good to be true . Perhaps it is [his]567-his scrutiny , silent and intense , that embarrasses [her]134-belinda . Of course [he]567-his ought to say something . On a morning visit one must say something . "[134-belinda] Why are [you]134-belinda sitting in the dark ? " [he]567-his asks , glancing at the carefully drawn - down blinds . [I]0-i like [Moritzburg]8-moritzburg . " This is all that [she]134-belinda has to say about the hours that had made [him]143-rivers sick with desire in anticipation , stammering with bliss in fruition , drunk with joy in retrospect ! " "[610-his] Wrong ! grossly wrong ! " But [Rivers]143-rivers , in an ecstasy of pleasure at [his]610-his love 's intuition , is crying out : "[173-goliath] How did [you]0-i know ? How did [you]0-i find out ? [I]0-i never told [you]0-i ! " "[0-i] Was not it a good guess ? " [she]135-sarah says with a demure smile . "[0-i] No ; it was not a guess ! " [She]135-sarah blushes faintly as a China rose at this admission of how [her]135-sarah thoughts and eyes had stolen away from praise and supplication to spell out [his]610-his name . " "[143-rivers] It is a family name among [us]612-us , " [he]610-his adds in explanation ; "[143-rivers] among [[[my]0-i mother]614-my mother 's people]615-my mother 's people , that is . " There is a moment 's silence . For the first and only time in [her]135-sarah life [Sarah]135-sarah wishes for [Miss Watson]147-miss watson back again , to ascertain , as [she]135-sarah undoubtedly would by direct inquiry , who and what [[his]610-his mother]2549-his mother 's people are . But as [she]135-sarah [herself]135-sarah does not feel quite equal to the task , the fact remains wrapped in as much mystery as does the nature of [[his]610-his father]2550-his father 's commercial operations . "[143-rivers] Well , [I]0-i suppose , " says [the young man]504-the young man , sighing heavily , and gently and reluctantly setting down [Slutty]157-slutty ( [Slutty]157-slutty loves [him]504-the young man ; [he]504-the young man has mastered the exact spot in [her]157-slutty back which demands delicate and perennial scratching . [She]135-sarah has forsaken [Sarah]135-sarah to jump up on [his]504-the young man lap , though [she]135-sarah has in general but a poor opinion of [men]2377-men 's laps , as cold and hollow pretences)—"I[0-i] suppose [I]0-i must be going . [I]0-i am afraid that [you]616-you have already had too much of [me]0-i ! " [He]504-the young man pauses , with a wistful look towards [Belinda]134-belinda 's bent and shining head , but [neither girl]2553-neither girl contradicts [him]504-the young man : the one because [she]135-sarah so cordially agrees with [him]504-the young man ; the other because [she]135-sarah so passionately dissents . [He]504-the young man moves unwillingly to the door , but there halts again . "[616-you] And — and [Wesenstein]15-wesenstein ? " [he]504-the young man says desperately . "[15-wesenstein] What about it ? " cries [Sarah]135-sarah peevishly . "[15-wesenstein] Did not [you]0-i hear [us]617-we calling all [[our]617-we gods]618-our gods to witness to [Miss Watson]147-miss watson that [we]617-we were so broken with fatigue since [Moritzburg]8-moritzburg that [we]617-we could scarcely lift a finger ? " "[0-i] [I]0-i heard [you]0-i , " [he]504-the young man answers bluntly , laying a significant stress upon the pronoun . "[0-i] Now [I]0-i warn [you]0-i , " says [she]0-i , holding up [her]0-i forefinger threateningly at [him]504-the young man , "[0-i] that if [you]0-i mention [Wesenstein]15-wesenstein again , [I]0-i shall stop [my]0-i ears . " "[0-i] There are [other places besides [Wesenstein]15-wesenstein]619-other places besides wesenstein , " returns [he]504-the young man pertinaciously ; something about [Belinda]134-belinda — not anything [she]134-belinda has said certainly , for [she]134-belinda has said nothing — but possibly the unnatural fury with which [she]134-belinda is knitting , encouraging [him]504-the young man to persevere . "[15-wesenstein] Of course ! " very snappishly ; ' [Tharandt]160-tharandt ! ' "[15-wesenstein] No , not [Tharandt]160-tharandt ; there are [other places beside [Tharandt]160-tharandt]620-other places beside tharandt . [Loch Mühle]29-loch mühle , for instance ; have [you]0-i ever seen [Loch Mühle]29-loch mühle ? " "[0-i] Never ! " very crossly ; "[0-i] and [I]0-i humbly hope that [I]0-i never shall . Why should [we]621-we go anywhere ? " pursues [she]134-belinda , burying , [her]134-belinda ill - humoured face in the sofa - cushion . "[0-i] Leave [me]0-i , leave [me]0-i to repose . [I]0-i have not the faintest wish to go anywhere . " "[0-i] And [you]0-i never do anything but what [you]0-i wish [yourself]0-i ? " asks [Rivers]143-rivers snubbingly , eyeing with extreme disfavour [her]134-belinda petulant prettiness . To [him]143-rivers [she]134-belinda does not appear in the least pretty . "[0-i] Never , if [I]0-i can help it ! " replies [she]134-belinda , raising [her]134-belinda head , surprised and languidly titillated by [his]143-rivers tone , which is not what [she]134-belinda had expected in [him]143-rivers . "[0-i] Do [you]0-i ? " [He]143-rivers laughs drily . "[0-i] Never , if [I]0-i can help it ; but in [a large family]622-a large family one can not help it . " "[622-a large family] In [a large family]622-a large family , " repeats [she]134-belinda . "[622-a large family] [You]0-i are [one of [a large family]622-a large family]624-one of a large family ? " "[622-a large family] It depends upon what [you]0-i call large ; there are [six of [us]627-us]626-six of us . " "[626-six of us] Five too many , " rejoins [she]134-belinda promptly . "[626-six of us] And where do [you]0-i come — third — fourth ? " "[0-i] [I]0-i come first . " "[0-i] Are [you]0-i taking a leaf out of [Miss Watson]147-miss watson 's book ? " asks [Belinda]134-belinda severely , joining in the dialogue for the first time . "[0-i] [I]0-i think [I]0-i am , " replies [the other]2396-the other composedly . "[0-i] Well , then , [we]628-we will make a bargain : [I]0-i will ask [you]0-i no more questions if [you]0-i will promise to invite [me]0-i to go no more expeditions ; there ! " So saying , [she]134-belinda re - buries [her]134-belinda head in the pillows ; and as [she]134-belinda totally declines to raise it again , and as neither does [Belinda]134-belinda add another syllable , [he]162-rivers is at length obliged to withdraw defeated . For a moment after [he]162-rivers has disappeared , [Belinda]134-belinda still knits violently , [her]134-belinda forehead puckered , a warm pink wave ebbing and flowing in [her]134-belinda cheeks , and a sharp brush between love and pride going on in [her]134-belinda heart . For the first time in [her]134-belinda life pride goes to the wall . [She]134-belinda tosses down [her]134-belinda stocking and springs to the door . "[162-rivers] [Mr. Rivers]162-rivers ! " [she]134-belinda calls tremblingly ; "[162-rivers] [Mr. Rivers]162-rivers ! " [He]162-rivers must have walked very slowly , for [he]162-rivers has only just reached the double doors of egress . "[162-rivers] Yes , " [he]162-rivers answers pantingly ; "[162-rivers] yes ? " "[162-rivers] It is nothing , " [she]134-belinda says , faltering into deep shyness again , and quivering under the fervid expectancy of [his]162-rivers look . "[0-i] [I]0-i only wanted to tell [you]162-rivers that — that it is not [my]0-i fault ; that , for [my]0-i part , [I]0-i should have liked to go to [Loch Mühle]29-loch mühle . " "[162-rivers] Then why in [Heaven]153-heaven 's name could not [you]162-rivers say so sooner ? " asks [Sarah]135-sarah , whose long ears have again served [her]134-belinda faithfully , pouncing out upon them . "[162-rivers] [I]0-i am sorry that [his]162-rivers name is [David]143-rivers , " [she]134-belinda says reflectively , a little later , when [he]162-rivers has gone , jubilant now , to arrange the excursion . "[143-rivers] [I]0-i am afraid it looks ill ; [the poor people]629-the poor people are so fond of Scripture names . " A high sun , hot and benign ; a west wind , sweet with last night 's rain ; myriads and myriads of blossomed fruit - trees ; villages that seem built of and buried in snow ; enormous bunches of pear - blossoms , that look as if the boughs must break under [their]2555-their weight ; the ways all white with arches of cherry - bloom ; the horses trotting over a carpet of strewn cherry- petals , as at some high wedding pomp ; and a seat opposite [Belinda]134-belinda , who has allowed [him]162-rivers to open [her]134-belinda parasol for [her]134-belinda . Is it any wonder that [Rivers]143-rivers has forgotten that it is near three o'clock , and that , at an hour at which [most people]2556-most people are full , [he]162-rivers and [[his]162-rivers company]2557-his company are still fasting ? But [they]2556-most people have not forgotten . For the last mile and a half [he]162-rivers has been pelted by an ever sharper shower of anxious and peevish questions as to whether [the Kutscher]145-kutscher knows [the road]392-the road ; as to whether [they]2556-most people have still a mile , two miles , half a mile to go ; as to whether [he]162-rivers is sure that there is [a Gasthof]2559-a gasthof ; as to whether , lastly and desperately this , [he]162-rivers is certain that there is such a place as [Lohmen]30-lohmen ( it is at [Lohmen]30-lohmen that [they]2556-most people are to lunch ) at all . "[0-i] [I]0-i suppose , " says [the Professor]2365-the professor finally , putting on [his]2365-the professor spectacles in order to look full and murderously at [him]162-rivers through them ( [he]2365-the professor does not often look at [undergraduates]2561-undergraduates , [he]2365-the professor dislikes [them]2561-undergraduates too much ) , "[0-i] [I]0-i suppose that [you]630-you are aware that the whole responsibility of the excursion rests with [you]630-you ? " "[0-i] Yes , [I]0-i am aware , " replies [Rivers]143-rivers in - attentively and dreamily . [She]0-i has just deigned to accept a little switch from [him]162-rivers — a flowered cherry - bough , blossomed to the end of each brown twig — and is daintily waving away the audacious summer flies with it . [The Professor]2365-the professor has five distinct good reasons for being cross , and for [most people]2556-most people one suffices . Firstly , [he]2365-the professor did not want to come at all ; secondly , [he]2365-the professor has the threatenings of a snuffly cold , contracted in the long Moritzburg grass and among the Moritzburg pigs , and probably to be sensibly worsened by the present pleasure trip ; thirdly , [he]2365-the professor hates sitting with [his]2365-the professor back to the horses — a thing which [his]2365-the professor votaries indeed seldom suffer [him]2365-the professor to do — but in this case there has been no suggestion of offering [him]2365-the professor a front seat ; fourthly , [his]2365-the professor digestion has been for so many years [[his]2365-the professor master]2564-his master , that it now allows [him]2365-the professor with impunity no least derangement of [his]2365-the professor meal- times ; fifthly and lastly , [Sarah]135-sarah has three times flagrantly pretended not to hear [him]162-rivers when [he]162-rivers addressed [her]135-sarah , and has once crabbedly asked [him]162-rivers to let [her]135-sarah have a little more room . For [Sarah]135-sarah is , if possible , still crosser than [he]162-rivers . The low , trivial words that the sweet wind carries not to [her]135-sarah , but alongside of [her]135-sarah ; the ardent iron - grey eyes that [she]135-sarah is always accidentally meeting , and that instantly lose [their]631-they ardour the moment [they]631-they encounter [hers]135-sarah ; the dust , for , despite last night 's rain , there is dust ; the sense of physical emptiness , that no tickled vanity , no warmed passions redeem , have wrought [her]135-sarah by the time [they]631-they at length alight at the door of a simple but not untempting - looking Gasthof to such a pitch of ill - humour as makes [[her]135-sarah betrothed]2378-her betrothed 's mild fractiousness pale beside it . "[0-i] How cross [they]631-they are ! " says [Rivers]143-rivers , having for the first time realised this long sufficiently patent fact , and looking after [them]631-they with sunny wonder , as [the Professor]2365-the professor hastens into [the inn]2567-the inn to order luncheon , eagerly followed by [Sarah]135-sarah . "[631-they] And how greedy ! " adds [Belinda]134-belinda . And having thus calmly characterised [[their]631-they companions]2568-their companions ' vices , [they]631-they stray away together down [the little garden path]2569-the little garden path , where [the bloody warriors]2570-the bloody warriors and the cat - faced pansies merrily grow in the sandy border , and forget [them]631-they . [They]631-they have not , however , been long left to watch the happy butterflies hover , and the young flowers blow , before a captious voice overtakes and recalls them . "[0-i] [I]0-i thought , " cries [the Professor]2365-the professor from the open Gasthof door , and in a voice whose exasperation is sensibly sharpened even since it was last heard in querulous inquiry five minutes ago—"I[162-rivers] thought , [Mr. Rivers]162-rivers , that [you]162-rivers gave [us]632-us to understand that there was [a good hotel to be found here]633-a good hotel to be found here ? " "[162-rivers] And is not there ? " answers [the young man]504-the young man absently . [He]504-the young man has just thieved a sweetbriar spray , young and vernal , and is making it fit for [[his]504-the young man love]2573-his love 's tender hand by carefully nipping off all its thorns . "[0-i] [I]0-i think , " pursues the voice , "[0-i] that [an inn]634-an inn can hardly be qualified as good when there is not a single vegetable to be procured — not even a potato ! " "[0-i] Of course it can not , " replies [Rivers]162-rivers serenely . "[0-i] Look ! " pointing joyously out to [[his]162-rivers companion]2574-his companion a poised butterfly opening and shutting its freaky wings on a dark pansy face ; "[635-he] does not [he]635-he look jolly ? [He]635-he is the first tortoiseshell [I]0-i have seen this spring . " "[635-he] And where , " continues [the voice]2575-the voice , in an intenser key of resentment , "[635-he] there is absolutely nothing of any kind to be obtained except veal . " "[635-he] Except veal ! " repeats [Rivers]162-rivers , rousing [himself]162-rivers with an effort into a simulation of interest ; "[162-rivers] [you]162-rivers do not say so ! Well , but , " lapsing into unavoidable radiance again , "[635-he] does it matter much ? German veal is always so good . [I]0-i hope , " looking sunnily round , "[0-i] that [no one]365-no one dislikes veal ! " There is a sulky silence , broken only by [Belinda]134-belinda 's murmuring that [she]134-belinda loves it , and by [the Professor]2365-the professor 's remarking that all white meats are more or less indigestible . Whether [they]2577-they like it or not , however , further inquiry only serves to confirm the fact that [they]2577-they must either resign [themselves]2577-they to a luncheon of kalbfleisch and bread ( calf - flesh being the one universally procurable flesh in [Germany]18-germany ) or not lunch at all . Nor , when this is settled , does the calf - flesh seem in any hurry to appear . By - and - by , indeed , [a leisurely Blowsabella of [a serving - maid]2579-a serving - maid]2578-a leisurely blowsabella of a serving - maid lays a coarse clean cloth and some knives and forks in what [she]2579-a serving - maid calls the bavillon , [a homely arbour at the garden end]2580-a homely arbour at the garden end ; and thither [the Professor]2365-the professor at once repairs , and seating [himself]2365-the professor at [his]2365-the professor place before the empty table , lays [his]2365-the professor watch before [him]2365-the professor , and seems to derive a bitter solace from counting the numerous moments as [they]2577-they pass , and announcing [them]2577-they by five at a time aloud to [Rivers]162-rivers . But [Rivers]162-rivers does not hear . "[638-they] Do not let [us]637-us go near [them]638-they , " [he]2365-the professor says in a cajoling , low voice to [Belinda]134-belinda , wiling [her]134-belinda away again into the sun and the flowers ; "[638-they] in [their]638-they present frame of mind it is not safe . " "[638-they] Well , [you]639-you know it is not the first of [April]174-april , and [you]639-you have made fools of [us]637-us ! " [she]134-belinda answers , a little drily . "[639-you] Are [you]639-you starving ? " [he]2365-the professor cries , roused into sudden , tardy compunction . [The Professor]2365-the professor 's and [Sarah]135-sarah 's pangs had left [him]2365-the professor cold as a stone , merciless as [Herod]175-herod . "[639-you] Famished ! " replies [she]134-belinda ; but [she]134-belinda says it with such a charming smile of absolute well - being , making mirthful [her]134-belinda grave lips , that [his]2365-the professor misgivings fly . For all [they]638-they care , the kalbfleisch may be an hour , two hours , three in coming ! It has been smoking for a couple of minutes , indeed , on the table , and [the Professor]2365-the professor and [Sarah]135-sarah have been seen greedily to help [themselves]638-they before [they]638-they think it worth while to draw nigh . When at length [they]638-they do : "[639-you] It is uneatable ! " says [the Professor]2365-the professor , laying down [his]2365-the professor knife and fork with a shocking calmness , and regarding [Rivers]162-rivers , as [he]2365-the professor approaches in [his]2365-the professor infuriating , senseless radiance , with a glassy look of vengeful despair . "[639-you] Impossible ! " cries [the young man]504-the young man , hastily helping [himself]504-the young man , and boldly taking a good mouthful . "[639-you] Pah ! " changing countenance ; "[639-you] but it is , though ! What filth ! " Nor is this expression , albeit strong , at all too strong to qualify the plat now set before [these hungry persons]2586-these hungry persons . In the first place it is but too clear that [the kalb]2587-the kalb has originally died a natural death , and has afterwards , perhaps in order to disguise this slight accident , undergone every possible variation of baking , boiling , roasting , stewing , frying , seething ! But , after all , it is not disguised . There is a blank , sulphurous silence . [They]638-they all look at [Rivers]162-rivers . "[0-i] [I]0-i thought , " says [the Professor]2365-the professor , in a cutting , small voice , "[0-i] that [you]0-i gave [us]640-us to understand — " "[0-i] What does it matter what [he]641-you gave [us]640-us to understand ? " cries [Sarah]135-sarah , in a fury , rudely interrupting [him]2365-the professor . "[641-you] The more fools [we]640-us to believe [him]641-you ! It would be more to the purpose if [you]0-i or [he]641-you or [anybody]642-anybody would give [us]640-us to understand how [we]640-us are to get back to [Dresden]2-dresden alive ! " Another murderous silence , broken this time by [Belinda]134-belinda diffidently syllabling the word "[0-i] eggs . " "[0-i] Eggs , of course , " cries [Rivers]162-rivers , snatching at the happy suggestion , and darting a look of enamoured gratitude at [her]134-belinda who has made it . "[0-i] How stupid not to think of them before ! nothing in [the world]643-the world better than a fresh egg , nor more nutritious ! " This last clause is a poor little sop thrown to [[the Professor]2365-the professor 's ireful maw]2590-the professor 's ireful maw . In a moment [he]2365-the professor has fled swift as any scudding rabbit to [the house]2521-the house , and in two seconds more is back again , beaming . "[644-they] Of course [they]644-they can have eggs — any number ; and in three minutes at the outside they will be cooked . " But the three minutes pass , and three more , and three more again . "[0-i] [I]0-i wish , " says [Sarah]135-sarah , addressing [herself]135-sarah in a tone of the most intense and poignant crossness to [the young man]504-the young man , "[0-i] that [you]641-you would kindly sit somewhere where [I]0-i could not see [you]641-you ; [I]0-i think [I]0-i could bear it better if [you]641-you did . [You]641-you look so idiotically cheerful ! " Even as [she]135-sarah speaks , [the Dienstmädchen]2439-the dienstmädchen comes into sight , sauntering deliberately down [the path]2594-the path ; having by [her]2439-the dienstmädchen want of sympathy with [their]644-they sufferings clearly amply dined [herself]2439-the dienstmädchen , and with a plate upon which many eggs are drunkenly rolling about together in [her]2439-the dienstmädchen hand . At this simple sight [the Professor]2365-the professor smiles faintly , and even [Sarah]135-sarah 's sulky brow grows smooth . But , alas ! too soon do [they]644-they exult ! It takes but one glance to show that no new - laid eggs are these , milky and warm , over which [the triumphant hens]2596-the triumphant hens have but just ceased chuckling . [Elderly]176-elderly , nay , veteran eggs are these , as [their]176-elderly dirty , mottled hue but too plainly testifies . The only wonder is how [a single family]2597-a single family can have become possessed of so many addled eggs at once . "[641-you] [You]641-you had better take care how [you]641-you open it ! " says [Rivers]162-rivers , laughing nervously , and with an ill - timed attempt at a joke , as [the Professor]2365-the professor cautiously cracks one , [[his]2365-the professor fellows]2599-his fellows looking breathlessly on ; "[641-you] it will probably go off with a bang ! " [Nobody]2422-nobody smiles . [I]162-rivers have cut [my]162-rivers own throat , "[162-rivers] says [Rivers]162-rivers ruefully , taking six addled eggs out of [his]162-rivers pocket , in which [he]162-rivers has carried them off , to prevent their being imposed as fresh upon [any more unsuspecting travellers]645-any more unsuspecting travellers . It is somewhat later in the day . [They]646-they have shaken the dust of [Lohmen]177-lohmen off [their]646-they feet ; have tramped , faint and silent , along [a charming road whose wayside flowers]647-a charming road whose wayside flowers [they]646-they do not see , and through [a long straggling village whose high - pitched roofs and general picturesqueness]648-a long straggling village whose high - pitched roofs and general picturesqueness [they]646-they execrate , to [Loch Mühle]29-loch mühle , whither , with premature confidence in [the Lohmen Gasthof]177-lohmen 's powers of entertainment , [they]646-they had sent on [the carriage]2361-the carriage . [They]646-they have passed down a gentle incline , and found at the foot [the mill - house]650-the mill - house , sitting by [the brisk mill - stream]651-the brisk mill - stream . [The Frau Müllerin]178-the frau müllerin has brought [them]646-they out excellent milk , coffee , cakes , and eggs , unimpeachably , splendidly fresh , and [they]646-they have eaten them at a snowy - draped deal table , to the sound of [the whizzing mill]652-the whizzing mill and the dripping water and the carolling birds . Here by [the riverlet]653-the riverlet sits [the floury mill]654-the floury mill , and past [it]654-the floury mill [the quick stream]655-the quick stream runs , and over a small weir , a few yards higher up , the noisy bright water pours . Ostensibly to look at [the weir]656-the weir , but in reality only urged by that rage for being tête - à - tête which possesses such happy fools as [they]646-they , even if it be only to say to [one another]657-one another , " How much dust ! "[134-belinda] or " How many flies ! "[134-belinda] [Belinda]134-belinda and [Rivers]162-rivers have left [[their]646-they companions]2568-their companions , and now stand side by side at [the river]463-the river 's edge . " [They]646-they might have got over the veal ! "[162-rivers] says [Rivers]162-rivers , pensively regarding the eggs in [his]162-rivers hand , previous to hurling them with vindictive force , one after the other , across [the stream]660-the stream . " Never ! "[134-belinda] interpolates [Belinda]134-belinda , with emphasis . " But it was these that gave [them]646-they the coup de grâce ! "[504-the young man] adds [the young man]504-the young man , wrathfully aiming the last one at [an opposite rock]662-an opposite rock , against which it breaks with a dull , addled thud . " [I]504-the young man suppose [they]646-they will never make an excursion with [us]646-they again ? "[504-the young man] " Never ! "[134-belinda] repeats [Belinda]134-belinda , with still more energy . " [I]134-belinda am sure that [I]134-belinda would not , if [I]134-belinda were [they]646-they . "[134-belinda] " Then next time , "[162-rivers] says [Rivers]162-rivers hurriedly , and looking away , " [we]646-they shall have to go by [ourselves]646-they . "[162-rivers] It is the most audacious and leading speech [he]162-rivers has ever made [her]134-belinda ; and whether it be [his]162-rivers own audacity or the picture [his]162-rivers words have conjured up , [his]162-rivers voice trembles . What a picture ! A whole long summer- day!—she and [he]162-rivers together , and alone ! A day when [he]162-rivers need never take [his]162-rivers eyes off [her]134-belinda ; when [he]162-rivers would ask leave to lie at [her]134-belinda feet , and might pull [her]134-belinda flowers and soft grasses , and could count [her]134-belinda eyelashes and each breath [she]134-belinda sweetly drew ; and perhaps , at the very end of the day , if [he]162-rivers were very good , and [she]134-belinda in a very gentle mood — [he]162-rivers has to own that [she]134-belinda is not always gentle — [she]134-belinda might give [him]162-rivers one of [her]134-belinda long white hands to kiss — once , just once ! In [his]162-rivers imagination [he]162-rivers is already feeling its cool satin beneath [his]162-rivers lips , when [her]134-belinda reply comes and at once knocks down [[his]162-rivers card - house]663-his card - house . " How likely ! "[134-belinda] [she]134-belinda says curtly , also turning [her]134-belinda head , but in the opposite direction to that which [he]162-rivers has turned [his]162-rivers . " [You]134-belinda would not like it , of course ? "[162-rivers] [he]162-rivers says , chapfallenly , and yet with a sort of slight interrogation in [his]162-rivers tone . [She]134-belinda would not like it ! To [herself]134-belinda [she]134-belinda almost laughs . Is it possible that [he]162-rivers does not guess that the reason why [she]134-belinda has turned away [her]134-belinda face is that [she]134-belinda dares not let [him]162-rivers see the stir and tumult that [his]162-rivers mere suggestion has made there . But [he]162-rivers would be very much keener - sighted , and a much greater coxcomb than [he]162-rivers is , if [he]162-rivers could draw this conclusion from [her]134-belinda harsh and snubbing words . " [I]134-belinda never waste time , "[134-belinda] [she]134-belinda says chillingly , " in speculating as to whether [I]134-belinda should like or dislike what is absolutely out of the question . "[134-belinda] There is a slight silence . [Rivers]162-rivers feels as if a large pail of half - frozen water had been thrown over [him]162-rivers , and were now trickling down the nape of [his]162-rivers neck . [Belinda]134-belinda is still hearing , with passionate vexation , the sound of [her]134-belinda own ungracious voice . Why is it that [she]134-belinda never can hit the juste milieu of cool and friendly civility ? How is it that [her]134-belinda heart is so burning hot , and [her]134-belinda words so icy cold ? [Her]134-belinda eyes , averse from meeting the reproach of [his]162-rivers , look across to where , on the other side of [the racing beck]664-the racing beck , the rocks rise straight up , and out of their clefts slight little fir - trees grow , grasping the stony soil with their shallow roots , and dainty green birches wave , and just - new creasy ferns droop and sprout , and hang their small spring ensigns . " What an iceberg [you]134-belinda are ! "[504-the young man] says [the young man]504-the young man at last , in a low tone of irrepressible mortification . " An iceberg ? "[134-belinda] [she]134-belinda repeats , lifting one hand to [her]134-belinda face , and with [her]134-belinda forefinger and thumb gently pinching [her]134-belinda own trembling under - lip . " Yes ; so [I]134-belinda have often been told . [I]134-belinda think , "[134-belinda] after a slight pause , " that [I]162-rivers am a little tired of being told it . "[162-rivers] " Are [you]134-belinda tired of being it ? "[162-rivers] says [Rivers]162-rivers , sinking [his]162-rivers voice still more , though there is no one but [the brook]666-the brook to overhear [him]162-rivers , and it is much too occupied with its own sweet chatter to attend to [him]162-rivers , and giving [her]134-belinda a piercing look as [he]162-rivers speaks . For all answer [she]134-belinda leaves [him]162-rivers at once , and walks with such speed as if a mad bull were behind [her]134-belinda , back to [the other pair of sweethearts]667-the other pair of sweethearts . [He]162-rivers follows [her]134-belinda , despair at [his]162-rivers heart — [the light lover]668-the light lover 's despair , that is to say , that a frown engenders and a smile kills ; thinking , heart - sickly , that [he]162-rivers will now have to redeem [his]162-rivers own rash forward step by half a dozen tiresome retrograde ones . But fortune deals more kindly with [him]162-rivers than [he]162-rivers had expected of [her]134-belinda . [The Professor]2365-the professor and [Sarah]135-sarah are both asleep . Coffee is generally supposed to be a wakeful potion ; but in [their]670-their case , mixed in nice proportions with fatigue , ill - humour , and boredom , it has had a precisely contrary effect . [The Professor]2365-the professor 's head has dropped forward on [his]2365-the professor chest — always a trying position to [anyone beyond rosy childhood]672-anyone beyond rosy childhood ; the veins on [his]2365-the professor forehead have started forward , the blood has run into [his]2365-the professor long nose , and [his]2365-the professor under - lip protrudes . It is clearly an unintended nap , which has overtaken [him]2365-the professor accidentally , in defiance of [his]2365-the professor rules , and contrary to [his]2365-the professor sanitary principles . [Sarah]135-sarah 's on the other hand , is the slumber , deliberately undertaken , of [a person who sees in sleep the most endurable mode of getting over an irksome period of time]673-a person who sees in sleep the most endurable mode of getting over an irksome period of time . [Her]135-sarah feet , carefully covered by a shawl , repose on a chair in front of [her]135-sarah ; a light ulster , rolled up so as to form a little bolster , nicks comfortably into the nape of [her]135-sarah neck ; [her]135-sarah head is so much thrown back as to afford an excellent opportunity for cutting [her]135-sarah charming white throat . A smile breaks over [Belinda]134-belinda 's face . " It would be a pity to disturb [them]2601-them , "[134-belinda] [she]134-belinda says , whispering . " A thousand pities ! "[134-belinda] assents [he]2365-the professor eagerly . " Would not it be better , "[134-belinda] speaking with a timorousness born of [his]2365-the professor late rebuff , " for [us]676-they to go out of earshot ? "[134-belinda] [She]134-belinda looks first at [the mill]674-the mill , then relentingly at [him]2365-the professor . " Should [you]2365-the professor think that there was [a nice path beyond]2602-a nice path beyond ? "[134-belinda] [she]134-belinda asks demurely . So through [the noisy white mill]675-the noisy white mill [they]676-they go , nodding friendlily to [the powdery miller]677-the powdery miller as [they]676-they pass . Along [the river path]678-the river path [they]676-they saunter , rocks above [their]676-they glad heads — rocks , not frowning nor grand , nor by any means very big and beetling , but with finest grass and yellow wallflowers nestled in [their]676-they rifts , and making mimic gardens of [their]676-they little ridges and crannies . On [their]676-they other hand the small river frolicking , and on [its]679-its farther side rocks again , grass again , sun and flowers again : drooping birches and straight pines . At every step that carries [them]676-they farther from [the mill Rivers]680-the mill rivers ' spirits rise . " [I]2365-the professor hope , "[2365-the professor] [he]2365-the professor says , chuckling over the recollection—"I hope , for [his]2365-the professor own sake , that [Professor Forth]136-professor forth will awake first . If [Miss Churchill]152-miss churchill sees [him]2365-the professor as [we]676-they have just done [I]2365-the professor would not give much for [his]2365-the professor chance ! "[2365-the professor] " And [I]134-belinda would not give much for it , whichever wakes first ! "[134-belinda] answers [Belinda]134-belinda ominously . By - and - by , though [they]676-they are not at all tired , [they]676-they sit down . After all , it is not so very unlike [his]2365-the professor vision — the vision that [she]134-belinda had so disdainfully pooh - poohed . Nor when [she]134-belinda speaks does [she]134-belinda , as [he]2365-the professor half feared that [she]134-belinda would , break the illusion , for [her]134-belinda voice is gentle , almost apologetic . " [I]134-belinda should like to explain something to [you]2365-the professor , if [you]2365-the professor will attend to [me]134-belinda . "[134-belinda] If [he]2365-the professor will attend to [her]134-belinda ! Could [he]2365-the professor ever dare to think that any utterance of [[his]2365-the professor idol]681-his idol 's might be nonsense , it would be now . If [he]2365-the professor will attend to [her]134-belinda ! [He]2365-the professor who , if at dinner [she]134-belinda ask [him]2365-the professor to pass the salt , listens with such entranced reverence as if it were to [the Spheres]179-the spheres together singing . " Do [I]2365-the professor usually not attend when [you]134-belinda speak ? "[2365-the professor] [he]2365-the professor asks , with timid irony . [He]2365-the professor has rested [his]2365-the professor elbow on a little plat of soft turf upon the rock , and [his]2365-the professor head on [his]2365-the professor right hand , which brings [him]2365-the professor fully an inch and a half nearer [her]134-belinda ( in itself no despicable gain ) , and is feasting with leisurely rapture — there must be no discomfort of posture to mar such high enjoyment — on each slow turn of [her]134-belinda head , on its thick white throat ; and without any fear of [Sarah]135-sarah 's gimlet eyes derisively perforating [him]2365-the professor . " [I]134-belinda know , "[134-belinda] continues [Belinda]134-belinda , who is not leaning on either elbow , but is sitting very upright and looking [shy—"I]134-belinda am conscious that [I]134-belinda have taken things [you]2365-the professor have said to [me]134-belinda — little harmless , unmeaning , civil things , "[134-belinda] with a hasty blush of fear lest [she]134-belinda should be supposed to have attached too much importance to them—"very awkwardly ! very surlily ! "[135-sarah] " Have [you]134-belinda ? "[2365-the professor] [he]2365-the professor answers ruefully . " [I]2365-the professor do not think [you]134-belinda have taken them at all ! [I]2365-the professor think [you]134-belinda have thrown them back in [my]2365-the professor face ! "[2365-the professor] " [I]134-belinda know , "[134-belinda] [she]134-belinda answers penitently ; " that is what [I]134-belinda wanted to explain to [you]2365-the professor . In point of fact , "[134-belinda] no longer blushing , but looking at [him]2365-the professor directly with [her]134-belinda honest eyes , " [I]134-belinda am not used to them ! "[134-belinda] " Not used to civil speeches ? "[2365-the professor] repeats [he]2365-the professor , in an accent of the most profound astonishment ; [he]2365-the professor who when in [her]134-belinda company is in a continual state of biting [his]2365-the professor own tongue out to prevent it from breaking into extravagant laudations ; and who can not but believe that all other created things are labouring under the same difficulty with [himself]2365-the professor ! [She]134-belinda shakes [her]134-belinda head . " No ; [I]134-belinda am not . [I]134-belinda suppose , "[134-belinda] looking reflectively at the flower - lipped brook , " that it is an unusual case ; [I]134-belinda think it must be owing to [my]134-belinda forbidding manner ! "[134-belinda] " Then why , in [Heaven]153-heaven 's name , have [you]134-belinda a forbidding manner ? "[2365-the professor] asks [he]2365-the professor in a sort of involuntary passion of wonder . Even [he]2365-the professor can not altogether deny the fact ; and yet it seems so coarsely inconsistent with everything else about [her]134-belinda . A forbidding manner with that throat , and those ears , and that nape to [her]134-belinda neck ! [Her]134-belinda hair is dressed rather high in the French fashion , and [she]134-belinda often turns [her]134-belinda back upon [him]2365-the professor , so that [he]2365-the professor has a good view of it . " Why have [I]134-belinda a short nose ? "[134-belinda] replies [she]134-belinda , with a good - humoured shrug ; " [you]2365-the professor might just as well ask [me]134-belinda that ! It is a misfortune with which [I]134-belinda was born . "[134-belinda] But as [he]2365-the professor makes no light rejoinder — [poor fellow]425-poor fellow ! [he]2365-the professor is beyond it , up to [his]2365-the professor neck in the hopeless dulness of a serious passion — only enveloping [her]134-belinda with the smothered flame of [his]2365-the professor silent looks , [she]134-belinda grows shy and grave again . " It is a bonâ - fide misfortune , "[134-belinda] [she]134-belinda says , slightly shaking [her]134-belinda head ; " [I]134-belinda have no wish to be forbidding . [I]134-belinda think in [my]134-belinda heart [I]134-belinda am quite as anxious to please as [anyone else]2603-anyone else can be . [I]134-belinda will even own , "[134-belinda] with a brief , nervous smile , " that [I]134-belinda should like whenever [I]134-belinda entered [a room]2604-a room to hear a buzz of admiration run round it ! No , no ! "[134-belinda] suddenly changing [her]134-belinda tone and stretching out both hands forbiddingly towards [him]2365-the professor ; " do not try to say that [I]134-belinda might now ; if [you]2365-the professor do , [I]134-belinda shall go back to [the mill]674-the mill at once ! "[134-belinda] " It would hardly be worth while , "[2365-the professor] replies [he]2365-the professor drily ; " [you]134-belinda might put up with [my]2365-the professor clumsy compliments this once — by - the - bye , as it happens , [I]2365-the professor was not thinking of paying [you]134-belinda one then — since it is , as [you]134-belinda say , the last time ! "[2365-the professor] [She]134-belinda has reddened painfully at the idea of having sought to avert a flattery which , after all , was not coming ; but [she]134-belinda tries to carry it off lightly . " Perhaps it may not be the last , "[134-belinda] [she]134-belinda says cheerfully ; " [we]2606-we have always one resource left ; [we]2606-we can ask [Miss Watson]147-miss watson to chaperon [us]2606-we . " Yes , "[162-rivers] [he]162-rivers answers , " [an ironmaster]2612-an ironmaster . Why , what did [you]134-belinda think [he]2612-an ironmaster was ? " [I]504-the young man know that one cuts but [a poor figure swaggering about one 's own belongings]2617-a poor figure swaggering about one 's own belongings , "[504-the young man] continues [the young man]504-the young man , [his]504-the young man love - sick air for the moment gone , and with courage and spirit in [his]504-the young man eyes ; " but if ever [a man]2618-a man deserved to be looked up to , [[my]504-the young man father]608-my father does !
