" [[My]162-rivers grandfather]2621-my grandfather had got through most of [his]2621-my grandfather money racing , "[162-rivers] pursues [Rivers]162-rivers innocently . [Her]134-belinda spirits run up like quicksilver . Though there is undoubtedly greater moral culpability in squandering [[your]693-your children]694-your children 's heritage in horse - racing than in earning [them]694-your children an honest livelihood with [a besom]695-a besom , yet , such is the force of habit and association , [Belinda]134-belinda is relieved that [[her]134-belinda lover 's grandfather]696-her lover 's grandfather apparently did the one and left undone the other . " And [so father]2622-so father had nothing in [the world]643-the world but [[his]2621-my grandfather younger son]2624-his younger son 's share of [[my]696-her lover 's grandfather grandmother]2625-my grandmother 's fortune to look to ; but [he]2621-my grandfather gave that up at once to [the others]418-the others , and faced [the world]643-the world without a stiver ! [You]693-your may think whether [he]2621-my grandfather had to put [his]2621-my grandfather shoulder to the wheel ! For years [he]2621-my grandfather worked like a — like [a navvy]2628-a navvy . [Poor dear old boy]2629-poor dear old boy ! when [I]696-her lover 's grandfather think of what [his]2621-my grandfather youth was , and what [mine]696-her lover 's grandfather is ! "[696-her lover 's grandfather] [He]696-her lover 's grandfather breaks off in genuine emotion , eyes kindling and hot colour rising . And [Belinda]134-belinda , lovingly thinking how well such generous enthusiasm becomes [him]696-her lover 's grandfather , keeps a sympathetic silence . " And now , "[162-rivers] continues [Rivers]162-rivers , sighing — " now that [we]2630-we hoped [he]2621-my grandfather had got into [smooth water]2631-smooth water , and might take breath and enjoy [his]2621-my grandfather life a little , comes this depression in iron ; but , "[162-rivers] [his]696-her lover 's grandfather diffidence rushing back in floods upon [him]696-her lover 's grandfather at the thought of how [he]696-her lover 's grandfather has been teasing with [his]696-her lover 's grandfather egotism [his]696-her lover 's grandfather dear Lady Disdain , " [I]696-her lover 's grandfather do not know why [I]696-her lover 's grandfather should bother [you]134-belinda with all this ! "[696-her lover 's grandfather] " [I]134-belinda do not know why [you]696-her lover 's grandfather should not , "[134-belinda] [she]134-belinda answers softly . If only [she]134-belinda could always speak in that tone ! At seeing [her]134-belinda thus gentle , approachable , humane , all [his]696-her lover 's grandfather splendid hopes seem suddenly set within [his]696-her lover 's grandfather reach . Would not [he]696-her lover 's grandfather be a poltroon who deserved to lose [them]697-them for ever if [he]696-her lover 's grandfather did not now stretch out a hand to grasp them ? " [I]696-her lover 's grandfather hope , "[696-her lover 's grandfather] [he]696-her lover 's grandfather says , not daring to look fully at [her]134-belinda , and covertly , unknown to [her]134-belinda , touching an outlying ribbon of [her]134-belinda gown to give [himself]696-her lover 's grandfather courage—"I hope , "[696-her lover 's grandfather] trembling exceedingly , " that some day [you]134-belinda will know [[my]696-her lover 's grandfather father]608-my father . "[696-her lover 's grandfather] " Do [you]696-her lover 's grandfather ? "[134-belinda] [she]134-belinda answers curtly . Instantly [she]134-belinda has frozen up again . [Her]134-belinda heart is beating even faster than [his]696-her lover 's grandfather . Eager as [he]696-her lover 's grandfather may be to make [her]134-belinda known to whatever is nearest and dearest to [him]696-her lover 's grandfather on [earth]698-earth , [he]696-her lover 's grandfather can not be more eager than [she]134-belinda is to be made known ; but [her]134-belinda repellent voice and [her]134-belinda chill face — in reality the outcome of a fierce shyness which [she]134-belinda can no more master than [she]134-belinda can control the course of [her]134-belinda blood — give [him]696-her lover 's grandfather to infer that in [his]696-her lover 's grandfather last speech [he]696-her lover 's grandfather has outstepped the bounds set [him]696-her lover 's grandfather by [her]134-belinda . For a moment [he]696-her lover 's grandfather keeps a hot , humiliated silence . Then , reflecting that [he]696-her lover 's grandfather is but [a dastard who can be beaten back from [his]696-her lover 's grandfather heart 's desire by one rebuff]699-a dastard who can be beaten back from his heart 's desire by one rebuff ; taking comfort , too , from what [she]134-belinda had lately told [him]696-her lover 's grandfather as to [her]134-belinda own shortcomings in manner , [he]696-her lover 's grandfather plucks up courage for one more effort . " [I]696-her lover 's grandfather should like , "[696-her lover 's grandfather] [he]696-her lover 's grandfather says — but [he]696-her lover 's grandfather has involuntarily moved half a pace further away from [her]134-belinda , and in [his]696-her lover 's grandfather tone there is less heartiness and more misgiving than before—"I should like [you]134-belinda , of course , to know all [[my]696-her lover 's grandfather people]2633-my people . "[696-her lover 's grandfather] " Should [you]696-her lover 's grandfather ? "[134-belinda] [she]134-belinda answers drily ; the very effort to steady it , the potency of the emotion which dominates [her]134-belinda , making [her]134-belinda voice hard and surly ; and with a discouraging stiff laugh : " [I]696-her lover 's grandfather am afraid it is not very likely ! "[696-her lover 's grandfather] There is a dead silence . For to - day there is no more fear of [his]696-her lover 's grandfather transgressing [her]134-belinda limits . [He]696-her lover 's grandfather sits looking blankly at [the brook]666-the brook . If , in the crises of [foolish men]701-foolish men 's and [women]2468-women 's lives there were but a go- between to interpret ! But there never is ! For full five minutes [the river]463-the river loudly runs , and the finches piercingly sing , without any human noise to break in upon [their]704-their concert . At last [Belinda]134-belinda , who has been snatching remorseful glances at the severe melancholy of [[her]134-belinda sweetheart]705-her sweetheart 's profile , hazards a timid propitiation : " Have [you]696-her lover 's grandfather many [sisters]2634-sisters ? "[134-belinda] [she]134-belinda asks conciliatingly . " Two , "[696-her lover 's grandfather] [he]696-her lover 's grandfather answers shortly , looking straight before [him]696-her lover 's grandfather ; " but , "[696-her lover 's grandfather] with a spurious smile , " [I]696-her lover 's grandfather have inflicted enough of [[my]696-her lover 's grandfather family]2635-my family upon [you]134-belinda for one day . "[696-her lover 's grandfather] [She]134-belinda is too much wounded to make any rejoinder , and the conversation , which before had flown as glibly as [the stream]660-the stream or as the lark 's roulades , drops into silence again . At [their]704-their feet the rock - shadows couch . The sun 's rays , no longer vertical , blaze obliquely upon the water and upon the sunlike dandelion flowers . " It must be late , "[134-belinda] says [Belinda]134-belinda reluctantly , [her]134-belinda eyes turning from the hurrying sparkles of the beck to consult [his]696-her lover 's grandfather face ; " had [we]704-their better be going back ? "[134-belinda] [She]134-belinda had hoped for an earnest protest from [him]696-her lover 's grandfather , a supplication for yet a few moments more of [their]704-their bright solitude . But none such comes ! [He]696-her lover 's grandfather makes no sort of objection ; but , on the contrary , rises at once , and stands ready to attend [her]134-belinda ; and silently [they]704-their return to [the mill]674-the mill . What a mercy it is to be alone for a change ! " says [Sarah]135-sarah ; "[696-her lover 's grandfather] is not it ? [You]696-her lover 's grandfather do not assent with the warmth [I]0-i should have expected , eh ? And what a much richer and rarer mercy it is that [we]704-their are not to be driven a - pleasuring twenty hot miles at a stretch , and carouse on rotten eggs at the end ! " It is near noon , and [the sisters]2636-the sisters are walking in [the Grosse Garten]1-the grosse garten , [that green and ample pleasure - ground , with [its]1-the grosse garten tall trees]2637-that green and ample pleasure - ground , with its tall trees and [its]1-the grosse garten intersecting drives , of [the Dresden burghers]2638-the dresden burghers . Against a peevish sky [the Museum of Antiquities]397-the museum of antiquities lifts [its]397-the museum of antiquities greenish roof ; in [its]397-the museum of antiquities pool , with [the little swan - house]2640-the little swan - house in the middle , there is beginning to come a vernal glow from the reflections of the young - leaved horse - chestnuts standing round ; in the flower - beds the pansies and cinerarias bloom purple and yellow . [Belinda]134-belinda 's only answer to [[her]134-belinda sister]2366-her sister 's self- gratulations is to stoop and [console Slutty]157-slutty , who has returned in some disorder from a slight excursion , having been coarsely hustled away by the shabby surly Polizei , who guard and pompously warn off profane dogs from the meagre blossoms . "[696-her lover 's grandfather] The beauty of these straight drives , " continues [Sarah]135-sarah , thoughtfully eyeing one of the long vistas of trees that gradually lessens away to nothing , "[696-her lover 's grandfather] is that [you]708-you never can be taken by surprise in them ; [nobody]2422-nobody can pounce out upon [you]708-you from round a corner ; it is merely a question of long sight . Now , if [I]0-i saw [[my]0-i admirer]710-my admirer in the distance , [I]0-i should simply whip behind one of these friendly trees , " looking up at an oak that , still wintrily brown , rises from the tenderly greening undergrowth . "[0-i] What would [you]0-i do if [you]0-i saw [yours]0-i ? " "[0-i] [I]0-i do not know which [you]0-i mean , " answers [Belinda]134-belinda , with an awkward attempt at gaiety , for this morning [she]134-belinda is not gay ; "[0-i] [I]0-i have so many ! " "[0-i] No , [you]0-i have not , " replies [Sarah]135-sarah calmly ; "[0-i] but [you]0-i have one . How long [you]0-i will keep [him]710-my admirer is another question . Judging by the crushed and flattened condition to which [you]0-i had reduced [him]710-my admirer last evening , [I]0-i should say probably not long . " "[0-i] At all events , " cries [Belinda]134-belinda , whom this chance cut has stung more deeply than it was intended—"at[710-my admirer] all events , [I]0-i had not reduced [him]710-my admirer to the condition of foaming rage to which [you]0-i had brought [Professor]136-professor forth Forth . [He]710-my admirer said , " laughing unwillingly , "[710-my admirer] that if [he]710-my admirer had not known that [you]0-i were sincerely attached to [him]710-my admirer , [he]710-my admirer should have had difficulty in overlooking [your]0-i conduct ! " "[710-my admirer] Do [you]0-i think [he]710-my admirer will jilt [me]0-i ? " cries [Sarah]135-sarah in a delighted voice , and with a radiant smile . "[0-i] No , " shaking [her]0-i head ; "[710-my admirer] no such luck . [My]0-i conduct was not good , " with a candid air ; "[0-i] but it had its palliations — [he]710-my admirer fell asleep ! " "[0-i] So did [you]0-i . " "[0-i] But did [I]0-i look like [him]710-my admirer ? " drily . "[0-i] Anyhow , with [my]0-i good resolutions , it was a case of ' look in [his]710-my admirer face , and [you]0-i forget them all . ' " A pause . [A solitary rider]2642-a solitary rider is cantering along [the drive]368-the drive . [A blue Gardereiter]180-a blue gardereiter is practising [[his]180-a blue gardereiter four - in - hand team of chestnuts]2644-his four - in - hand team of chestnuts in a sort of phaeton , up and down , up and down . [The girls]2500-the girls have reached a spot where there is a little quiet peep among the trees ; a plot of lush green grass , vividly green , backed by sedate high firs , across which a few young birches are throwing [their]2644-his four - in - hand team of chestnuts infinitely delicate leafage , and stretching [their]2644-his four - in - hand team of chestnuts shining white stems . "[0-i] It seems [he]710-my admirer has [a mother]711-a mother , " says [Sarah]135-sarah presently , [her]135-sarah eyes following the diminishing [Gardereiter]180-a blue gardereiter and [[his]180-a blue gardereiter team]2646-his team . "[711-a mother] Has ! had , [you]0-i mean ! " "[711-a mother] Has . [I]0-i am afraid [I]0-i let [him]710-my admirer see that [I]0-i thought it a remarkable instance of longevity . " [She]711-a mother stops to laugh , and then goes on , letting fall each little sentence with deliberate serenity . "[711-a mother] [She]711-a mother lives with [him]710-my admirer ; [she]711-a mother is in [[her]711-a mother dotage]712-her dotage ; [she]711-a mother never stops asking questions ; and it seems that the chiefest of [[his]710-my admirer wife]713-his wife 's married joys is to consist in answering [them]714-them . " "[711-a mother] Was it at that stage of [his]710-my admirer confidences that [you]0-i cried out , ' Ceci est insupportable ! ' and took to [your]0-i heels and left [him]710-my admirer ? " asks [Belinda]134-belinda drily . "[0-i] It must have been somewhere about then , " answers [Sarah]135-sarah modestly . "[0-i] [He]710-my admirer did not recognise the quotation , and [he]710-my admirer was displeased at the sentiment . However , " with a shrug , "[0-i] [I]0-i will not do it again , for [your]0-i sake , and in [your]0-i interests ; and if [he]710-my admirer does not fall asleep , and shoot out [his]710-my admirer under lip , [I]0-i think [I]0-i shall be able to hold out until [we]715-we go . This is the fourth,"reflectively checking off the numbers on [her]134-belinda fingers ; "[0-i] one , two , three , four , five — in less than five weeks [we]715-we shall be in [London]10-london . " "[0-i] In less than five weeks ! " repeats [Belinda]134-belinda , stopping short and paling , while an expression of something very like terror looks out of the pupils of [her]134-belinda dismayed eyes . "[0-i] In less than five weeks ! " assents [Sarah]135-sarah , nodding . "[156-granny] [I]0-i heard [granny]156-granny telling [Gustel]158-gustel that [she]156-granny would not need [her]156-granny services after the first of June , and courteously adding how glad [she]156-granny would be to be rid of [her]156-granny . Pooh ! " laying [her]134-belinda hand on [[her]134-belinda sister]2366-her sister 's shoulder , and giving [her]2366-her sister a shrewd , good - natured glance , "[156-granny] do not look so woe - begone ; it is only a case of hurrying the pace a little . " [Belinda]134-belinda 's answer is a gesture of disgust . [She]134-belinda walks quickly on . "[158-gustel] It is coarsely worded , [I]0-i admit , " continues [the other]2396-the other , briskly following , and keeping up with [her]2366-her sister ; "[0-i] but believe [me]0-i , the advice is sound . " And so it may be ; but as it is addressed to [a person who is utterly incapable of making use of it]2649-a person who is utterly incapable of making use of it , it is , like most other advice , wasted . To hurry the pace a little ! For days and days afterwards the vile phrase recurs to [her]2366-her sister , dinning in [her]2366-her sister ears . As often — and that is not seldom — as the terror which had seized [her]2366-her sister in [the Grosse Garten]1-the grosse garten returns , so often does the brutal consolation with which [[her]2366-her sister sister]2366-her sister had tried to allay it . And as the priceless days slip by — slip away out of the fingers stretched forth in such a fever to detain them — it takes in [her]2366-her sister ears a horrible inflection of irony . Over and over and over again it keeps saying itself to [her]2366-her sister , as [she]2366-her sister lies awake at night , hour after hour — [she]2366-her sister can lie awake with the best of [them]2651-them now — hearing the engines screech and [the trains]2652-the trains thunder along [the Bohmischer Bahn]2653-the bohmischer bahn ; watching the now withering blossoms drop from the pear - tree in the keen moonlight , and reckoning over to [herself]2366-her sister , until [her]2366-her sister brain grows dull and tardy sleep releases [her]2366-her sister , the small and diminishing hoard of precious hours during which there will be any object in living . For that what makes the essence of these days may not pass , may last on through a long transfigured lifetime , is a hope too glorious for [her]2366-her sister to dare lift [her]2366-her sister wet and dazzled eyes to [its]2654-its face . And meanwhile the days themselves are passing ! Oh , how [they]2651-them are passing ! To hurry the pace ! How can [she]2366-her sister hurry the pace ? [she]2366-her sister asks [herself]2366-her sister desperately , in the watches of the night , unconsciously accepting the detestable phrase . What can [she]2366-her sister , being [she]2366-her sister , do ? How can [she]2366-her sister , tied down by [her]2366-her sister nature , by [her]2366-her sister stiff - necked virgin pride , by the very force of [her]2366-her sister dumb , pent passion , put out a finger to help [herself]2366-her sister ? As easily can [she]2366-her sister make the grey irises of [her]2366-her sister eyes coal - black . Is it [her]2366-her sister fault that all strong emotion with [her]2366-her sister translates itself into a cold , hard voice , and a chill set face ? With [other women]510-other women it translates itself into dimples and pink blushes and lowered eyes . Ah ! but do [they]510-other women feel as [she]2366-her sister does ? [Sarah]135-sarah , for instance . When do [men]2377-men ever leave [Sarah]135-sarah 's company with the down - faced , baffled , white look with which [Rivers]162-rivers has more than once quitted [hers]2366-her sister ? Preening [themselves]2377-men rather ; with sleeked feathers and cosseted vanity . "[0-i] [I]0-i am not of the stuff of which [the women that [men]2377-men love]716-the women that men love are made ! " [she]0-i says , thinking with an envious humility of [[her]0-i sister]2366-her sister 's graces , and staring blankly at the stove , beginning to glimmer white in the dawn . But for such a radical fault of nature and constitution what remedy can there be ? Tamely to copy [[her]0-i sister]2366-her sister 's airy charms and light coquetries ? "[0-i] It would be the donkey playing the lap - dog ! " [she]0-i cries bitterly . And yet , despite all [their]510-other women mischances , and [their]510-other women agues , and [their]510-other women desperations , what superb days these are ! Few ? Yes , perhaps . But when [one]373-one reflects how much acute happiness may be packed into five minutes , and how many five minutes there are in a month , these two may be accounted to have been largely dowered , seeing that to [many a one , not held to be specially spited by fortune]2660-many a one , not held to be specially spited by fortune , it is not given in all [his]2661-his or [her]2662-her lifetime to attain to one such day . Days when round [each corner]2663-each corner lurks a splendid possibility ; days when each ring at the bell may mean that Heaven has opened . Very often it means nothing of the kind ; it means [Miss Watson]147-miss watson , or [Gustel]158-gustel , or a parcel , but it may . In later life [you]2664-you may be as fortunate as [you]2664-you please ; a laurel garland round [your]2664-you head , a colossal balance at [Coutts]181-coutts ' , [a chaste , fond wife]2665-a chaste , fond wife and [paragon children]2666-paragon children , but [Heaven]153-heaven can no longer pounce upon [you]2664-you from round [the street corner]2667-the street corner . Yes , superb days ! though on one or two of [them]510-other women the east wind blew piercingly , sweeping across [the wide plain]2668-the wide plain ; and on another one or two the rain slid down from the heavy clouds , and blurred the windows . But if it blurred the windows , did it not thereby make the task of [Miss Watson]147-miss watson 's spyglass a more difficult one ? and could the wind reach [them]510-other women in the little pinewood behind [the bleak Barracks]2669-the bleak barracks , where [they]510-other women walked safe and warm on strewn fir needles , and listened to its harmless scolding far above [their]510-other women happy heads . How often [they]510-other women meet ! how perpetually , how always ! In [the Alt Markt]33-the alt markt , buying jonquils of the ugly [German Fraus]34-german fraus , as [they]510-other women sit under [their]510-other women great cotton umbrellas , queening it over [their]510-other women carrots and radishes ; with [the old houses]2670-the old houses , all different heights and shapes , russet - red roofed , endlessly dormer - windowed , standing round ; at Plauen under [the cool cherry orchards]2671-the cool cherry orchards ; at [Meissen]35-meissen , in [the hot Fabrik]2672-the hot fabrik ; in [the NeuStadt]2673-the neustadt , in [the Alt - Stadt]2674-the alt - stadt — everywhere . If , in after years , [they]510-other women revisit [the bright city]2675-the bright city , what spot in [[all]2676-all [its]2675-the bright city precincts]2677-all its precincts will be empty and innocent of associations to [them]510-other women ? Superb days ! But [they]510-other women are going . Racing - pace [they]510-other women gallop by . How will it be when [they]510-other women are gone ? As the time passes , [she]2678-her grows ever less and less in a condition to face this problem . By - and - by [she]2678-her refuses to face it at all . When it comes it comes ; but till then let [her]2678-her not be defrauded of [her]2678-her birthright . Let [her]2678-her too , like [the Mayflies]182-the mayflies and [the Painted Ladies]2679-the painted ladies , have [her]2678-her span of careless , giddy bliss . Whenever the conversation turns upon [their]510-other women departure , [their]510-other women journey , [their]510-other women arrival in [London]10-london , upon anything that lies beyond the horizon of the now and the here , if it be possible , [she]2678-her leaves [the room]422-the room ; if it be not possible , [she]2678-her feverishly seeks to divert the talk into other channels . But if [she]2678-her can fight thought off pretty well in the day , the variegated , distracting , kaleidoscope day , it indemnifies itself at night . At night there it is , and nothing but it ; no flickering leaves , or scudding clouds , or [passers - by]2681-passers - by ; nothing but it : an image drawn on night 's plain black canvas with a hard , cutting clearness , as of an acid biting into steel ; so that [she]2678-her must look at it . As for [her]2678-her , at this time [she]2678-her would be thankful that there were no night at all . [She]2678-her does not need [its]2682-its refreshment . Without it [her]2678-her every power seems strung up to the highest pitch of efficiency , and [she]2678-her dreads , oh how [she]2678-her dreads its solitude and silence ! In the daytime , however unconventionally early or improbably late may be the hour , there is always a possibility , nay , a likelihood , of seeing [his]2678-her strapping figure and [his]2678-her burning eyes following the infant stolidity of the page , [Tommy]163-tommy , into [the salon]2683-the salon . But in the night this is impossible . The night , therefore , is time absolutely wasted ; now , too , when there is so little time left to waste . Of what use is it but for lying broad awake in , counting up how many hours the different moments , half - hours , of [their]510-other women meetings make ? To [her]2678-her , just so much of life is worth reckoning as life at all ; the rest is unimportant padding . And [he]2678-her ? As to [him]2678-her , [the pavement of [the quiet Lüttichau Strasse]2685-the quiet lüttichau strasse before [her]2678-her door]2684-the pavement of the quiet lüttichau strasse before her door is worn hollow by [his]2678-her footsteps ; [his]2678-her eyes devour [her]2678-her ; [his]2678-her tongue stutters in lame speech to [her]2678-her , and altogether omits to answer when addressed by [anyone else]2603-anyone else . [He]2678-her has abandoned all other occupations in life but that of dogging [her]2678-her . But [he]2678-her has not asked [her]2678-her to be [[his]2678-her wife]713-his wife . To how much more purpose would be that one short practical question than all [his]2678-her resultless , love - sick manoeuvres ; than all the enormous nosegays with which [[her]2678-her room]2688-her room is over - filled and over - scented — for [she]2678-her can not bear to throw away [even the dead ones]2689-even the dead ones . Perhaps this thought crosses [her]2678-her mind now and again . It certainly does [Sarah]135-sarah 's . [It]2690-it not only crosses it , but finds not unfrequent egress through [her]2678-her lips . And meanwhile [May]183-maria is three - parts over . The 24th of that month is reached , and , indeed , is almost ended ; for dinner is past , and [the girls]2500-the girls and [[their]2500-the girls grandmother]450-their grandmother are loitering over [their]2500-the girls light and leisurely dessert . [[Their]2500-the girls grandmother]450-their grandmother is [an old lady with a bright eye]2694-an old lady with a bright eye — strangely bright , considering that it has wept , or been supposed to weep , for [a good - natured husband]2695-a good - natured husband , [five promising sons]2696-five promising sons , and [three dutiful daughters]2697-three dutiful daughters — with a skin that it is still no penance and that , if tradition lies not , it was once considered a high treat to kiss , and with a cap whose secret will die with [her]450-their grandmother . "[0-i] [Granny]156-granny 's religious principles are slack , " [Sarah]135-sarah is wo nt to say ; "[0-i] [her]156-granny morality is hazy , and in moments of excitement [I]0-i have even known [her]156-granny let fly an oath ; but , on the other hand , [she]156-granny is thoroughly clean , and [she]156-granny always laughs at [my]0-i jokes ; so that , taking [her]156-granny all round , [I]0-i could better spare [a better woman]718-a better woman . [One]373-one knows that if [she]156-granny were called upon for any of the sublimer virtues of life , [she]156-granny would be found wanting . But , after all , the sublimer virtues are the thousand- pound notes that [one]373-one seldom needs to change , and [granny]721-granny has plenty of the sixpences . " At the present moment [her]156-granny attention is absorbed in the effort , aided by a cracknel , to induce [her]156-granny new pug Punch to give three cheers for [the Queen]359-the queen , with the thorough mastery over which elegant accomplishment [he]2699-he has arrived credited . On the present occasion , however , this talent seems inclined to hang fire , for , though in general [a remarkably free barker]2700-a remarkably free barker , [he]2699-he is now , relatively to [[his]2699-he sovereign]2701-his sovereign , either disloyally silent , or irrationally incoherent . [He]2699-he will give ten cheers , or one and a half , or five muffled ones and a sneeze , but [he]2699-he will not give three . "[156-granny] [Granny]156-granny , " says [Sarah]135-sarah , desisting from a vain effort to make Slutty cheer too , an endeavour which [the latter]2394-the latter frustrates by instantly rolling over on [her]156-granny back , and remaining in that position until all attempt at education is suspended—"granny[156-granny] , do [you]156-granny know that [we]722-we are going to have a long and happy day at that everlasting Wesenstein to - morrow ? " "[156-granny] By all means , [[my]0-i dear]2421-my dear ; so as [you]156-granny do not ask [me]0-i to go with [you]156-granny . " "[156-granny] [I]0-i believe , " says [Sarah]135-sarah , regarding [[her]135-sarah grandmother]2703-her grandmother with an air of cool dispassionate speculation , "[156-granny] that if [we]722-we were to tell [you]156-granny that [we]722-we were going to [Greenwich Fair]36-greenwich fair , or [the Argyle Rooms]724-the argyle rooms , [you]156-granny would say ' By all means , [[my]0-i dears]2429-my dears ! ' Only that [I]0-i am not at all so sure that in that case [you]156-granny would add , ' So as [you]156-granny do not expect [me]0-i to go with [you]156-granny ' ! " [The old lady]2704-the old lady laughs pleasantly , as if [[her]2704-the old lady granddaughter]2705-her granddaughter had paid [her]2704-the old lady a compliment . "[156-granny] Are [you]156-granny going to take [[your]156-granny sweethearts]726-your sweethearts with [you]156-granny ? " asks [she]2704-the old lady gaily ; "[156-granny] [your]156-granny popinjays ? No , Punch ! three cheers ! [Nobody]2422-nobody asked [you]156-granny to sneeze for [the Queen]359-the queen ! " "[2422-nobody] [Our]729-our popinjays ? " cries [Sarah]135-sarah , delighted . "[2422-nobody] Not mine , thank [God]184-god ! By - the - bye , [granny]721-granny , as [I]0-i have no further use for [him]731-him , [I]0-i am thinking of arranging a marriage between [you]721-granny and [him]731-him . [Your]721-granny ages are suitable ; and , though [you]721-granny have slightly the advantage in externals , [he]731-him is greatly [your]721-granny superior in intellect . " "[731-him] God bless [my]0-i soul ! No , thank [you]721-granny , [child]732-child ! " replies [Mrs. Churchill]185-mrs. churchill with energy ; "[721-granny] [I]0-i prefer [Belinda]134-belinda 's . " "[721-granny] So do [we]729-our all ! " says [Sarah]135-sarah , with a dry look . At this last speech , [Belinda]134-belinda , who has been growing ever hotter and more restless since the word "[15-wesenstein] [Wesenstein]15-wesenstein " was mentioned , suddenly leaves [her]134-belinda seat under the pretext of comforting [Slutty]157-slutty . [Slutty]157-slutty hates [Punch]186-punch and [his]186-punch tricks , and the kudos that attends them , and has now squeezed [herself]134-belinda under a piece of furniture to which , in general , only [Miss Watson]147-miss watson 's voice has power to banish [her]134-belinda , and from beneath which there is now nothing visible of [her]134-belinda but a small spiteful face , full of mortification and ire . As [she]134-belinda firmly resists all [Belinda]134-belinda 's blandishing inducements to [her]134-belinda to come forth , though the agitated beat of [her]134-belinda tail upon the floor proves that [she]134-belinda is not wholly unmoved by [them]2706-them , [the young girl]2707-the young girl desist , and passes into [the neighbouring salon]2708-the neighbouring salon , where , as there is [no one]365-no one to comment on [her]134-belinda actions , [she]134-belinda at once walks rapidly to the window , and looks eagerly down [the dull and empty street]2710-the dull and empty street . Not for long , however . Ere many moments have passed , a hand is laid on [her]134-belinda shoulder ; a rallying voice sounds in [her]134-belinda ear : "[15-wesenstein] Come ! [he]733-he can not be in sight yet ! [He]733-he will surely have the good feeling to let [us]734-us swallow [our]734-us coffee in peace . " [Belinda]134-belinda gives a great start , and angrily shakes off [[her]134-belinda sister]2366-her sister 's touch . "[733-he] [I]0-i can not think how it concerns [you]735-you , " [she]0-i says testily , in intense vexation at having been surprised on the watch ; "[733-he] [he]733-he does not trouble [you]735-you much ! " "[733-he] That is the rub , " replies [Sarah]135-sarah calmly . "[733-he] If [he]733-he did , [my]0-i nose would probably be flattened against the pane as well as yours . But seriously , [I]0-i should not mind how often [he]733-he came — not much , at least — not more , " in candid parenthesis , "[733-he] than [I]0-i always hate seeing [other people]736-other people made love to , if it seemed to lead to anything ; but , as [I]0-i live , [I]0-i can not see that [you]735-you are a step further advanced than [you]735-you were when [I]0-i spoke to [you]735-you in [the Grosse Garten]737-the grosse garten three weeks ago . Come now , are [you]735-you ? " For a moment [Belinda]134-belinda is silent . Perhaps [she]134-belinda has put that question to [her]134-belinda own heart before now , and been as unable as now to give a satisfactory answer to it . Instead of replying , "[735-you] What a mercy it would be ! " [she]134-belinda says irritably , bringing [her]134-belinda hands sharply together in a wrathful clasp , "[735-you] If [you]735-you could be persuaded to mind [your]735-you own business , and leave [me]0-i to be happy in [my]0-i own way ! " "[735-you] Happy in [your]735-you own way ! " repeats [Sarah]135-sarah , with a shrewd look . "[735-you] Yes ; and when [he]738-he has taken [his]738-he twelve German lessons and gone [home]2345-home to [[his]738-he papa]740-his papa , [the ironmonger — ironmaster]741-the ironmonger — ironmaster — what is [he]738-he ? — how happy [you]735-you will be in [your]735-you own way then , eh ? " The other 's hands unclasp , [her]0-i arms drop limply to [her]0-i sides ; a sudden cold pallor chases the fierce vermilion from [her]0-i cheeks . "[0-i] [I]0-i suppose , " [she]0-i says slowly , "[0-i] that there is a sort of coarse and brutal common sense in what [you]735-you say ; but [I]0-i wonder , " [her]0-i voice breaking a little , "[0-i] that it does not occur to even [you]735-you , that since [I]0-i am [I]0-i , and not [you]735-you — " "[156-granny] [Granny]156-granny and [I]0-i both agree , " interrupts [Sarah]135-sarah , "[0-i] that it is the most tedious courtship [we]742-we ever assisted at . [Granny]156-granny 's idée fixe is that it should be arranged by the first , so that [he]738-he may travel with [us]742-we and look after the luggage : for [my]0-i own part , [I]0-i rather doubt if even after the twelve lessons [he]738-he will be able to take [our]742-we tickets and order [our]742-we baths ; at least , " breaking into a laugh , [I]134-belinda know that [[my]134-belinda Schatz]2712-my schatz was not , though [he]738-he is in correspondence with [half the savants of [Germany]18-germany]2713-half the savants of germany . "[134-belinda] [Belinda]134-belinda has turned again to the window , but , that [her]134-belinda motives may be beyond suspicion , [she]134-belinda is ostentatiously gazing in the opposite direction to that whence [Rivers]162-rivers will come . An occasional writhing , shivering movement of [her]134-belinda shoulders alone betrays what suffering [[her]134-belinda sister]2366-her sister 's ruthless and irrepressible rummaging in [her]134-belinda holy of holies is causing [her]134-belinda . " [We]742-we do not blame [him]738-he , "[135-sarah] continues [Sarah]135-sarah , with a candid air ; " in fairness , [I]135-sarah must say that [we]742-we do not blame [him]738-he . [He]738-he is always trying to pour out [his]738-he poor little tale like water out of a jug ; and [you]2714-you , for reasons best known to [yourself]2714-you , are always corking it back again . Mark [my]135-sarah words , "[135-sarah] emphasizing the sentence with three pats on [Slutty]157-slutty 's chest — [Slutty]157-slutty lying , as usual , reversed and [Cleopatra]187-cleopatra - like upon [her]157-slutty lap — " [you]2714-you will do it once too often ! "[135-sarah] " What shall [I]134-belinda do once too often ? "[134-belinda] cries [poor Belinda]134-belinda in an agonised voice , wheeling suddenly round at bay . " What do [I]134-belinda do ? If [you]2714-you could only explain that to [me]134-belinda ! [I]134-belinda believe , "[134-belinda] beginning to falter , " that [you]2714-you mean well ; [I]134-belinda would — would try to take any hints [you]2714-you could give [me]134-belinda . "[134-belinda] " [I]135-sarah have always told [you]2714-you that [your]2714-you high and mighty airs would be the death of [you]2714-you , "[135-sarah] rejoins [Sarah]135-sarah , not perceptibly conciliated by [[her]135-sarah sister]2366-her sister 's humility . " If [you]2714-you could make them up into a parcel and toss them into [the Elbe]9-the elbe , and perhaps throw in [your]2714-you high nose too , [you]2714-you would be [a better and a happier woman]2715-a better and a happier woman . "[135-sarah] " But [I]134-belinda can not ! "[134-belinda] very regretfully . " [I]135-sarah confess , "[135-sarah] says [Sarah]135-sarah , after a pause , [her]135-sarah eyes speculatively fixed on the two smart shoes extended before [her]135-sarah — shoes whose unnatural altitude of heel , arch of instep , and crowding of lacerated toes proclaim them of the highest fashion—"I confess that [I]135-sarah am a little disappointed that the news of [our]2716-our approaching departure did not bring [him]2714-you to the point . "[135-sarah] " [He]2714-you does not yet know that [we]2716-our are going , "[134-belinda] replies [Belinda]134-belinda murmuringly . " [I]134-belinda have not told [him]2714-you . "[134-belinda] " Have not [you]134-belinda ? "[135-sarah] cries [Sarah]135-sarah , joyfully leaping up and beginning to frolic about on one toe . " Courage ! Then [our]2716-our best card is still unplayed ! "[135-sarah] Suddenly ceasing [her]135-sarah frisking , approaching [[her]135-sarah sister]2366-her sister , and speaking with great eagerness : " [You]2714-you must tell [him]2714-you to - morrow , at [Wesenstein]15-wesenstein . " If it is not brought to a crisis at [Wesenstein]15-wesenstein , "[135-sarah] pursues [Sarah]135-sarah brutally , " [I]135-sarah warn [you]134-belinda that [I]135-sarah shall ask [him]2714-you [his]2714-you intentions . "[135-sarah] [Miss Watson]147-miss watson has at length had [her]147-miss watson will . [The party to [Wesenstein]15-wesenstein]747-the party to wesenstein is [hers]147-miss watson ; not , indeed , as to the defraying of its expenses , about which [she]147-miss watson shows no ill - bred empressement , but in the inviting of [the guests]748-the guests , arranging for [their]748-the guests transport , etc . And as this arranging includes the right to bounce not only into [the sitting - rooms]749-the sitting - rooms , which is a latitude [she]147-miss watson always allows [herself]147-miss watson , but into [the most secret chambers of [the invited guests]751-the invited guests]750-the most secret chambers of the invited guests , [they]748-the guests begin to look with some eagerness towards the end of this period of license . It is true that [Miss Watson]147-miss watson meets with a good many refusals . The older - established among [the English residents]752-the english residents into whose private affairs [her]147-miss watson nose has been thrust throughout the winter months , the details of whose [butchers]753-butchers ' bills , [servants]385-servants ' wages , [discreditable members of [[their]752-the english residents family]756-their family]755-discreditable members of their family , [she]147-miss watson has mastered with grisly accuracy , combine in one deep and unanimous " No . "[147-miss watson] Not less emphatic is [Professor]136-professor forth Forth in [his]136-professor forth negative , based on the plea of ill - health . Nor do the very direct questions addressed to [him]136-professor forth as to the nature and locale of [his]136-professor forth ailments — whether [he]136-professor forth has anything wrong inside [him?—nor]757-him?—nor the confident assurance that it is all fancy , and that what [he]136-professor forth needs is to have [his]136-professor forth liver well shaken up , by any means avail to change [his]136-professor forth decision . But with all these deductions there is still left a considerable residuum of [new- comers , who are at the stage — a very brief and early one]758-new- comers , who are at the stage — a very brief and early one — of thinking [Miss Watson]147-miss watson [an agreeable woman who has seen a great deal of [the world]643-the world , a stage on which [they]761-they will hereafter look back with indignant incredulity]759-an agreeable woman who has seen a great deal of the world , a stage on which they will hereafter look back with indignant incredulity ; of [girls greedy for pleasure , and not fastidious as to the source whence it flows]762-girls greedy for pleasure , and not fastidious as to the source whence it flows ; and of [handsome , solid , German soldiers]763-handsome , solid , german soldiers , ready to follow wherever battle , beer , or [maidens]764-maidens lead . To these is , of course , added [Rivers]162-rivers — [Rivers]162-rivers who hitherto has fled through back doors , has squeezed [himself]162-rivers through attic windows , has bolted round corners , and run like a leveret whenever [his]162-rivers long - sighted eyes have caught the farthest glimpse of a black - and - white plaid gown ! For the last week this same [Rivers]162-rivers has grovelled at the feet of the black plaid , has told [her]147-miss watson as nearly as [he]162-rivers can conjecture the amount of [[his]162-rivers father]2550-his father 's annual commercial gains , [[his]162-rivers sisters]766-his sisters ' probable portions , and whatever else — there is a good deal else — [she]147-miss watson may please to ask [him]162-rivers . For does it not rest with [her]147-miss watson whether , during all the distance that parts [Dresden]2-dresden from . [Wesenstein]15-wesenstein , [he]162-rivers shall sit in glory and bliss in [the same carriage]767-the same carriage with [[his]162-rivers mistress]2533-his mistress , opposite to [her]147-miss watson , so that [her]147-miss watson lightest movement may be felt thrilling all through [him]162-rivers , eye drowned in eye , for ten or twelve delirious miles ? or , parted from [her]147-miss watson , pine and rage in separation , with [some senseless , smirking doll - face for vis - à - vis]769-some senseless , smirking doll - face for vis - à - vis , and only now and again catch distant frenzying glimpses of [[his]162-rivers lady]770-his lady , exposed to the coarse homage of [insolent hussar or fire - eating [Uhlan]188-the uhlan]771-insolent hussar or fire - eating uhlan ? [He]162-rivers has attained [his]162-rivers object , or [he]162-rivers thinks so . The morning has broken in settled summer fairness . [He]162-rivers has slept no wink all night . [He]162-rivers has not broken [his]162-rivers fast . [He]162-rivers is first at the rendezvous . It is in [the Lüttichau Strasse]4-the lüttichau strasse . For how long [he]162-rivers kicks [his]162-rivers heels in [that gloomy thoroughfare [he]162-rivers never knows]772-that gloomy thoroughfare he never knows . [He]162-rivers would tell [you]773-you that many hours passed before — [several other unimportant ciphers having in the meanwhile]774-several other unimportant ciphers having in the meanwhile packed [themselves]774-several other unimportant ciphers having in the meanwhile into [various vehicles]775-various vehicles and set off — [she]770-his lady at length comes stepping down the echoing stone stairs in [her]770-his lady lofty , leisurely grace , clad in one of those lawny , lacy summer gowns , whose apparently inexpensive simplicity [men]2377-men innocently admire , and over the bills for which [fathers]777-fathers and [husbands]778-husbands wag [their]2377-men heads aghast . It is , in fact , [her]770-his lady best gown , far too good for such an excursion , and [its fellow]779-its fellow is being thriftily saved by [Sarah]135-sarah for future worthier [London]10-london occasions . But to [Belinda]134-belinda no occasion could ever seem worthier . [She]770-his lady has taken [her]770-his lady seat , and [his]162-rivers one impulse is to spring in after [her]770-his lady . It is only just in time that [he]162-rivers saves [himself]162-rivers from this fatal error . Seeing that [[her]770-his lady companion]780-her companion , [another young English girl]781-another young english girl , has preceded [her]770-his lady , it follows that unless [the Uhlan who is to make a fourth]782-the uhlan who is to make a fourth precedes [him]162-rivers , the result will be that [he]162-rivers , [the Uhlan]188-the uhlan , and not [Rivers]162-rivers , will sit knee to knee with [Belinda]134-belinda through [the long drive]783-the long drive . As this idea strikes [him]162-rivers , [he]162-rivers takes [his]162-rivers foot off the step again as if it had been made of hot iron , and hastily retreating , eagerly motions the other forward . But [the innocent soldier]784-the innocent soldier , attributing this movement solely to politeness , and in that determined not to be outdone , smilingly waves [him]162-rivers on , to which [Rivers]162-rivers responds by a more desperate backing . But as in any contest of bows and ceremonies and formal civilities [an Englishman]361-an englishman must always go to the wall , the dispute ends in the worsting of [the person to whom alone it is of any consequence to succeed]786-the person to whom alone it is of any consequence to succeed , who sees [himself]162-rivers hopelessly excluded from the post which [he]162-rivers had watched and fasted to obtain ; and who , pale , empty , and miserable , hurls [himself]162-rivers into [his]162-rivers corner over against [the blooming miss , who has seen , understood , and resented [his]162-rivers frantic efforts to avoid [her]787-the blooming miss , who has seen , understood , and resented his frantic efforts to avoid her]787-the blooming miss , who has seen , understood , and resented his frantic efforts to avoid her . [They]788-they are off ; out of [the town]474-the town now ; stretching steadily away across [the flat country]790-the flat country , that is now nothing but one gigantic nosegay . Every look [they]788-they give rests on new flowers . Every mouthful of air [they]788-they draw in is the breath of lilacs . The cherry - snow is indeed gone , melted away as quickly as its cold prototype in thaw . But its crowding successors , the flushed apple - blooms , the horse - chestnuts tardily breaking into pale spires , forbid [them]788-they to remember or deplore it . What mood could be high or sweet enough to match the perfumed summer morning ? Certainly not [Rivers]162-rivers ' . [He]162-rivers has exchanged the stunned silence in which [he]162-rivers passed the two first miles for a wild garrulity . [He]162-rivers talks à tort et à travers . [He]162-rivers says foolish things , the sound of which surprises even [himself]162-rivers . [He]162-rivers insists on buttoning [his]162-rivers miss 's glove : a task which — certainly from no pleasure in the employment — [his]162-rivers trembling fingers are long in accomplishing . In fact , to be exact , [he]162-rivers never accomplishes it at all . For the glove being too small , and the hand plump , [he]162-rivers succeeds at last in giving the latter such a painful nipping pinch , in the effort to effect a union between starting button and distant button - hole — not by any means " a [lover]2718-lover 's pinch that hurts and is desired"—that[792-his cruel cold lady] [its owner]509-its owner angrily withdraws it . From [his]162-rivers garrulity [he]162-rivers sinks back into a feverish dumbness , as apparently causeless as [his]162-rivers former loquacity . How can [[his]162-rivers cruel cold lady]792-his cruel cold lady look so calm and sunshiny under the hideous misadventure that has parted [them]788-they ? How dare [she]792-his cruel cold lady listen , with that sweet , high smile of [hers]792-his cruel cold lady , to [her]792-his cruel cold lady vis - à - vis 's clumsy Teuton compliments ? And what does [he]162-rivers mean by crowding [her]792-his cruel cold lady so ? Surely [he]162-rivers could give [her]792-his cruel cold lady a little more room ! And is [she]792-his cruel cold lady deaf , pray , that [he]162-rivers must approach [his]162-rivers ugly face so close to [hers]792-his cruel cold lady in conversation ? Would not it be well to give [him]162-rivers a hint that these are not the manners to which [English gentle- women]793-english gentle- women are used ? Happily [his]162-rivers madness falls a little short of the execution of this wise project . And meanwhile [the un - conscious Uhlan]794-the un - conscious uhlan , sémillant , pleased with [himself]794-the un - conscious uhlan , with [his]794-the un - conscious uhlan position , with [his]794-the un - conscious uhlan plain clothes — rare luxury in which [the stiff- buckramed German soldier]795-the stiff- buckramed german soldier is permitted to indulge in expeditions of this nature — airs [his]794-the un - conscious uhlan imperfect English , and slips from it continually back into [his]794-the un - conscious uhlan guttural mother - tongue , whither [Rivers]162-rivers , despite the twelve lessons , can not follow [him]794-the un - conscious uhlan , nor ascertain what amorous atrocities [he]794-the un - conscious uhlan may be committing in it . [He]794-the un - conscious uhlan is almost past deriving satisfaction from the perception of how ill - cut the plain clothes are , and of how much less comely poor [Herr von]189-herr von — looks in them than [he]794-the un - conscious uhlan did yesterday in [his]794-the un - conscious uhlan showy uniform . And [Belinda]134-belinda ? At first [her]134-belinda disappointment , though decently hidden , had gone nigh to equalling [his]162-rivers ; but by - and - by the reflection that , once at [Wesenstein]15-wesenstein — two short hours off — nothing but [his]162-rivers own will can keep [him]162-rivers from [her]134-belinda side , makes [her]134-belinda resign [herself]134-belinda peaceably and civilly to the inevitable . [Women]2468-women know how to bide [their]2468-women time better than [men]2377-men do . [They]2468-women would pass but ill and discreditably through life if [they]2468-women did not . By - and - by , being but human and female , [she]134-belinda yields [herself]134-belinda to the influences around [her]134-belinda ; the soft and sugared air , the joy - drunk larks , the juicy grass fields thronged with bold dandelions and [faint ladies'-smocks]798-faint ladies'-smocks . What [lady]799-lady could ever be sweet or fine enough to deserve such a smock ? Past [the rape - fields]800-the rape - fields [they]801-they go — rape so gloriously yellow that it looks like sown sunlight ; past [the pious - looking little German villages — high red roofs gathered at [the church]803-the church 's knees]802-the pious - looking little german villages — high red roofs gathered at the church 's knees ; through [the pleasant freundlich country]804-the pleasant freundlich country , where everything is waxing in lusty length . And yet [she]134-belinda is glad when [Wesenstein]15-wesenstein is reached . Perhaps [she]134-belinda would feel more emotion at arriving than [she]134-belinda does , did [she]134-belinda know the rational and humane intention nourished by [Rivers]162-rivers , and which has kept [him]162-rivers comparatively calm for the last three miles , to knock down [the Uhlan]188-the uhlan upon the first sign of an intention on [his]162-rivers part to help [Miss Churchill]152-miss churchill from [the carriage]2361-the carriage . But , happily for the peace of [the assemblage]806-the assemblage , [the unconscious offender]807-the unconscious offender , attributing to insular brutality [Rivers]162-rivers ' unceremonious shouldering of [him]162-rivers from the carriage - door , yields gracefully a privilege that [he]162-rivers has no particular care to keep , and leaves to the other undisputed possession of [Belinda]134-belinda 's three fingers . [They]808-them are [the last of [the party to arrive]810-the party to arrive]809-the last of the party to arrive , and so have the advantage of finding preliminaries over , and luncheon spread and tempting under the trained linden trees . Above [the lilac - smothered cottages]811-the lilac - smothered cottages , and [the cheerful Gasthof]19-the gasthof , beetles up the old white Schloss out of [the solid rock on which [it]19-the gasthof is built]812-the solid rock on which it is built . Between [the Gasthof]19-the gasthof and [the garden]2455-the garden , where [their]808-them white table - cloth promisingly glimmers , runs [a little river]814-a little river , quickened and discoloured by last night 's rain . [It]814-a little river is spanned by [a homely wooden bridge]815-a homely wooden bridge ; and on this wooden bridge [Sarah]135-sarah is standing , employed in dropping bits of stick — little lilac sprays , anything floatable that comes handy — into the earth - reddened stream on one side , and then rushing headlong over to the other to see [them]808-them come sailing and whirling through . In this mature pastime [she]135-sarah is being helped by [two large hussars]816-two large hussars and [a Gardereiter]817-a gardereiter . [She]135-sarah is in the best of spirits , and has already told [them]808-them all about [the Professor]2365-the professor , and how delighted [she]135-sarah is to be rid of [him]2365-the professor . [The rest of the party]819-the rest of the party are dispersed in summer sauntering about [the bowery village]820-the bowery village , all but [Miss Watson]147-miss watson , who , following that God - given instinct which prompts the mole to delve , the beetle to scavenger , and the swallow to fly , is ravaging every - where , red - faced and ruthless , making , marring , meddling . [She]135-sarah has had a happy and instructive drive with [some quite new - comers]821-some quite new - comers and has succeeded , to [their]821-some quite new - comers dismay and [her]135-sarah own satisfaction , in extracting from [them]821-some quite new - comers that [they]821-some quite new - comers have [a sister in [a lunatic asylum]823-a lunatic asylum]822-a sister in a lunatic asylum . So that it is in high good - humour and content that — the complement of [guests]824-guests being now full — [they]821-some quite new - comers all sit down to [their]821-some quite new - comers homely feast . It is true , that no sooner are [they]821-some quite new - comers seated — seated as [their]821-some quite new - comers own choice or as the lurking inclination of [any two for each other]825-any two for each other prompts — than [[their]821-some quite new - comers hostess]826-their hostess bustles officiously round to dislodge [them]821-some quite new - comers . " [Three men]2719-three men together here , and [two ladies there]2720-two ladies there ! Come — come ! this will never do ; [we]2721-we must manage better than this ! [Mr. Rivers]162-rivers , [I]826-their hostess must beg [you]162-rivers to fly to the rescue : come and part [these two ladies]2722-these two ladies ! "[826-their hostess] In what spirit this request is received may be gathered from the fact that [Rivers]162-rivers has at last attained to the one object and goal of all [his]162-rivers hot vigils and fasting - days . [His]162-rivers wooden chair is drawn up as closely as the legs of both will permit to [Belinda]134-belinda 's , and on [her]134-belinda other hand [he]162-rivers has successfully arranged [an ugly ravenous fledgeling boy]827-an ugly ravenous fledgeling boy , of whom not even [he]162-rivers can be jealous . Though such is the quality of [Miss Watson]147-miss watson 's voice , that nothing short of an utterly broken drum could prevent its finding entrance into any ear , [he]162-rivers adopts the desperate feint of not having heard , not even when [she]147-miss watson repeats [her]147-miss watson order in a sensibly louder key . " Had not [you]162-rivers better try some one else ? "[135-sarah] says [Sarah]135-sarah drily , coming to the rescue ; " it is odd , but [he]162-rivers does not seem to hear ! "[135-sarah] " [I]2396-the other can not have spoken loud enough , "[2396-the other] rejoins [the other]2396-the other with unconscious irony . " [Mr. Rivers]162-rivers ! "[135-sarah] " [You]162-rivers will have to put up with [Herr von Breidenbach]189-herr von ! "[135-sarah] says [Sarah]135-sarah , this third appeal having met with the fate of [its predecessors]829-its predecessors , glancing up at [her]135-sarah spare hussar , who — [no lady having more than two sides]830-no lady having more than two sides , and [[his]162-rivers brother]831-his brother soldiers having been too quick for [him]162-rivers — is hanging lingeringly over [her]147-miss watson chair - back , reluctant altogether to abandon [her]147-miss watson even for beer and [Schinken]190-schinken , and having just overtaken [her]147-miss watson last joke and begun to roar at it . Under these circumstances , neither is [he]162-rivers particularly keen about obeying [Miss Watson]147-miss watson 's command . However , a wily look from [[his]162-rivers maiden]832-his maiden , promissory of far better things after luncheon , sends [him]162-rivers off fairly contented , and the storm is averted . " It is sad for [a young man]2723-a young man , being so deaf , is not it ? "[135-sarah] says [Sarah]135-sarah , with [her]135-sarah innocent air . " Is it in [[his]162-rivers family]685-his family ? "[147-miss watson] asks [Miss Watson]147-miss watson eagerly . " It is in [some families]2725-some families , [you]135-sarah know . In [some families]2725-some families [every member]2727-every member is deaf from childhood . [All the Champneys of [Nether - Stoney]39-nether - stoney]2728-all the champneys of nether - stoney are deaf . [I]147-miss watson must ask [him]162-rivers whether it is in [[his]162-rivers family]685-his family ! "[147-miss watson] And this little squall — after all only the threat , not the reality of one — is the sole break in [the golden halcyon sunshine of what [Rivers]143-rivers]833-the golden halcyon sunshine of what rivers , though [he]143-rivers ate next to nothing — and that next to nothing may have been horse , or hippopotamus , for all [he]143-rivers knew to the contrary — now looks back upon as the most regal banquet of [his]143-rivers life . What banqueting - hall , indeed , painted with goddesses and [fair sea - women]834-fair sea - women , could equal the low linden - roof above [their]835-they heads ? What [hall - hangings]836-hall - hangings could come nigh the soft little red vine - leaves , and the tiny tendrils just beginning to twist their airy fingers round the wooden trellis ? What chamber - music could surpass that of the full brook and the larks ? By - and - by , it is true , both are drowned in the noise of the ever - waxing talk and laughter . [They]835-they are almost all young ; [they]835-they are out on a spree ; [they]835-they have been hungry and now are full ; is it any wonder that it needs but a very little jest to set [them]835-they all off in clamorous mirth ? There is presently [a Babel of tongues]837-a babel of tongues . The end of [Miss Watson]147-miss watson 's story of how [she]147-miss watson sent in [her]147-miss watson card , and finally forced [her]147-miss watson way in , to [the Great Llama of Thibet]41-the great llama of thibet — a tale which [strangers]838-strangers regard as a bad and glaring lie , but which [[her]147-miss watson acquaintances]839-her acquaintances feel to be not only probable , but true — is lost in the general din . [Sarah]135-sarah is in [her]135-sarah glory . [She]135-sarah has been nibbling marrons glacés , and teaching [[her]135-sarah soldiers]840-her soldiers to play bob - cherry with some fine forced fruit contributed by [Rivers]162-rivers , regard - less of the famine price [he]841-he paid for [them]840-her soldiers , to tempt [[his]841-he lady]770-his lady 's palate . Rewarded by the succès fou of this accomplishment , [she]135-sarah proceeds to exhibit several others , not included in the curriculum of an ordinary education ; the most admired among which is that one — not so widely known as its simple ingenuity deserves — of crossing the fore and middle fingers , and slowly passing them down the bridge of the nose , thereby discovering a chasm of great depth , apparently parting the nose into two . Before long there is [not a soul at the table whose fingers are not travelling eagerly]843-not a soul at the table whose fingers are not travelling eagerly down [his]844-his or [her]845-her nose , [some to verify the discovery]846-some to verify the discovery as new , [some to enjoy it as old]847-some to enjoy it as old . [Hussars]191-hussars , [Gardereiters]192-gardereiters , [Uhlans]193-uhlans , combine to cry " Famos ! "[191-hussars] " Kolossal ! "[191-hussars] And when at length chairs are pushed back , and the cherries and [the revel]848-the revel are together ended , [Sarah]135-sarah finds [her]135-sarah court swelled by [the admirers of almost [all the other girls]850-all the other girls]849-the admirers of almost all the other girls , unable to resist the attractions of [a maiden who , to such [Veilchen Augen]194-veilchen augen and [such a figure]852-such a figure]851-a maiden who , to such veilchen augen and such a figure , adds talents of so varied and unusual an order . [They]849-the admirers of almost all the other girls are so occupied in thronging round [her]135-sarah , and [she]135-sarah is so obliging in promising to teach [them]849-the admirers of almost all the other girls , one and all , many more tricks by - and - by , that [Miss Watson]147-miss watson 's bawling command that [they]849-the admirers of almost all the other girls are now all to go over [the Schloss]853-the schloss passes for some time unregarded . In time , however , [she]135-sarah collects them , [the unwilling]854-the unwilling as well as the willing — the former greatly preponderate — and sweeping [them]849-the admirers of almost all the other girls off out of the sunshine and the merry summer air , gives [them]849-the admirers of almost all the other girls into the charge of [a surly , high - flavoured , and grasping - minded Verwalter , who leads [them]849-the admirers of almost all the other girls through an endless enfilade of [bare rooms]856-bare rooms , cold and dank even on this warmly - honeyed May - day , and fleeces [them]849-the admirers of almost all the other girls at the end]855-a surly , high - flavoured , and grasping - minded verwalter , who leads them through an endless enfilade of bare rooms , cold and dank even on this warmly - honeyed may - day , and fleeces them at the end . [Miss watson]857-miss watson 's tyranny , however , [one pair]858-one pair succeeds in evading . By a cautious and judicious loitering until the tail of the plaid gown has been seen safely to whisk round the corner , [they]849-the admirers of almost all the other girls find [themselves]849-the admirers of almost all the other girls free , absolutely at [their]849-the admirers of almost all the other girls own disposition , for as long as [the Verwalter]195-the verwalter 's windy narrative may last , and with all [the Schloss garden for [their]849-the admirers of almost all the other girls own]859-the schloss garden for their own — all its sunshine , all its shelter , all its old - world grace . Sun - petted , defended from each one of [Heaven]153-heaven 's rough winds , [it]860-it lies at the Schloss foot . Around [it]860-it rise [the woody hills]861-the woody hills , [the humble low hills of [a flat country]863-a flat country]862-the humble low hills of a flat country , but now with [their]861-the woody hills humility made proud , with [their]861-the woody hills insignificance rendered significant , by the inexpressible magnificence of spring . Into [the very core of [Belinda]134-belinda 's and [Rivers]162-rivers ' happy hearts]864-the very core of belinda 's and rivers ' happy hearts has the spring spirit passed . Too happy for common speech , [they]849-the admirers of almost all the other girls sit on a time - worn stone bench , with [their]849-the admirers of almost all the other girls young and radiant eyes pasturing on the sweet , still prospect ; [the high and ancient Schloss]865-the high and ancient schloss , clock - towered and red - roofed , soaring out of the plenteous new leafage ; and seen down a vista of thick and venerable hedges , so accurately and squarely clipped that not a leaf projects from the verdurous primness , an old stone Flora , with [her]866-she lap full of garden flowers . On the prospect , [I]0-i say , [their]849-the admirers of almost all the other girls eyes pasture ; but from it [they]849-the admirers of almost all the other girls continually turn to [each other]469-each other 's faces , as being yet lovelier and more joyful . " Try to be a little depressed ! "[849-the admirers of almost all the other girls] Crossing [her]866-she secure bliss , [Sarah]135-sarah 's worldly - wise precept flashes , only to be contemptuously dismissed . What needs [she]866-she any mean ruse to gain [him]868-his ? For the moment , doubt and fear have vanished from [her]866-she heart , cast out and slain by an exultant certainty of joy . How dare [she]866-she , looking in [his]868-his face , have any mean and unworthy misgivings as to [his]868-his being wholly [hers]866-she , body and soul , through all time , and through whatever may follow time ? How could [she]866-she , even if [she]866-she wished it , feign to be low - spirited ? [she]866-she , in comparison with whose high and passionate content even the larks are melancholy and [the river]463-the river dull ? What need have [they]849-the admirers of almost all the other girls for coarse and clumsy words ? But , after all , words , though coarse and clumsy , are the coin in which [human creatures]870-human creatures must pay each other , and failing in which , [they]870-human creatures are often bankrupt for life . It is doubtful whether [Sarah]135-sarah would give much approval to a conversation — if such it can be called — of so highly unpractical a cast — a conversation made up of hot sighs , and torrid looks , and broken syllables of ecstasy ; but in which there is no most distant allusion to either [priest]871-priest or altar . It is broken in upon before it has reached a more articulate stage by the voices of [the Schloss seers , who , [their]872-the schloss seers , who , their task happily accomplished , every cold room and bad daub faithfully seen task happily accomplished , every cold room and bad daub faithfully seen]872-the schloss seers , who , their task happily accomplished , every cold room and bad daub faithfully seen , are now let loose , like [schoolboys]873-schoolboys at noon , upon [the silent garden]874-the silent garden . In a moment there is not [a trim walk]875-a trim walk or finely - gravelled alley that is not alive and noisy with jokes and merriment . [They]872-the schloss seers , who , their task happily accomplished , every cold room and bad daub faithfully seen intercept the view of [the Flora]42-the flora . [They]872-the schloss seers , who , their task happily accomplished , every cold room and bad daub faithfully seen steal the cowslips and little white saxifrage that grow on the sternly - prohibited grass . It is impossible to escape [their]872-the schloss seers , who , their task happily accomplished , every cold room and bad daub faithfully seen laughter and [their]872-the schloss seers , who , their task happily accomplished , every cold room and bad daub faithfully seen eyes . [They]872-the schloss seers , who , their task happily accomplished , every cold room and bad daub faithfully seen are everywhere . More universally pervasive than anyone else , more turbulent , more wildly hilarious are [Sarah]135-sarah and [[her]135-sarah little court]876-her little court . But yet there is a method in [her]135-sarah madness , as [[her]135-sarah sister]2366-her sister has soon occasion to discover ; for , protected by the noise of voices round [her]135-sarah , [she]135-sarah presently draws [Belinda]134-belinda aside , to whisper in the hardest , soberest , common - sense voice , " Has [he]2730-he spoken ? "[135-sarah] [Belinda]134-belinda , thus suddenly dragged down from the empyrean , shrinks wincingly away without answering ; but in vain . " Has [he]2730-he ? "[2396-the other] repeats [the other]2396-the other resolutely , taking hold of [her]135-sarah wrist in detention ; and as a faint un - willing headshake confirms the suspicion [she]135-sarah already nourishes , " More shame for [him]2730-he ! "[135-sarah] [she]135-sarah says quickly ; " try the wood . "[135-sarah] There is no time for more . If [Rivers]162-rivers had over - heard [her]135-sarah — for one dreadful moment the thought flashes across [Belinda]134-belinda , " Is it possible ? [He]162-rivers , too , is precipitated from [the heights]882-the heights . [They]883-they walk stupidly along , side by - side , for a space . Afterwards [they]883-they reflect , in bitter looking back , that [they]883-they must have wasted quite a quarter of an hour of [their]883-they one high holiday . Not more than a quarter , however . That is not long . [It]886-it is only a few paces off , just beyond [the garden]2455-the garden . And yet , near and accessible as it is , [none of [the revellers]889-the revellers]888-none of the revellers have as yet divined it . [It]886-it has , indeed , a too - much - frequented air , of which [the well - beaten pathway]890-the well - beaten pathway tells ; but , for the time , [it]886-it is silent and safe . " So [we]883-they are alone again , "[504-the young man] [he]504-the young man says , drawing a heavy sighing breath . " [My]504-the young man life is now one long manoeuvre to be alone with [you]147-miss watson ; and how seldom [I]504-the young man succeed ! "[504-the young man] [She]147-miss watson laughs nervously . With whom but [himself]504-the young man does it lie to command [her]147-miss watson company while life lasts ? [She]147-miss watson has no longer the heavenly confident certainty that blessed [her]147-miss watson in [the garden]2455-the garden . [She]147-miss watson has changed it for a hot and doubting unrest ; for an avoiding , and yet at the same time for a contradictory craving to meet and answer those madly asking eyes . Has not [he]504-the young man thrown the die , upon which [his]504-the young man universe turns ? But to [her]147-miss watson [his]504-the young man four words have an ambiguous sound that may mean all or nothing . How , then , can [she]147-miss watson answer them ? There is a silence . So hushed and sleeping are all the winds that not even any one of the young leaves above [their]893-their heads rubs , slightly rustling , against another . If those leaves , or the flowers on which [they]893-their lean , or the birds of heaven could but have been interpreters between [him]504-the young man and [her]147-miss watson ! [She]147-miss watson has taken off [her]147-miss watson gloves , the better to pull the fresh grasses near [her]147-miss watson , and [her]147-miss watson right hand now lies palm upwards on [her]147-miss watson knee . For all answer , [his]504-the young man heart - hunger mastering [him]504-the young man , [the poor boy]2450-the poor boy fastens on the hand of which [she]147-miss watson speaks . In all its satin warmth and smoothness , it lies in [his]504-the young man . Will [he]504-the young man ever let [man]2737-man or [devil]2738-devil rob [him]504-the young man of it ? [He]504-the young man would tell [you]895-you "[147-miss watson] No . " So the supreme moment has come , and [she]147-miss watson recognises it . " Often beforehand has [she]135-sarah rehearsed the scene in which [she]135-sarah is to tell [him]504-the young man of [her]135-sarah going . [Imagination]196-imagination has tricked it out in various shapes and colours , but the reality is unlike them all . [He]504-the young man expresses neither regret nor surprise — [he]504-the young man expresses nothing . Where is [his]504-the young man timidity now ? It was only [her]135-sarah displeasure that had ever made [him]504-the young man afraid ; and even [he]504-the young man can see that there is no displeasure here . [She]135-sarah is pale , indeed , but it is with the pallor of conquering passion ; and very still , but it is the stillness of one who , looking up in awful joy , sees the dawn of a superb new world breaking upon [her]135-sarah . "[897-you] Are [you]897-you sorry ? " [she]135-sarah says , with a half- sob . "[897-you] [You]897-you do not tell [me]0-i whether [you]897-you are sorry . " [He]504-the young man is no longer lying at [her]135-sarah feet . [He]504-the young man is kneeling in [his]504-the young man beautiful glad manhood at [her]135-sarah knee . "[897-you] Sorry ! " [he]504-the young man repeats , with a sort of ecstatic scorn . "[897-you] Why should [I]0-i be sorry ? It is only [you]0-i who can ever make [me]0-i sorry again ! " So it has come . For a moment [she]135-sarah closes [her]135-sarah eyes , as [one faint with a bliss whose keenness makes it cross the borderland and become pain]2741-one faint with a bliss whose keenness makes it cross the borderland and become pain , and so is gathered into [his]504-the young man strenuous embrace . [Their]2742-their faces are nearing each other slowly , in the luxury of a passionate delay , to make yet more poignant the pleasure of [their]2742-their supreme meeting at last , when — "[0-i] [Mr. Rivers]162-rivers ! [Mr. Rivers]162-rivers ! " What horrid sound is this that is breaking into and murdering the divine quiet of [the wood]2717-the wood ? that is breaking into and murdering [their]2742-their diviner union ? That sound once silenced , [the wood]2717-the wood will return to its stillness ; but when to [them]2742-their will that moment ever return ? When will that begun embrace be ended ? For one instant [they]2742-their remain paralysed and uncomprehending in [each other]469-each other 's arms ; then , as the voice comes again , the unmistakable brazen voice , from which in less crucial moments [they]2742-their have so often fled in panic aversion , comes nearer and louder , in obviously quick approach to [them]2742-their , [they]2742-their spring apart , and stand dazed and panting in wild - eyed consternation that the cruel work - a - day world has so early thrust itself again upon [them]2742-their , and that [their]2742-their heavenly trance is broken . " "[0-i] [I]0-i always keep [my]0-i parties together ! " replies [Miss Watson]147-miss watson , still smiling . "[0-i] It is so much more sociable ! It spoils [a party]905-a party to break it up . When [I]0-i was in [the Holy Land]43-the holy land , [we]899-we went a picnic to [Bethabara]44-bethabara , [twenty - five of [us]899-we]906-twenty - five of us on donkeys , and [we]899-we all kept together . There will be plenty of time to explore [this wood]907-this wood a little , if [you]908-you feel inclined . Whose wood is it ? [The King]198-the king 's , eh ? Not much in the way of timber ; but then there never is much in the way of timber in [a German wood]909-a german wood . Where does this path lead to — have [you]908-you any idea ? What do [you]908-you say to following this path a little , to see where it leads to ? " [They]899-we have fallen into a stupid silence . " says [Sarah]135-sarah , in a tone of the keenest and most urgent interrogation . It is night , and [they]899-we are at [home]2345-home again . [The two girls]2379-the two girls have been deposited at [[their]2379-the two girls house in [the Lüttichau Strasse]4-the lüttichau strasse]2754-their house in the lüttichau strasse , and are climbing the cold stone stairs to [[their]2379-the two girls apartment]2755-their apartment . "[908-you] Well , [granny]721-granny , " cries [Sarah]135-sarah , marching briskly into [the salon]2683-the salon , blinking a little from the sudden light , taking [the old lady]2704-the old lady 's smooth face in both hands , and giving it a sounding kiss , "[721-granny] here [we]910-two are ! [We]910-two have had a very happy day , and [I]0-i am engaged , more or less , to [three people]912-three people . By - the - bye , [they]912-three people are all going to call to - morrow . " "[0-i] [I]0-i am delighted to hear it , [I]0-i am sure , [[my]0-i dear]2421-my dear , if it amuses [you]2421-my dear , " replies [Mrs. Churchill]185-mrs. churchill , placidly rearranging the dainty tulles and laces that [[her]0-i granddaughter]2705-her granddaughter 's embrace had ruffled ; "[0-i] but [I]0-i think [I]0-i have heard something like it once or twice before . " "[134-belinda] And [Belinda]134-belinda is not engaged at all ! " continues [Sarah]135-sarah indignantly , looking eagerly towards [[her]135-sarah sister]2366-her sister to see whether this direct statement does not call forth any disclaimer . But none comes . "[134-belinda] [You]2421-my dear do not say so ? " rejoins [Mrs. Churchill]185-mrs. churchill , in a tone of civil but tepid interest , stifling a slight yawn . [She]135-sarah does not care much about [Belinda]134-belinda , who does not amuse [her]135-sarah , while [the "[2421-my dear] Daudet]199-the " daudet , " from whose pages [[her]135-sarah grandchildren]2762-her grandchildren 's entrance has roused [her]135-sarah , does . "[2421-my dear] Is it possible , " says [Sarah]135-sarah , advancing with a threatening gesture to [[her]135-sarah sister]2366-her sister — "[134-belinda] do [you]134-belinda dare to look [me]0-i in the face and tell [me]0-i that [you]134-belinda have not brought [him]914-him up to the point after all ? " Still silence , and a look towards the door suggestive of meditated evasion by it . But this move [the other]2396-the other anticipates by placing [herself]2396-the other between [Belinda]134-belinda and all means of exit . "[134-belinda] Did [you]134-belinda take [him]914-him to [the wood]2717-the wood ? " "[134-belinda] Yes . " "[134-belinda] Did [you]134-belinda tell [him]914-him [we]916-our were going ? " "[134-belinda] Yes . " "[134-belinda] And nothing came of it ? " cries [Sarah]135-sarah in a tone of such profound and unfeigned stupefaction that [Belinda]134-belinda , though certainly at this moment not mirthfully minded , breaks into a laugh . "[134-belinda] Bless [my]0-i soul , what stuff can [you]917-you both be made of ? [Granny]156-granny , what stuff can they be made of ? " But [granny]156-granny has gone back , true as the needle to the Pole , to [her]156-granny novel , and declines to take any further part beyond a slight shrug in [[her]156-granny granddaughter]2705-her granddaughter 's affairs . "[156-granny] Well , [you]134-belinda know [our]916-our agreement , " continues [Sarah]135-sarah , beginning to walk up and down in a fervid excitement , that contrasts with [the elder woman]2766-the elder woman 's phlegm ; "[134-belinda] [you]134-belinda know [our]916-our agreement : to - morrow — [you]134-belinda may think [I]0-i am joking , but [I]0-i assure [you]134-belinda that [I]0-i never was more in earnest in [my]0-i life — to - morrow [I]0-i ask [him]918-him [his]918-him intentions .
