" "[1573-the woman] Off [her]1573-the woman head ! " growls [Bellairs]282-bellairs , who finds it not impossible to combine a poignant interest in [Sarah]135-sarah with a servile moth - and - candle - like homage to [the elder and severer beauty]3672-the elder and severer beauty ; "[1573-the woman] so would [you]1571-you be , if [you]1571-you were married to [an old mummy]1575-an old mummy ! " And what was it [Mrs. Forth]271-mrs. forth saw over [Bellairs]282-bellairs ' shoulder ? What is the sight that , now that the temporary call upon [her]271-mrs. forth attention is withdrawn , is riveting into such an agony of search the lovely cold eyes , to which so few things seem worth looking at ? Fortunately for [her]271-mrs. forth , [a new batch of under - graduates]3673-a new batch of under - graduates has hurried up to be presented to [Sarah]135-sarah . Never since the days of [Dresden]2-dresden and [the German army]1059-the german army has [Miss Churchill]152-miss churchill had [her]152-miss churchill hands so full . [Belinda]134-belinda is free to send [her]134-belinda gaze unnoticed round [the hall]3033-the hall , in a silent , breathless , passionate quest . Quest of what ? [She]134-belinda does not ask [herself]134-belinda how much the better off [she]134-belinda will be if [she]134-belinda succeeds in finding the object of that quest . To find it ! to find it ! Come what may of the finding , to find it ! [Most people]2556-most people would feel sure that [she]134-belinda has been deceived by an accidental resemblance to [Rivers]143-rivers in [some stranger]3677-some stranger ; [men of]3678-men of [his]3677-some stranger size , complexion and bearing being , though unhappily in a minority , yet still numerous among [two thousand youths of the English upper classes]3679-two thousand youths of the english upper classes . But [Belinda]134-belinda would laugh to scorn the suggestion that at any distance , or in any glimpse however momentary , [she]134-belinda could have mistaken any other for [him]3677-some stranger . There exists in [her]134-belinda mind no smallest doubt that the face seen in that one lightning - flash , and then instantly hidden by twenty other intervening faces , was [his]3677-some stranger — [his]3677-some stranger or [his]3677-some stranger angle 's ! Perhaps [he]3677-some stranger is dead , and that [he]3677-some stranger has come to tell [her]134-belinda . A mute sob rises in [her]134-belinda throat . Whether in the spirit or the body , [she]134-belinda must find [him]3677-some stranger ! At intervals of every few minutes [she]134-belinda is interrupted in [her]134-belinda search by the greetings and observations of [passing acquaintances]3680-passing acquaintances . [She]134-belinda answers [them]3681-them politely and connectedly , but with a brevity that does not encourage a prolongation of [their]3681-them civilities ; a brevity that will the sooner leave [her]134-belinda free . [The room]422-the room is thinner than [it]422-the room was , or rather [the crowd]3643-the crowd is distributed more evenly over [its]422-the room whole area . Since the suppertables sprang into sight — even loyalty giving the pas to hunger ; the uncertain hope of a bow from [the Duke]1532-the duke , to the sober certainty of lobster - salad — the packing about [H.R.H.]281-h.r.h. is less dense . [The guests]748-the guests are extended along the line of tables . Of [Sarah]135-sarah , indeed , scarcely a vestige is to be seen , so closely is [she]134-belinda hedged in by a wall of [boys]3686-boys . At something [she]134-belinda has just said [they]3681-them all laugh rapturously ; [those who did not hear it]3687-those who did not hear it — so firmly assured already in [her]134-belinda character as [a wit]3688-a wit — as well as [those who did]3689-those who did . [[The signalman]3613-the signalman 's biographer]3691-the signalman 's biographer has descended from [his]3613-the signalman estrade , and is talking as commonplacely to [[his]3613-the signalman hostess]3692-his hostess as if [he]3613-the signalman wotted nothing of parental agonies or points , and as if [the rosy babe]3693-the rosy babe had been sent to bed with the whipping it deserved . Through the slackening of the press it has surely become easier for one seeking to discover [the person]1040-the person sought ; and yet for a while [she]134-belinda seeks in vain . How many heads there are ! heads bald as [Cæsar]242-cæsar 's ; heads thickly clad as [Absolom]285-absolom 's ; heads white , heads brown ; sandy heads , pepper and salt heads , gold heads ; long heads , round heads , knobby heads ! And how they shift and move ! Will [they]3681-them never stay quiet for a moment ? And among [them]3681-them all [he]3613-the signalman is not ! [He]3613-the signalman must have gone — gone without ever conjecturing [her]134-belinda nearness ! Again that mute sob rises chokingly . Why should [he]3613-the signalman not be gone ? Why should [she]134-belinda wish that [he]3613-the signalman were not gone ? Why should [she]134-belinda wish to see [him]3613-the signalman ? What has [she]134-belinda to say to [him]3613-the signalman when [they]3695-they meet ? But [she]134-belinda pushes roughly aside [Reason]286-reason 's cool pleading . Why does [she]134-belinda wish it ? Why — why ? There may be no why , but [she]134-belinda does wish it ; wishes it with such a compelling frenzy of wishing , as seems as if it must produce the fulfilment of that wish . And it does . Its might prevails . Ah — h — h ! For in a moment [she]134-belinda has seen [him]3613-the signalman again . [He]3613-the signalman is nearer now ; so near as to be recognizable past mistake or misgiving , even by eyes less acquainted than [hers]134-belinda with every trick of lip and brow . If [he]3613-the signalman continues to advance in the direction at present taken by [his]3613-the signalman steps , it is impossible but that in one minute or less — in perhaps fifty seconds , perhaps forty — [she]134-belinda will come within the range of [his]3613-the signalman vision . [He]3613-the signalman will be aware of [her]134-belinda as [she]134-belinda is aware of [him]3613-the signalman . "[1575-an old mummy] Are [you]1576-you ready to go [home]2345-home ? " says a voice at [her]134-belinda elbow . [She]134-belinda turns suddenly ; eyes alight , and heart madly bounding , to find [[her]134-belinda husband]3353-her husband at [her]134-belinda elbow . The revulsion is so hideous that speech wholly fails [her]134-belinda . "[1575-an old mummy] [I]0-i should be obliged if [you]1576-you would tell [me]0-i where [I]0-i am likely to find [[your]1576-you sister]3060-your sister , " [he]3613-the signalman continues , taking [her]134-belinda silence for assent , since [she]134-belinda is never very prodigal of [her]134-belinda words to [him]3613-the signalman ; "[1576-you] so that [I]0-i may let [her]3060-your sister know that [we]1579-we are going . " But at that [she]134-belinda finds voice . "[3060-your sister] Going ! " [she]134-belinda says , flashing one look of passionate dissent at [him]3613-the signalman . "[3060-your sister] Why should [we]1579-we go ? Impossible ! " "[0-i] [I]0-i see no impossibility , " [he]3613-the signalman answers captiously ; "[0-i] [we]1579-we have already amply satisfied the claims of civility . The impossibility , as [you]1576-you are perfectly aware , lies in combining such late hours with early rising in the morning . " "[0-i] Then why should [you]0-i rise early ? " answers [she]134-belinda , with tremulous rebellion . "[0-i] It is no use talking — [I]0-i can not come away . [You]1576-you forget [Sarah]135-sarah ; it — it would not be fair upon [Sarah]135-sarah ; [I]0-i have neither the wish nor the right to spoil [her]135-sarah enjoyment . " "[0-i] [I]0-i should imagine that nothing would be easier than to find [a chaperon in whose charge to leave [her]3060-your sister]1580-a chaperon in whose charge to leave her , " rejoins [he]3613-the signalman persistently ; "[1576-you] if indeed , " with a slightly venomous look in the direction of [[his]3613-the signalman sister - in - law]3697-his sister - in - law , "[3060-your sister] [she]3060-your sister considers one necessary . " But [Belinda]134-belinda only observes a silence which [he]3613-the signalman divines to be mutinous . [He]3613-the signalman is accustomed in [her]3060-your sister to sullen compliance , uncheerful acquiescence , loth obedience ; but to open revolt [he]3613-the signalman is not accustomed , and , on the spur of the moment , and in so public a place , [he]3613-the signalman is not prepared to deal with it . "[3060-your sister] Since [you]3060-your sister manifest such an avidity in the pursuit of pleasure , " [he]3613-the signalman says resentfully , "[0-i] [I]0-i will indulge [you]3060-your sister with another half - hour , at the end of which time [I]0-i must beg that [you]3060-your sister and [[your]3060-your sister sister]3060-your sister will be prepared to accompany [me]0-i without further remonstrance . " [He]3613-the signalman does not await the answer , which perhaps [he]3613-the signalman knows [he]3613-the signalman would not receive ; but turns on [his]3613-the signalman heel and leaves [her]3060-your sister — leaves [her]3060-your sister free to pursue that feverish search which [his]3613-the signalman coming had so rudely interrupted . It is some moments before [she]3060-your sister again finds the object of that search ; moments long enough for [her]3060-your sister to tell [herself]3060-your sister in heart bitterness that [she]3060-your sister has pushed against [her]3060-your sister fate in vain . But then , all in a moment , [she]3060-your sister has found [him]3613-the signalman again . [He]3613-the signalman is further off , indeed , than [he]3613-the signalman was : [some trifle]3698-some trifle must have diverted [his]3613-the signalman steps from the direction then pursued by [them]3698-some trifle ; and [he]3613-the signalman is still , in [his]3613-the signalman unconsciousness , slowly widening the distance between [them]3698-some trifle . Is it possible that [he]3613-the signalman is tending towards the door ? that [she]3060-your sister , unable by word or sign to arrest [him]3613-the signalman , will see [him]3613-the signalman go ? Oh , but life is a hard thing ! Knowing as [she]3060-your sister does that at one lightest cry from [her]3060-your sister [he]3613-the signalman would turn ; to be no more able to utter that cry than if a real material gag were choking [her]3060-your sister utterances ! Can it be , then , that [her]3060-your sister soul 's cry has reached [his]3613-the signalman soul 's ears ? for [he]3613-the signalman does turn suddenly and smiling . Has [he]3613-the signalman seen [her]3060-your sister , that [he]3613-the signalman smiles ? Ah no ! Would [he]3613-the signalman indeed smile if [he]3613-the signalman saw [her]3060-your sister ? [She]3060-your sister has not given [him]3613-the signalman much cause to smile at the sight of [her]3060-your sister . Well , [he]3613-the signalman is wise . [He]3613-the signalman has again averted [his]3613-the signalman look . And the half - hour , the inexorable half - hour is passing ! How much of it has already gone ? Ten minutes , at least , must by this time have passed . There are only twenty minutes for hope to work upon . Twenty minutes!—and then the close fly , the Early English Villa , Professor Forth , and the Fragments of [Menander]287-menander ! To the end of time [Professor Forth]136-professor forth , and the Fragments of [Menander]287-menander ! Again [her]3060-your sister thoughts are broken in upon by a voice — [Sarah]135-sarah 's this time ; [Sarah]135-sarah having shaken [herself]135-sarah free of [her]135-sarah disciples ; [Sarah]135-sarah with a solicitous look and an anxious eye . "[0-i] [I]0-i think it best to tell [you]1582-he , " [she]0-i says hurriedly , and narrowly watching the effect of [her]0-i words upon [[her]0-i sister]2366-her sister 's face ; "[0-i] [I]0-i was afraid lest [you]1582-he might hear it suddenly from [some one else]473-some one else — [some stranger]3677-some stranger . [I]0-i suppose [you]1582-he have not seen [him]3677-some stranger yet , but [he]3677-some stranger is here ! " "[3677-some stranger] [I]0-i know it , " answers [Belinda]134-belinda shortly , and very low . "[1582-he] [You]1582-he — [you]1582-he are not going to faint ? " "[1582-he] Faint ! why should [I]0-i faint ? " with an accent of intense impatience , [her]0-i eyes still riveted on [the now again approaching figure]3700-the now again approaching figure ; "[1582-he] do [I]0-i ever faint ? " "[1582-he] Would [you]1582-he like to go [home]2345-home ? " "[1582-he] Go [home]2345-home ! " echoes [Belinda]134-belinda , in an accent of fierce desperation ; "[1587-you] why do [you]1587-you all sing the same song ? why are [you]1587-you all determined that [I]0-i must go [home]2345-home ? " "[1587-you] [I]0-i thought [you]1582-he would wish it , " replies [Sarah]135-sarah anxiously . "[1582-he] [I]0-i should if [I]0-i were in [[your]1582-he place]1589-your place . Do not [you]1582-he think it would be better ? " But [she]0-i speaks to deaf ears . [Her]0-i eyes , still fastened on [[her]0-i sister]2366-her sister 's face , see that face 's lilies suddenly dyed with a most happy and loveliest flush . The sun has risen : [he]1582-he has touched the sunless snow on the [Jungfrau]288-jungfrau 's crest , and all [the world]643-the world is rosy red . So then [he]1582-he has seen [her]2366-her sister ! There is now no longer any fear of [his]1582-he departing unintentionally ignorant of [[her]2366-her sister neighbourhood]3703-her neighbourhood . There is indeed time for one short pang of alarm lest [he]1582-he should do what in [her]2366-her sister heart [she]2366-her sister knows if [he]1582-he were wise [he]1582-he would do — and who knows how much of wisdom these two years may have lent [him?—turn]3704-him?—turn away , and knowingly avoid [her]2366-her sister ! But apparently [he]1582-he is not wise . In a moment [he]1582-he has pierced [the small portion of crowd that still separates [them]3706-they]3705-the small portion of crowd that still separates them ; pierced it with a goodwill that would not have disgraced [Miss Watson]147-miss watson . [She]2366-her sister has one instant of such blissful anticipation — only a thousandfold intensified — as used to be [hers]2366-her sister in [the Lüttichau Strasse]4-the lüttichau strasse , at the sound of [Tommy]163-tommy 's childish foot pattering up the stone stairs , and [her]2366-her sister love 's firm and eager tread behind it . The next moment [they]3706-they have met . [Their]3706-they unfamiliar right hands lie in [one another]657-one another ; and [they]3706-they say — nothing . Of what use to have mesmerized [him]1582-he hither by [her]2366-her sister eyes , and the insanity of [her]2366-her sister voiceless prayers , if [she]2366-her sister have nothing to say to [him]1582-he now that [he]1582-he has come ? But happily , though [she]2366-her sister and [he]1582-he are speecheless , [Sarah]135-sarah is not . "[1582-he] So it is [you]1590-you , is it ? " [she]2366-her sister says in a dry voice . "[1590-you] Now what eccentric wind has blown [you]1590-you here ? " [He]1582-he does not answer at once . Evidently , as of old , [he]1582-he has forgotten [her]2366-her sister presence . "[0-i] [I]0-i see that [you]1590-you still have [your]1590-you old trick of not answering [me]0-i , " pursues [she]2366-her sister , running quickly on with a fightiness that conceals a good deal of real nervousness ; "[1590-you] but never mind : there ' are places where [I]0-i also am admired , ' as [Goldsmith]289-goldsmith said . [Belinda]134-belinda , do [you]134-belinda know that [twenty - five young gentlemen of different colleges]1591-twenty - five young gentlemen of different colleges are going to be so good as to call upon [you]134-belinda between the hours of three and seven to - morrow ? " [Belinda]134-belinda is struggling to rouse [herself]134-belinda out of [her]134-belinda intoxication ; already so far unintoxicated as to know that it is intoxication . "[1591-twenty - five young gentlemen of different colleges] Are [they]1591-twenty - five young gentlemen of different colleges ? " [she]134-belinda says , with a weakly laugh ; "[1591-twenty - five young gentlemen of different colleges] [I]0-i am sure that [I]0-i am very much obliged to [them]1591-twenty - five young gentlemen of different colleges . " "[0-i] And meanwhile what has brought [you]1590-you [here]2351-here ? " asks [Sarah]135-sarah persistently , carrying on [her]135-sarah determined talk as a shield to [[her]135-sarah sister]2366-her sister 's emotion . [Her]135-sarah speech has the effect of making [Rivers]143-rivers , too , put down the wine - cup ; of bringing [him]1590-you also back to the bald , sober , morning prose of life . "[0-i] [I]0-i have come to take [my]0-i degree , " [he]1590-you answers ; "[0-i] [I]0-i have been prevented by — by circumstances from taking it before . " So now [she]135-sarah has heard [his]1590-you voice ! To have touched [his]1590-you hand ; to have met [his]1590-you eye ; to have heard [his]1590-you speech ! Is not this to have had [her]135-sarah wish ? Surely now [she]135-sarah is content . Surely now [she]135-sarah will go [home]2345-home at ease and satisfied . But who was ever satisfied with one wish ? What wish ever died barren , without engendering a hundred more ? "[0-i] The half - hour is expired ! " says a voice . [The Dresden quartette]3710-the dresden quartette is complete . Perhaps it is this thought that , rushing simultaneously into three out of the four minds , strikes [them]3711-them momentarily mute . [Sarah]135-sarah is , of course , the first to recover [herself]135-sarah . "[0-i] What a mysterious utterance ! " [she]135-sarah says , with rather a forced gaiety ; "[209-mr. forth] what half - hour ? any particular half - hour ? [You]0-i remember [Mr. Rivers]162-rivers , do not [you]0-i ? [Mr. Rivers]162-rivers , [you]0-i know [Mr. Forth]209-mr. forth , [my]0-i — [[my]0-i brother - in - law]515-my brother - in - law ? " There is a slight unintentional hesitation before pronouncing , and a perhaps intentional slight stress in pronouncing , the last word . [Rivers]162-rivers has stepped back a pace or two , isolating [himself]162-rivers from [the augmented group]3712-the augmented group ; but at this summons [he]162-rivers again advances , and , except by the two signs of a sheet - white face and set teeth , is not to be distinguished from [any other well - mannered young man making a bow]3713-any other well - mannered young man making a bow . But [the Professor]2365-the professor would be slow indeed to mark the hue of [any undergraduate]3715-any undergraduate 's , or [ex - undergraduate]3716-ex - undergraduate 's face , or to note whether [his]2365-the professor mouth were open or shut . "[209-mr. forth] The fly is waiting , " [he]2365-the professor says , returning [Rivers]162-rivers 's salutation with cursory indifference . "[134-belinda] [Belinda]134-belinda , [I]0-i must beg [you]134-belinda to accompany [me]0-i at once , and not keep it waiting . " As [he]2365-the professor speaks , [he]2365-the professor looks at [[his]2365-the professor wife]713-his wife , as one expecting and braced for fresh rebellion . But [he]2365-the professor meets with none . "[134-belinda] Come along ! " cries [Sarah]135-sarah with alacrity ; "[134-belinda] [we]1594-we are quite ready , are not [we]1594-we , [Belinda]134-belinda ? Enough is as good as a feast ; and [we]1594-we have supped full of pleasure . Good - bye ! " nodding with cool friendliness over [her]135-sarah shoulder , and taking [[her]135-sarah sister]2366-her sister 's hand . [Belinda]134-belinda offers no resistance ; flaccidly [she]134-belinda complies , and without one look at [Rivers]162-rivers , with only a faint bend of [her]134-belinda head in [his]2365-the professor direction , begins to follow [the Professor of Etruscan]3719-the professor of etruscan out of [the room]422-the room . [Rivers]162-rivers stands stupidly looking after [them]1594-we . The tart imperativeness of [[her]134-belinda husband]3353-her husband 's tone ; [his]2365-the professor employment of [her]134-belinda Christian name ; [her]134-belinda own dull docility — which of these is it that makes [him]2365-the professor feel as if [some one]2370-some one had given [him]2365-the professor a great blow over the head with a club ? Presently [he]2365-the professor begins , mechanically and purposelessly , to follow [them]1594-we . [The crowd]3643-the crowd is thick at the entrance and on the stone stairs — [the departing crowd]3724-the departing crowd . [The quadrangle]3725-the quadrangle is full of [vehicles]3726-vehicles . [Footmen]3727-footmen are few in [Oxbridge]5-oxbridge ; but such as there are , are shouting [[their]3727-footmen mistresses]3728-their mistresses ' carriages : [the humbler multitude]3729-the humbler multitude are pushing , asking , struggling for [their]3729-the humbler multitude flies . [Lucky ones]3730-lucky ones are finding [them]1594-we and driving off : [unlucky ones]3731-unlucky ones are vainly striving to identify horse or [driver]3732-driver . Among [the latter]2394-the latter are [the Forths]275-the forths . In coming out , [they]1594-we have been parted by [the press]3734-the press — that is to say , [the sisters]2636-the sisters have lost [each other]469-each other — [the younger]3737-the younger loitering in injudicious dalliance with [some of [[her]3737-the younger new sweethearts]3739-her new sweethearts]3738-some of her new sweethearts ; [the elder]3740-the elder plodding on in dull and woolly oblivion of all but the iron necessity of following that cap and gown ahead of [her]3737-the younger . It is not till the elusive fly is at length found — till [her]3737-the younger foot is on the step , and [Professor Forth]136-professor forth is sharply urging [her]3737-the younger in by the elbow from behind , that [she]3737-the younger becomes aware of having mislaid [[her]3737-the younger junior]2401-her junior . "[134-belinda] Get in — get in ! " cries [he]136-professor forth crossly ; "[134-belinda] what are [you]1595-you waiting for ? " "[1595-you] But [Sarah]135-sarah ! " [she]3737-the younger says , awaking from [her]3737-the younger unconsciousness and looking hastily round ; "[134-belinda] what has become of [Sarah]135-sarah ? [we]1596-we can not go without [Sarah]135-sarah ! " [He]136-professor forth makes an irritated gesture . "[135-sarah] No doubt [she]135-sarah has joined [some other party]1597-some other party ; no doubt [she]135-sarah will do very well : at all events , in this confusion it is impossible to attempt to find [her]135-sarah ! " "[135-sarah] It is much more impossible to go without [her]135-sarah ! " replies [she]3737-the younger firmly , withdrawing [her]3737-the younger foot from the step ; "[135-sarah] [I]0-i wonder that [you]1598-you should propose such a thing ! " "[1598-you] [She]135-sarah is perfectly well able to take care of [herself]135-sarah ! " retorts [he]136-professor forth , recurring to [his]136-professor forth old and spiteful formula ; "[1598-you] [she]135-sarah will find [her]135-sarah own way [home]2345-home ! " "[135-sarah] Then [I]0-i will find [[my]0-i own way [home]2345-home]1600-my own way home , too ! " answers [she]3737-the younger indignantly , and resolutely turning [her]3737-the younger back upon [him]136-professor forth and the open fly - door . [She]3737-the younger is too indignant even to deign to observe whether [he]136-professor forth takes [her]3737-the younger at [her]3737-the younger word . [The crowd]3643-the crowd is still issuing , issuing ; crossing [the moonlit square]3743-the moonlit square on foot ; nodding good - night out of carriage windows ; away [they]3643-the crowd go ! [She]3737-the younger retraces [her]3737-the younger steps to the stair - foot . It is not pleasant work pushing against a human tide ; and so [she]3737-the younger finds . It is bewildering to be staring into every face ; peering under all the hoods and mufflers . And among [all the faces , under all the hoods and mufflers]3744-all the faces , under all the hoods and mufflers , is no [Sarah]135-sarah to be found . It is obvious that [the Professor]2365-the professor is right . [She]3737-the younger has found [her]3737-the younger own way [home]2345-home . [The company]1194-the company is melting away so rapidly that , unless [she]3737-the younger wishes to be shut into [the college]3748-the college for the night , [she]3737-the younger must needs follow [her]3737-the younger example . Well ! there is no great hardship in that ! [She]3737-the younger is in the mood when the abnormal , the unusal , seems more tolerable to [her]3737-the younger than the accustomed , the everyday . Half an hour of solitude and midnight ! Half an hour in which to be [Belinda]134-belinda only — not [Belinda Forth]134-belinda at all ! Half an hour in which to reckon with this night and its work ! [She]3737-the younger has already made half a dozen steps along the stone flags of [the quadrangle]3725-the quadrangle , when [some one]2370-some one comes up behind [her]3737-the younger . Had [she]3737-the younger known that [he]2370-some one would come up behind [her]3737-the younger , that [she]3737-the younger makes no sign of surprise , nor any pause in [her]3737-the younger walk ? "[1602-her] [You]1602-her are alone ? " [he]2370-some one says with agitation . "[1602-her] It seems so , " [she]3737-the younger answers . It is the same dry voice with which [she]3737-the younger had so often galled and chilled [him]2370-some one at [Dresden]2-dresden . "[1602-her] [You]1602-her have lost [your]1602-her — [[your]1602-her party]1603-your party ? " "[0-i] [I]0-i have lost [Sarah]135-sarah . " "[1602-her] And [your]1602-her — and [Professor Forth]1604-professor forth ? " "[1604-professor forth] [He]1604-professor forth could not wait , and [I]0-i could not go without [Sarah]135-sarah . " "[1604-professor forth] And [he]1604-professor forth has left [you]1602-her behind — alone ? " [She]1602-her is silent , still speeding along in the moonlight . "[1604-professor forth] And how do [you]1602-her propose to get [home]2345-home ? " [he]1604-professor forth asks , keeping up with and determinately addressing [her]1602-her . "[1602-her] [I]0-i am getting [home]2345-home as fast as [I]0-i can . " "[0-i] [You]1602-her mean to walk ? " "[1602-her] It looks like it . " [Her]1602-her tone is brusque and dogged ; but if [she]1602-her hopes by its means to rid [herself]1602-her of [[her]1602-her companion]780-her companion [she]1602-her is mistaken . "[1602-her] In evening dress ? " "[1602-her] Pooh ! " [she]1602-her says , with a hard laugh ; "[1608-nous autres] [we]1607-we are not so fastidious here , [nous autres]1608-nous autres ; [I]0-i walk out to dinner every night of [my]0-i life ! " "[0-i] But not alone ? " [Her]1602-her face darkens . "[0-i] No , not alone . " [They]1607-we have reached the gateway and [[Wren]290-wren 's domey tower]3752-wren 's domey tower . [She]1602-her has stopped in [her]1602-her resolute walk ; but in the stopping there is as much resolution as there was in the hurrying . "[0-i] Here [we]1607-we part , " [she]1602-her says shortly ; "[0-i] good - night ! " "[1602-her] [You]1602-her must allow [me]0-i to see [you]1602-her [home]2345-home , " [he]1602-her answers firmly . "[1602-her] [I]0-i have already told [you]0-i that it is absolutely unnecessary , " retorts [she]1602-her roughly . There is an instant 's interval before [his]1602-her rejoinder . [They]1607-we are putting out the lights in [the hall]3033-the hall ; [the great building]3754-the great building is greedily devouring half the moonlight in [the quad]3755-the quad , with [its]3754-the great building raven shadow . [It]3754-the great building has embraced the fountain in the middle . [It]3754-the great building is not much of a fountain , but how pleasantly its little voice pierces through the noise of rolling wheels and human shoutings . For how many centuries could [she]1602-her gladly stand here listening to it ! "[0-i] [You]0-i must allow [me]0-i ! " with perfect respect , but obstinately . "[0-i] [I]0-i must not ! " Is the night - wind heady , like wine ? [Her]1602-her tone changes to one that is almost entreaty . "[0-i] [I]0-i had rather [you]0-i did not ; [I]0-i ask [you]0-i not ! " [Her]1602-her incivilities had left [him]1602-her iron ; to [her]1602-her pleading [he]1602-her is as wax . "[0-i] It shall be as [you]0-i wish , " [he]1602-her says , gravely bowing . There is nothing now to detain [her]1602-her , and yet [she]1602-her lingers an instant , as though expecting [him]1602-her to say something more . But [he]1602-her adds nothing . [She]1602-her turns out of the gateway and into [the street]458-the street , and walks fast and steadily up [it]458-the street . There are [not many towns through which it would be judicious for [a young and solitary woman]3758-a young and solitary woman to take [her]1602-her way]3757-not many towns through which it would be judicious for a young and solitary woman to take her way , bare - headed and in flimsy ball - gown , at midnight ; but about [Oxbridge]5-oxbridge , [Una]291-una , without [her]291-una lion , might have strayed unassailed from sunset to sunrise . Involuntarily [she]1602-her slackens [her]1602-her speed a little , from the almost run with which [she]1602-her had begun [her]1602-her course , though still keeping at a moderately rapid walk . What cause is there for hurry ? There is nothing now to hasten from ; and [Heaven]153-heaven knows there is nothing to hasten to ! [She]1602-her did well to be peremptory ; but , after all , [he]1602-her was not very much in earnest ; [he]1602-her did not press the point . It is much better that it should be so ; but still , as a mere matter - of - fact , [he]1602-her did not . [She]1602-her looks up at the sky , which is spreading out the jewels it has kept hidden through the staring day , spreading them out for "[0-i] [The fair city with [her]1610-the fair city with her dreaming spires dreaming spires]1610-the fair city with her dreaming spires , " to look up at and admire ; all its bright belts and bears ; [its gods]3759-its gods and [goddesses]3760-goddesses . Then [she]1602-her looks suddenly round . There are still [a good many people]3761-a good many people about , but [no undergraduates]3762-no undergraduates ; for [the University mother]3763-the university mother has gathered [her]3763-the university mother curled darlings to [her]3763-the university mother bosom for the night . [The man]3764-the man , then , who is keeping pace with [her]1602-her , footstep for footstep , twenty yards behind , is [no undergraduate]3765-no undergraduate . [She]1602-her redoubles [her]1602-her speed again . Pooh ! [his]1602-her presence has no reference to [her]1602-her . [He]1602-her is only taking [the natural road]3766-the natural road to [[his]1602-her hotel]3767-his hotel . But [she]1602-her does not look round again until [the more bustling streets]3768-the more bustling streets lie behind [her]1602-her ; until [she]1602-her has reached [the broad still thoroughfare where a range of grey colleges and a row of sentinel elms hold quiet converse with the stars]3769-the broad still thoroughfare where a range of grey colleges and a row of sentinel elms hold quiet converse with the stars . Then , as if the muscles of [her]1602-her neck had been moved by [some one else]473-some one else , [she]1602-her not consenting , once again [she]1602-her turns [her]1602-her head . [The hotels]3771-the hotels are long passed . If [he]1602-her is still following , it is [she]1602-her whom [he]1602-her is following . And lo ! twenty yards behind [her]1602-her , there [he]1602-her is , stepping through the moonlight ! [She]1602-her gives a low , excited laugh . Well , [they]3772-their have both had [their]3772-their will then : [he]1602-her has not walked [home]2345-home with [her]1602-her ; [she]1602-her has not walked [home]2345-home alone . It is a compromise . Again [she]1602-her looks up to the heavens . What [a lovely , lovely vault]3775-a lovely , lovely vault ! What seed - pearl of constellations ! What great planet - diamonds ! The clocks have just beun to strike midnight ; [the city]2752-the city 's innumerous clocks , [cathedral]3777-cathedral , [college]3778-college , [church]613-church ; the booming bell , the sharp strike , the melodious chime ! How nobly [their]3772-their loud wedded harmony floods the night ! And is there [one of [the gardens]3781-the gardens]3780-one of the gardens — [she]1602-her has reached [the suburb of [villas and gardens]3783-villas and gardens]3782-the suburb of villas and gardens by this time — that has not contributed the breath of [its]3780-one of the gardens gillyflowers to make the boon air so sweet ? [She]1602-her walks on with [her]1602-her strong elastic tread . After all , it is good to be young : to have a fine ear for sound ; a nostril sensitive to fragrance ; and — the consciousness that behind [you]3784-you there is one protecting [you]3784-you where there is nothing to be protected from — guarding [you]3784-you where there is nothing to be guarded against . [She]1602-her has reached [her]1602-her own gate , and at [it]3785-it halts , [her]1602-her hand upon the latch . Here surely , under the ægis of [her]1602-her own roof - tree — here , where that twinkling night - light shows the exact spot where [[her]1602-her husband]3353-her husband is addressing [himself]3353-her husband to [his]3353-her husband slumbers — [she]1602-her may abate a little of [her]1602-her rigidity . Seeing [her]1602-her arrived , [he]1611-he too has halted ; nor is it until by a faint motion of [her]1602-her hand [she]1602-her gives [him]1611-he leave to approach , that [he]1611-he ventures to draw near [her]1602-her . "[0-i] Thank [you]1611-he ! " [she]1602-her says with a smile , to which it is perhaps the moonlight that lends its quivering uncertainty ; "[1611-he] but it was not necessary . " [He]1611-he neither disclaims nor accepts [her]1602-her acknowledgments . Gravely [he]1611-he unfastens the iron gate for [her]1602-her ; while above [his]1611-he gold head the laburnum droops [her]1602-her gold curls . The moon has taken their colour out of both , and substituted [her]1602-her own . Is [he]1611-he then still going to say nothing ? But as [she]1602-her passes through , [he]1611-he speaks : "[0-i] [I]0-i — [I]0-i — am not leaving [Oxbridge]5-oxbridge to - morrow . [I]0-i shall be in [Oxbridge]5-oxbridge all to - morrow . " "[0-i] Shall [you]0-i ? " [she]1602-her says faintly . "[0-i] [I]0-i have not done anything to forfeit [your]0-i friendship , have [I]0-i ? " [he]1611-he asks , while in the moonlight [she]1602-her sees [his]1611-he right hand tighten its nervous clasp on one of the spiked iron uprights of the gate . [She]1602-her is quite silent . "[0-i] Have [I]0-i ? " [he]1611-he repeats , in a tone as of one who , though patient , will not go without [his]1611-he answer . ( Is truth always the best to be spoken ? Then let it be spoken ! ) "[0-i] Nothing ! " "[0-i] Is there then any reason why [I]0-i should not come and see [you]0-i to - morrow ? " Silence again ; [her]1602-her look wandering undecidedly over [her]1602-her flower - bed . "[0-i] Is there ? " [Her]1602-her eye has caught [the Professor]2365-the professor 's night - light again — that ill - favoured Jack - o'-Lantern that is to dance for ever across the morass of [her]1602-her life . "[0-i] None ! " [she]1602-her answers firmly ; and with that firm "[0-i] None ! " [she]1602-her leaves [him]1611-he . "[1612-he] [He]1612-he was not far wrong , " says [Sarah]135-sarah dispassionately , "[1612-he] though [I]0-i am afraid that it was scarcely in a brotherly spirit that [he]1612-he said it ; [I]0-i am eminently well able to take care of [myself]0-i ! " It is next morning , and [the girls]2500-the girls are beginning the day with a preliminary saunter round the narrow bounds of [the little garden]3789-the little garden , and the newly - mown tennis - ground . [They]3790-they are very small bounds , but within [them]3790-they is room for undried dew ; for a blackbird with a voice a hundred times bigger than its body ; for a guelder rose , a fine broom - bush , and a short - lived lilac . What more would [you]3791-you have ? Beneath one Turkey - red sunshade [they]2500-the girls stroll in slow contentment along . "[0-i] [I]0-i have no foolish false pride , " continues [Sarah]135-sarah complacently . "[0-i] When [I]0-i realized that [I]0-i was left behind , [I]0-i saw that the only thing to be done was to make [some one]2370-some one give [me]0-i a lift [home]2345-home . [They]2370-some one did not much like it at first , but [they]2370-some one were very glad afterwards , when [they]2370-some one found that [they]2370-some one had ' entertained [an angel unawares]1615-an angel unawares ! ' " "[2370-some one] And how did [they]2370-some one find out that [they]2370-some one had ? " asks [Belinda]134-belinda drily . " [Belinda]134-belinda joins in the laugh ; nor is there any evidence of [her]134-belinda mirth being less spontaneous and bubbling than [[her]134-belinda sister]2366-her sister 's . Ahead of [them]2370-some one the little dogs are frisking . At least , to speak more correctly , [Punch]186-punch is . What little frisk time and fat have left to [Slutty]157-slutty has been stamped out of [her]134-belinda by mortification at [Punch]186-punch 's reappearance on the scene . When [you]0-i are no longer in [your]0-i first youth , there is really not much amusement in having one of [your]0-i hind - legs continually pulled , mouthed , and facetiously worried from behind . "[0-i] And [you]0-i , " says [Sarah]135-sarah , standing on tip - toe to reach a lilac bough , and rub [her]135-sarah face luxuriously against it ; "[0-i] how did [you]0-i get [home]2345-home ? " A red sunshade always diffuses a glow over the face beneath it . "[0-i] Oh , [I]0-i walked , " with an assumption of inattention . "[0-i] Alone ? " There is a second 's hesitation before the answer comes . [Belinda]134-belinda is naturally veracious ; but , after all , there is nothing incompatible with literal veracity in answering : "[0-i] Yes , alone . " "[0-i] Were not [you]0-i frightened ? " asks [Sarah]135-sarah . "[0-i] Frightened ! Why should [I]0-i be frightened ? What was there to be frightened at ? " But to this heated inquiry [Sarah]135-sarah makes no answer ; a reticence which causes a feverish misgiving to dart across [Belinda]134-belinda 's mind . But no ! [[[her]135-sarah sister]2366-her sister 's room]3797-her sister 's room looks towards the back . [Sarah]135-sarah has an eye like a greyhound , an ear like a stag , and a nose like a truffle dog , but even [she]135-sarah can not see and hear through deal boards . " There is such a strong tincture of cheerfulness in the tone with which [she]0-i speaks , it differs so widely from the dogged submission of yesterday , that [Sarah]135-sarah eyes [her]0-i suspiciously . "[0-i] [You]0-i take a rosy view of life this morning , " [she]0-i says , with a streak of sarcasm . [Belinda]134-belinda changes colour . "[0-i] It is a matter of weather , " [she]0-i says quickly . "[0-i] [I]0-i am very much influenced by weather ; [you]0-i know that [you]0-i always used to say that [I]0-i was [a Weatherglass]1618-a weatherglass ! " But is it a matter of weather ? Is it the weather that sends [her]0-i humming with irresistible gaiety to [her]0-i desk and [Menander]287-menander ? Spring - time , it is true , is exhilarating ; morning is exhilarating ; life 's morning is exhilarating : why , then , should [she]0-i not be exhilarated ? But is it of these three innocent stimulants only that [she]0-i is drinking ? There must be something different from [her]0-i wo nt in the very quality of [her]0-i step as [she]0-i enters [[[her]0-i husband]3353-her husband 's study]3801-her husband 's study , for [he]3353-her husband looks up . "[0-i] [You]0-i are late , " [he]3353-her husband says briefly . "[0-i] Only three minutes , " [she]0-i answers pleasantly ; "[0-i] and [I]0-i will make it up at the other end . " [She]0-i seats [herself]0-i at [her]0-i escritoire , forcibly and with difficulty swallowing down the end of the tune that [she]0-i has been singing to [herself]0-i , under [her]0-i breath , all the way [upstairs]1081-upstairs . Even [the very room]3803-the very room — [the hated task - work room]3804-the hated task - work room — looks different from what [it]3803-the very room ordinarily does . Usually it is quite sunless ; but this morning a long , slant dart of gold has squeezed itself in , taking no denial , and on it how the dust - motes are dancing ! Must everything dance to - day ? [The Professor]2365-the professor , at least , is an exception to the general rule . [He]2365-the professor shows no signs of any wish to dance . While dictating , [he]2365-the professor is in the habit of walking up and down . [She]0-i knows the exact square in the carpet from which [he]2365-the professor will start , and that at which [he]2365-the professor will pause and turn . [He]2365-the professor has begun [his]2365-the professor diurnal course ; but there is a moment 's interval before the first words of the first sentence leave [his]2365-the professor lips . [She]0-i pauses , pen in hand , awaiting them ; and as [she]0-i pauses , following [him]2365-the professor with [her]0-i eyes , a feeling of genuine and potent compassion passes through [her]0-i heart and brain . "[0-i] How dreadful to be old ! How hideous to be ugly , cantankerous , unloved ! " "[0-i] [I]0-i think , " [she]0-i says , under this impulse , speaking in a gentle , hesitating voice , "[0-i] that [I]0-i owe [you]1619-he an apology for [my]0-i rude speech about [you]1619-he to [Sarah]135-sarah , after dinner yesterday . [I]0-i dare say , " laughing nervously , "[0-i] that [you]1619-he have forgotten it . [I]0-i am sure it was not worth remembering ; but , at all events , it makes [me]0-i easier in [my]0-i mind to tell [you]1619-he that [I]0-i regret it . " The intention of this speech is excellent ; as a mere question of judgment and tact , it is doubtful whether it had not been wiser to have let [her]0-i stinging jest lie , without resuscitating it even to repent of it . The expression of [his]1619-he face shows whether or no [he]1619-he has forgotten it . "[0-i] [I]0-i think , " [he]1619-he says aridly , "[0-i] that since [we]1620-we are already late , [we]1620-we had better keep to the subject in hand . " For a moment or two [she]0-i bows [her]0-i crimsoned face and bitten lips over [her]0-i desk , in furious annoyance at having laid [herself]0-i open to this self - inflicted humiliation . But , ere long , [her]0-i serenity returns . It is only wounds inflicted by those [we]1620-we love whose sting lasts . After all , [she]0-i has done [her]0-i part ; [she]0-i has made the amende . Of what least consequence is it how [he]1619-he has taken it ? But [her]0-i compassion is dead . [He]1619-he may look as old , as pinched , as bloodless as [he]1619-he chooses . No smallest throb of pity stirs [her]0-i heart again ; nor does any other word , unrelating to the subject of [her]0-i labour , cross [her]0-i lips . Through all the fresh bright morning hours , [he]1619-he travels from [his]1619-he one carpet - square to [his]1619-he other carpet - square , elaborating careful , classic phrases as [he]1619-he goes ; and [she]0-i , in docile silence , follows [him]1619-he with [her]0-i pen . The sun soars high ; the drowsy flies inside the shut window make [their]3806-their futile journeys up and down the pane . [The swallows]3807-the swallows sweep across outside , bells ring , [butchers]753-butchers and [bakers]3809-bakers drive up and drive away ; but not one of these distracting objects does [she]0-i allow to beguile [her]0-i for one instant of [her]0-i toil . [She]0-i will do [her]0-i task - work conscientiously , thoroughly , wholly , so that hereafter neither [he]1619-he nor [she]0-i [herself]0-i may have anything to reproach [her]0-i with ; and then , when it is ended — [she]0-i allows [herself]0-i one long breath of prospective enjoyment — why then the sun will still be high ; the swallows will still be darting ; the lengthy May afternoon , with probabilities too bright to be faced in its green lap , will still be [hers]0-i . And , meanwhile , how well the pens write ! how clear [her]0-i own apprehension seems ! [She]0-i has even suggested a verbal emendation or two , which [his]1619-he nice ear has accepted . How quickly the morning is passing ! Can it indeed be a quarter to one that the College clocks are striking ? After all , there is no great hardship in being amanuensis to [a savan afflicted with weak eyes]3810-a savan afflicted with weak eyes ; it is a great matter to be able to be of use to [some one]2370-some one ! [She]0-i looks up , smiling rosily ; if not forgetful , forgiving , of [her]0-i former snub . "[0-i] [We]1621-we have done a good day 's work ! " [she]0-i says congratulatingly . "[1622-your] [You]1622-your have been in vein this morning . " "[1622-your] It is fortunate if it is so , " replies [he]1619-he grudgingly , "[1622-your] for [we]1621-we have large arrears of work to make up . " "[1621-we] Have [we]1621-we ? " [she]0-i says , a little blankly , rubbing [her]0-i cramped right finger and thumb ; "[1621-we] but — but not to - day ? " "[1621-we] And why not to - day ? " rejoins [he]1619-he firmly . "[0-i] [I]0-i have promised that [my]0-i ' Essay upon the Law of Entail among [the Athenians]1004-the athenians ' shall be in [the printers]1624-the printers ' hands by to - morrow , and it is therefore necessary that the proofs should be corrected before post - time to - day . " "[0-i] Not to - day ! " cries [she]0-i feverishly ; "[0-i] not to - day ! " The smile and the short - lived roses have together left [her]0-i face . [She]0-i looks fagged and harried , but obstinate . "[0-i] And why not to - day ? " repeats [he]1619-he , regarding [her]0-i with slow displeasure . " "[1626-she] [She]1626-she will , no doubt , provide [herself]1626-she with amusement , " replies [he]1619-he disagreeably ; "[1626-she] [she]1626-she will , no doubt , amuse [herself]1626-she perfectly without [your]1622-your aid . " "[1626-she] And [I]0-i ? " [she]0-i asks faltering ; "[0-i] how many hours will the correcting of these proofs take ? " "[0-i] It is impossible to say , exactly , " replies [he]1619-he , tranquilly leaving [the room]422-the room ; satisfied with [her]0-i acquiescence , and indifferent as to the spirit in which that acquiescence has been given . The afternoon is three hours old , and [Belinda]134-belinda still sits at [her]134-belinda desk . The dew is dried , the long sunbeam has stolen away , but though it does not cheer [her]134-belinda by its visible presence , [she]134-belinda is aware , by the augmented heat of [the close room]3813-the close room , that the sun is beating hard and hotly on roof and wall . And on [these thinly - built houses]3814-these thinly - built houses it does beat very hotly . At [her]134-belinda side lies a heap of corrected slips , but before [her]134-belinda is piled another , scarcely less bulky . [She]134-belinda has been at work upon them for an hour and a half , and still [she]134-belinda sees no end to [her]134-belinda toil . [Her]134-belinda head aches with long stooping ; [she]134-belinda has inked [her]134-belinda tired fingers , and [her]134-belinda eyes are dull and dogged . Now and again the door - bell ringing makes [her]134-belinda give a nervous start . Is it come again — that time of strained continuous listening ? those twenty - one months , during which all [her]134-belinda life - power seemed to have passed into [her]134-belinda ears ? It is the hour when [visitors]1077-visitors may be with the most probability expected . But is there not also a probability that [they]1077-visitors may be sent away again ? Sometimes , when harder worked or gloomier spirited than usual , [she]134-belinda has bidden [[her]134-belinda servant]3816-her servant deny [her]134-belinda . Is it not but too possible that , seeing [her]134-belinda close slavery of to - day , [that servant]3817-that servant may take upon [herself]3817-that servant to conclude that such is [[her]134-belinda mistress]3818-her mistress 's wish now also . The idea throws [her]134-belinda into a fever . [She]134-belinda does not listen . [She]134-belinda makes an unaccountable mistake . Again the bell rings . Is it [her]134-belinda fancy , or has this ring a different sound from the former ones ? Is there in it a mixture of violence and timidity , as of [a person who had had to screw up [his]3819-a person who had had to screw up his courage to ring at all in the first instance courage to ring at all in the first instance]3819-a person who had had to screw up his courage to ring at all in the first instance , and had then overdone it ? [She]134-belinda writes on mechanically , dully aware that [[her]134-belinda husband]3353-her husband is rebuking [her]134-belinda for the illegibility of [her]134-belinda last words . Even if the moral blows [he]1628-he is giving [her]134-belinda were physical ones , [she]134-belinda would feel them none the more . The door opens , and [the servant]3821-the servant enters , with [a man]2618-a man 's card upon a salver . [She]134-belinda scarcely needs to glance at it to tell that it is [HIS]1628-he ; but for a moment [her]134-belinda pale lips can not frame the question that has sprung to [them]3823-them : "[0-i] Has [he]1628-he been sent away ? " "[1628-he] Is [he]1628-he gone ? " [she]134-belinda asks , stammering , taking the card , and , with a senseless , involuntary movement , hiding it in [her]134-belinda hand .
