" [he]2365-the professor says sharply , looking up and becoming aware of the tall , fair presence that has enriched [[his]2365-the professor neighbourhood]4522-his neighbourhood . " "[0-i] No , [I]0-i did not . [The oldest inhabitant]4533-the oldest inhabitant , who always says grace , has said it , and [the landlord]4534-the landlord is ladling out the soup . [The Professor]2365-the professor is not [a good person to depend upon for general conversation]4539-a good person to depend upon for general conversation through a long dinner ; the almost insoluble problem of how to obtain [his]2365-the professor full pennyworth — how to eat so much as to ensure that no extortionate profit shall accrue from [him]2365-the professor to [the proprietors of [the hotel]1708-the hotel]4540-the proprietors of the hotel , and yet how to eat so little and so lightly as not to alarm [his]2365-the professor coy and skittish digestion — keeping [him]2365-the professor for the most part wholly silent . But [Sarah]135-sarah is royally indifferent as to what pecuniary advantage may be derived from [her]135-sarah , and has no more consciousness of digestion than an emu ; so , upon [her]135-sarah sprightly comments on [[their]4542-their fellow - diners]4543-their fellow - diners , [Belinda]134-belinda has usually relied to drag [her]135-sarah through the ennui of the long and weary courses . " [Belinda]134-belinda is well content to allow the stream of soliloquy beside [her]134-belinda to flow on unchecked . [A silent husband]4559-a silent husband — ever tussling with [his]4559-a silent husband economico - sanitary problem ; [a self - absorbed sister]4560-a self - absorbed sister ; what better neighbours could [she]134-belinda wish for ? Even [the family opposite]4561-the family opposite , whose notice had before annoyed [her]134-belinda , immersed in good cheer , have forgotten [her]134-belinda . [She]134-belinda can lean back unnoticed , and sun [herself]134-belinda in the feeling — not recognised nor formulated enough to constitute a relfection — that though [he]2125-he is lost to [her]134-belinda sight , so is [she]134-belinda assuredly not to [his]2125-he . [He]2125-he is probably wondering why [her]134-belinda hair is cut short . Does [he]2125-he think it an improvement ? Possibly it may appear to [him]2125-he in a high degree disfiguring . It is the first time that the question of the becomingness or unbecomingness of [her]134-belinda crop - head has presented itself to [Mrs. Forth]271-mrs. forth 's mind . [She]134-belinda is not one of [those happy women whose beauty is per se , and to [themselves]4562-those happy women whose beauty is per se , and to themselves as good , for pleasure and profit , as an estate in the three per cents as good , for pleasure and profit , as an estate in the Three per Cents]4562-those happy women whose beauty is per se , and to themselves as good , for pleasure and profit , as an estate in the three per cents . [She]134-belinda has never cared for it except as it affected [him]2125-he . Is [she]134-belinda much disfigured ? [She]134-belinda lifts one hand and passes it over [her]134-belinda shining tendrils , as if to obtain an answer by touch . "[2125-he] [I]0-i beg [your]2135-your pardon ! " [she]134-belinda says , starting . No galvanic shock sent with uncomfortable sense of dislocation along bone and joint could have brought [her]134-belinda down more suddenly from that vision - world through which , happy and crop - headed , [she]134-belinda has , during three courses , been walking . "[2125-he] [You]0-i eat nothing ! " says [the Professor]2365-the professor , glancing upbraidingly at [her]134-belinda empty plate , and contrasting resentfully in [his]2365-the professor mind [his]2365-the professor own heroic efforts with [her]134-belinda supine and culpable abstinence ; "[2135-your] it is a mere farce — a throwing away of money — to set good food before [you]0-i ! " "[2135-your] It would be a worse throwing away of it , if [I]0-i were to gorge [myself]0-i when [I]0-i was not hungary , " replies [she]134-belinda surlily ; and with that [their]4566-their conjugal dialogue ends . The dinner , too , has ended by - and - by . [The oldest inhabitant]4533-the oldest inhabitant has given vent to [his]4533-the oldest inhabitant second grace ; and there is a rustling and streaming through [the passage]1038-the passage into [the hall]3033-the hall , and out upon grass - plat and [pier]4570-pier . Usually [the Churchill party]4571-the churchill party do not participate in this latter outward movement . To watch the humours of [the company]1194-the company from the privacy of [their]1194-the company sitting - room window has , on previous evenings , seemed to [them]1194-the company better than mingling with [them]1194-the company . But to - night [Belinda]134-belinda lingers . [She]134-belinda must speak to [him]2136-him . In justice to [herself]134-belinda , to [him]2136-him , to [[her]134-belinda husband]3353-her husband even , [she]134-belinda must speak to [him]2136-him . It would be impossible to leave [him]2136-him in that misapprehension about [her]134-belinda , under which [he]2136-him must necessarily now be lying . "[0-i] Are [you]2136-him going out ? " asks [Sarah]135-sarah , with a sharp look in [[her]134-belinda sister]2366-her sister 's agitated face . "[2136-him] So will [I.]2137-i. [She]2137-i. has actually had the bad taste to whip [him]2136-him off to [[their]2138-their balcony]2139-their balcony again . After all , [they]2138-their were not in the least anxious to be introduced to [us]2138-their . Pr - r ! " ( shivering ) , "[2138-their] it is cold ; [I]0-i will go and fetch [my]0-i little French hood ; if that will not bring [him]2136-him down , nothing will ! " [She]0-i runs off , and [Belinda]134-belinda , with as composed an air as [she]134-belinda can muster , strolls towards [the pier]2074-the pier , and , leaning [her]134-belinda arms upon the rail , looks down into [the troubled lake water]4576-the troubled lake water . It is a chill and unsummerlike night ; raw - aired and boisterous . The clouds hug [the hills]2078-the hills and smother the struggling moon . [Many people , feeling the nipping breeze]4578-many people , feeling the nipping breeze , have hastened indoors again . [Others]1101-others come out , fortified by Newmarket coats or fur capes . How can [they]1101-others find it cold ? To [her]134-belinda it seems to be torrid . [Her]134-belinda eyes are fixed upon the angry little waves , sucking , and fighting , and dashing themselves against jetty and [shore]4149-shore ; and the steps of the promenading , cigarette - smoking , chatting idlers , pass to and fro behind [her]134-belinda . [They]1101-others do not all pass [her]134-belinda . Two feet pause hesitatingly beside [her]134-belinda . "[2140-his] Did [you]2140-his get [my]0-i note ? " [His]2140-his face may be older than it was , and [his]2140-his handwriting steadier , but at all events [his]2140-his voice trembles quite as much as ever it did . What sense is there in being glad at that ? And yet [she]134-belinda is glad . "[2140-his] Yes , " [she]134-belinda answers whisperingly , neither looking up , nor expressing any surprise at [his]2140-his presence , nor at [his]2140-his omitting all the forms of conventional greeting ; "[2140-his] but [you]2140-his must not draw any inference from [my]0-i being here . " [She]134-belinda pauses ; but , except that [she]134-belinda hears [his]2140-his quick breathing beside [her]134-belinda , [he]2140-his may be gone : in so entire a silence does [he]2140-his await [her]134-belinda explanation . "[0-i] [My]0-i — [my]0-i — [Mr. Forth]209-mr. forth insisted upon [my]0-i dining , " [she]134-belinda says , growing burning red at what [she]134-belinda feels must appear the wretched inadequacy of this explanation . "[209-mr. forth] It — it — is a very prosaic reason , " breaking into a nervous laugh , "[209-mr. forth] but [he]209-mr. forth did not wish [my]0-i dinner to be wasted ! " Still silence . Has [he]2140-his nothing to say ? not even one poor word of pleasure ? Probably [he]2140-his is nerving [himself]2140-his up to exact an answer to that question of [his]2140-his , which [she]134-belinda has virtually never answered . Probably [he]2140-his is going — oh , barbarous!—to throw the decision again upon [her]134-belinda . But perhaps [he]2140-his has learned , within the last hour , to let sleeping dogs lie . At all events , when [his]2140-his speech comes , it is not the one [she]134-belinda had dreaded to hear . "[0-i] [You]0-i have been ill ? " "[0-i] [You]0-i judge by [my]0-i hair , [I]0-i suppose , " replies [she]134-belinda , laughing again ; "[0-i] otherwise , as [Mr. Forth]209-mr. forth says , it would certainly never occur to [anyone]494-anyone that [I]0-i was [an invalid]2117-an invalid . " It is the second time within two minutes that [she]134-belinda has quoted [[her]134-belinda husband]3353-her husband . Does [she]134-belinda feel a sort of chaperonage in [his]3353-her husband very name ? At that name a slight shudder passes over [Rivers]143-rivers 's frame . "[209-mr. forth] But [you]0-i have been ill ? " "[0-i] Nothing interesting , " [she]134-belinda says , with a cynical shrug ; "[209-mr. forth] no brain fever , or charming hectic . [I]0-i simply — a very common complaint in [Oxbridge]5-oxbridge , [you]2143-you know — broke down from overwork . [I]0-i always tell [everyone]3028-everyone [I]0-i broke down from overwork ; it sounds so well . " In [his]3353-her husband ears , possibly , it does not sound so well . "[0-i] Overwork ! " [he]3353-her husband repeats , shocked . "[0-i] Has [your]0-i — who has been overworking [you]0-i ? " "[2422-nobody] [Nobody]2422-nobody ; [I]0-i [myself]0-i ! " replies [she]134-belinda , quoting [Desdemona]332-desdemona , and with about as much truth in [her]134-belinda speech as there was in that of [[the Moor]4582-the moor 's wife]4583-the moor 's wife . How loud and restless is the waves ' wash beneath [them]4584-them ! "[0-i] And [you]0-i ? " [she]134-belinda says softly ; "[0-i] how has it been with [you]0-i ? At all events , " with a melancholy smile , "[0-i] however hard [you]0-i may have been working , [you]0-i have not broken down ! " "[0-i] No , " [he]4582-the moor answers , with a sort of humility , as if [he]4582-the moor were ashamed of having to make the admission ; "[0-i] [I]0-i have not broken down . " "[0-i] It would take a great deal to break [you]0-i down , " [she]134-belinda says , glancing at [him]4582-the moor with a sort of reproach for [his]4582-the moor health and vigour ; "[0-i] and yet , in point of fact , [men]2377-men die more easily than [women]2468-women ; [you]0-i die when [you]0-i do not want to die , and [we]2148-we can not die when [we]2148-we wish : that is about the state of the case in this best of all possible worlds . " [She]134-belinda has raised [herself]134-belinda from [her]134-belinda bent posture , and has lifted that face , whose character seems to be changed and gentled by [her]134-belinda babyish hair , to the sky . What strange clouds , like giant curls and columns of sacrificial smoke from the altar of some dark God ! and the bright gibbous moon shouldering [her]134-belinda way through a sullen pile before [she]134-belinda can reach a clear sky - space , and make the dark mere chastely splendid . How [few people]4585-few people are left upon [the pier]2074-the pier ! By what right is [she]134-belinda left ? [They]4587-they have closed the windows of [[[her]134-belinda grandmother]2703-her grandmother 's sitting - room]4589-her grandmother 's sitting - room . [She]134-belinda can see the silhouette of [Mrs. Churchill]185-mrs. churchill 's cap upon the blind . Why is not [her]134-belinda own silhouette there too ? Alas ! in five minutes it must be ! "[2150-you] Do [you]2149-you wish to die ? " [he]2150-you says , in a shaken , low voice . ( Can this wonder desire that [the world]643-the world should be made dark by [her]134-belinda extinction ? ) "[2150-you] Yes , " [she]134-belinda answers dreamily . "[2150-you] No — yes — on condition that [I]0-i might come back if [I]0-i found it even worse than this ; and [you]2150-you ? " looking at [him]2150-you with a moonlit wavering smile—"but[2150-you] no ; [you]2150-you would not leave [your]2150-you ' rabble , ' and [your]2150-you patent . By - the - bye , how is the patent ? is it taken out yet ? " "[2150-you] The patent ! " [he]2150-you cries , breaking into a sudden , unsteady , tender laugh ; "[0-i] is it possible that [you]2149-you remember about the patent ? " "[2149-you] Do [I]0-i remember it ? " returns [she]134-belinda , in a kind of scorn ; "[2149-you] then , if [I]0-i had taken out a patent , [you]2150-you would not have remembered it ? " "[2149-you] It is an old story now , " [he]2150-you answers , still with that tremulous , unglad laugh ; "[2149-you] it was taken out some months ago . [[Our]2151-their firm]1663-our firm has adopted it with success ; [others]1101-others have followed [their]1663-our firm example , and — " "[1101-others] And [you]2150-you are on the highroad to fortune , " interrupts [she]134-belinda , with a quivering lip ; "[2150-you] to [the gilt coach]2154-the gilt coach and [[the Lord Mayor]2155-the lord mayor 's gown]2156-the lord mayor 's gown . " There is not a soul remaining on the pier beside [themselves]2151-their . Even [Mrs. Churchill]185-mrs. churchill 's shadow has disappeared from the blind . It is clear that [she]134-belinda has had the fire lit , and has drawn up [her]134-belinda chair to it . Not [a soul]4595-a soul ! It is all [their]2151-their own , [his]2150-you and [hers]185-mrs. churchill ! all the night 's cold steely splendour ! all the wind 's wintry song , and the waves ' loud lap ! Surely [their]2151-their voices are no sadder than [his]2150-you — [his]2150-you , with that sob in it ! How easily [she]134-belinda could sob too ! Perhaps [her]134-belinda spirits are weakened by recent sickness . "[0-i] There is no pleasing [you]0-i ! " [she]134-belinda says , half hysterically ; "[0-i] what would [you]0-i have ? " "[0-i] What would [I]0-i have ? "[156-granny] [Granny]156-granny has struck work , as [she]156-granny has frequently done before : [she]156-granny has always in [her]156-granny heart hated the picturesque , and today [I]0-i have induced [her]156-granny to own [it]2161-it ; eh , [granny]721-granny ? " By the extreme positiveness of [her]0-i tone , and determination of [her]0-i eye , it may be inferred that [Sarah]135-sarah looks for [a demurrer to this proposition]4605-a demurrer to this proposition . " [The carriage]2361-the carriage is at the door , and [a few such idlers as mostly]4611-a few such idlers as mostly watch the arrival and departure of [each coming and going vehicle]4612-each coming and going vehicle , hang about it . [Sarah]135-sarah is already seated , and is exchanging such chastened and diluted gallantries as [the publicity of the situation]4613-the publicity of the situation will admit , with some one hanging over the balcony overhead . [Belinda]134-belinda has purposely loitered over [her]134-belinda dressing , in the hope that some opportune mountain storm may even yet intervene to hinder the execution of the , to [her]134-belinda , so distasteful project . But in vain . The perverse and hostile sky is , all too obviously , clearing . As [she]134-belinda issues from [the hall]3033-the hall , [she]134-belinda glances furtively to right and left . Yes , [he]4615-his is here ! [His]4615-his voice , which but for [Sarah]135-sarah 's manoeuvring might have been all day in [her]135-sarah happy ears , is addressing [her]135-sarah . "[0-i] [You]0-i are going out ? " [She]135-sarah has taken [her]135-sarah seat , and , just as [they]2165-they are setting off , [she]135-sarah leans forward , and addressing [the driver]4616-the driver , repeats in a peculiarly clear and distinct voice that direction which has already been given [him]4615-his , "[0-i] To [Coniston]334-coniston ! " "[0-i] [You]0-i are determined that there shall be no mistake as to [our]2165-they destination , [I]0-i see , " says [Sarah]135-sarah sarcastically . [Belinda]134-belinda 's chest heaves . "[0-i] [I]0-i thought that [you]0-i might like [Mr. Bellairs]282-bellairs to know , " [she]0-i answers ironically . "[282-bellairs] By - the - bye , who is to keep watch and ward over [him]282-bellairs in [your]0-i absence ? " "[0-i] [I]0-i have received private information that [they]2166-they all mean to come to [Coniston]334-coniston too , " replies [Sarah]135-sarah tranquilly . "[0-i] [I]0-i thought [I]0-i would be beforehand with [them!—a]2167-them!—a poor project , but [mine]0-i own ! " Away [they]2165-they go from [the wind - freshened lake]4617-the wind - freshened lake , whose waves are running riot in the sun ; while , as [they]2165-they pass along , the clouds roll up and up from fell and scaw and nab , leaving only a lawny kerchief here and there about [their]2165-they necks ; as though loth all at once to desert [them]2165-they . And by - and - by kerchief and veil are swept away too , and [the hills]2078-the hills are free . Through [loveliest pasture - fields , crowded with great bluebells and vetches]4619-loveliest pasture - fields , crowded with great bluebells and vetches , and [meadow - sweet that smells of almonds]4620-meadow - sweet that smells of almonds ; by meadows where [women]2468-women are tossing the late hay , beside [the laughing Rotha]4622-the laughing rotha ; under [Loughrigg]335-loughrigg and over chattering [Brathay]336-brathay 's grey stone bridge [they]2165-they go . Up and up [they]2165-they climb ; between the weather - painted walls , with [their]2165-they lavish ferns and their crannied flowers ; till at the top of the long ascent [they]2165-they pause to breathe the horses , and look back . Fair mountain - wonders , now again conversing with the clouds ; and yet lit on [your]4623-your bare flanks by the sun : Red Screes , [Fairfield]113-fairfield , [Wansfell Pike]114-wansfell pike , with [your]4623-your pointed head ! to which of [you]4623-your shall [we]2168-we give crown and sceptre , as Queen - hill , in this [your]4623-your morning glory ? For a while [they]2165-they both look in silence . Then : "[0-i] It seems a pity that [we]2168-we are not in the least enjoying [ourselves]2168-we , " says [Sarah]135-sarah regretfully . [Belinda]134-belinda 's heart gives a passionate assent , though [her]134-belinda lips are closed . Is not life full of such pities ? of exquisite spread feasts , and gagged mouths that are not allowed to taste them ? With what an agony of pleasure would [she]134-belinda be looking at these curly mists and shining shoulders ; at these heavenly becks , rain - swollen in [their]4624-their noisy mirth , dashing in happy bounds down [the hillsides]4625-the hillsides , if only — if only ! And this is such an easy , probable "[0-i] if , " too ! "[2169-you] If [you]2169-you could but think it , [you]2169-you know , " continues [Miss Churchill]152-miss churchill , turning in calm reasoning to [[her]152-miss churchill sister]2366-her sister , "[2169-you] [I]0-i am really much better company than [David]143-rivers ; and it is no great stretch of imagination to say that [you]2169-you are not much duller than [Bellairs]282-bellairs , eh ? " But [Belinda]134-belinda is still staring , in sullen , grudging misery at the wasted loveliness before [her]134-belinda . "[2169-you] Shall [we]2168-we try to pretend , at all events , that [we]2168-we like it ? " says [Sarah]135-sarah persuasively . "[2169-you] It would be more to [our]2168-we credit ; [I]0-i think [I]0-i could , if [you]2169-you could . " But [Mrs. Forth]271-mrs. forth is unable to promise even thus much . "[2169-you] [You]2169-you can not do it ? " says [Sarah]135-sarah leniently ; "[2169-you] well , [I]0-i am the last person who has any right to blame [you]2169-you . Personally , [I]0-i have never cared for a landscape without figures in the foreground ! " But as time goes on , this seems to be the species of landscape to which [Miss Churchill]152-miss churchill is to - day to be condemned . Although [Coniston]334-coniston has been long ago reached , luncheon eaten , and [several coaches]4627-several coaches and [char - à - bancs]4628-char - à - bancs driven up and unloaded , yet is there no sign of the appearance of any one of the ornamental foreground figures for which [she]2170-she had confidently looked . "[2170-she] Beaten by a banjo ! " says [she]2170-she tragically ; "[2170-she] if it had not been for the banjo [I]0-i should have walked away from [her]2170-she . [I]0-i will never go anywhere without a banjo again ! " [Belinda]134-belinda laughs grimly . "[0-i] [I]0-i would not ! " "[0-i] [I]0-i suppose there must be some tiresome sight to be seen here , " says [Sarah]135-sarah , yawning ; "[2171-they] it would never do if [they]2171-they found out that [we]2172-they had not seen it : not [the lake]2027-the lake — no ! [I]0-i could not bear that ; it would remind [me]0-i of the dinghey ! What did [the waiter]2174-the waiter tell [us]2172-they ? copper - mines and a water - fall ? Come , do look a little livelier , and brace [your]2175-your mind to copper - mines and [a waterfall]2176-a waterfall ! " [They]2172-they set out dispiritedly , but before [they]2172-they have gone five yards : "[0-i] [I]0-i will leave word which way [we]2172-they have gone , " cries [Sarah]135-sarah , brightening , "[2174-the waiter] in case [anyone]494-anyone asks for [us]2172-they . " "[2174-the waiter] A most unnecessary precaution ! " replies [Belinda]134-belinda morosely . A walk undertaken in such a spirit is not likely to be productive of any very acute enjoyment . "[2174-the waiter] [We]2172-they are to turn to the right when [we]2172-they reach [the Black Bull]2178-the black bull ! " says [Sarah]135-sarah gloomily ; "[0-i] [I]0-i wonder what would happen if [we]2172-they turned to the left ? " But [they]2172-they have not the energy even to make this experiment . [They]2172-they have passed [[village]4629-village and white - washed [church]613-church]4630-village and white - washed church , and asking [their]2172-they way of [the civil villagers]4632-the civil villagers , presently find [themselves]2172-they climbing [a mountain road]4633-a mountain road , with [a little gay river frisking over [its]4634-a little gay river frisking over its worn boulder stones on their right worn boulder stones on [their]2172-they right]4634-a little gay river frisking over its worn boulder stones on their right , and a green fell on [their]2172-they left . Ere long [the road]392-the road leaves [the bright beck]4636-the bright beck , and climbs higher than it ; and trees interpose a leafy shield between [them]2172-they and [[their]2172-they noisy friend]4637-their noisy friend . But it calls to [them]2172-they from beneath , "[0-i] [I]0-i am here ; [you]2179-you will find [me]0-i soon again . " And so [they]2172-they do . For by - and - by [the road]392-the road swerves to the right , and [they]2172-they are once more free from the envious sycamores and mountain ashes , with [their]2172-they red rosaries , and are standing on a rough stone mortarless bridge with parapet broken down , and beneath [them]2172-they [the stream]660-the stream plunges in a little storm of foam . Is this the waterfall ? [They]2172-they do not know ; [they]2172-they do not much care . It is a little waterfall , even if it be not the one in search of which [they]2172-they have been sent . "[0-i] [My]0-i cup is full ! " says [Sarah]135-sarah , sitting resolutely down . "[0-i] [I]0-i am hot ; [I]0-i have not a leg to stand upon ; [my]0-i pretty project has avorté ; if [Niagara]99-niagara were round the corner [I]0-i would not go to look at it . Oh , why did [I]0-i leave [[my]0-i granny]2180-my granny ? dear granny ! how [she]2180-my granny would have hated this ! " "[2180-my granny] Even more than [you]0-i do ? " asks [Belinda]134-belinda cynically . [Mrs. Forth]271-mrs. forth is still standing , [her]271-mrs. forth eyes riveted on the little cascade , and [her]271-mrs. forth heart repeating over and over to itself that bitter morning plaint : "[2180-my granny] How pleasant ! if only — if only — what ? " "[134-belinda] [Belinda]134-belinda ! " Then , with an abrupt change of tone to one of sharp and real annoyance : "[2181-he] If [he]2181-he has not brought that eternal [David]143-rivers with [him]2181-he ! " "[0-i] [We]2182-we never heard that there were any , " replies [Bellairs]282-bellairs , with an unvarnished boyish bluntness . [Belinda]134-belinda , still standing , has remained looking , as if in absorption , at [the waterfall]4642-the waterfall . [It]4642-the waterfall is not much of one , after all . How pleasant its voice ! Like the voice of [Undine]338-undine calling to [her]338-undine false [Huldbrand]339-huldbrand ! What wondrous green ferns lip its waters ! "[0-i] [You]0-i said ' To [Coniston]334-coniston ! ' " This is the murmur that comes to [Belinda]134-belinda 's ear . Is it [the brook]666-the brook that utters it ? [She]134-belinda turns [her]134-belinda head sharply away ; but not before [he]666-the brook has seen that the rowan - berries are scarcely redder than [she]134-belinda . And then ( neither inviting , nor being invited ) [they]4644-they saunter away together , as if [they]4644-they would fain follow [the stream]660-the stream to [its]660-the stream springs in [the mountain - lap]4646-the mountain - lap . At least , [they]4644-they may lend [it]660-the stream [their]4644-they company for a little while . "[0-i] [I]0-i wish [I]0-i could think that [I]0-i should wear as well ! [They]4649-the fells are old , too , like [the brook]666-the brook ; but [they]4649-the fells scarcely carry [their]4649-the fells years so well . "[2184-you] How long are [you]2184-you going to stay at [Lowood]115-lowood ? " [she]271-mrs. forth asks abruptly . [She]271-mrs. forth had not meant to put the question , and bitterly regrets it when it is pronounced ; but it forces itself out , in spite of [her]271-mrs. forth . "[2184-you] [I]0-i shall go when [you]2184-you tell [me]0-i . " [Her]271-mrs. forth forehead contracts with a furrow of angry pain . "[2184-you] [You]2184-you have no right to throw the decision upon [me]0-i , " [she]0-i answers indignantly ; "[2184-you] it is ungenerous . " "[2184-you] Because — " [he]2184-you answers , looking full at [her]0-i , and speaking steadily , though very low , "[2184-you] because [I]0-i broke down once ; what security have [I]0-i that [I]0-i should not break down again ? " [Her]0-i eyes drop , and now the rowanberries claim no kinship with [her]0-i cheeks . "[0-i] That was [my]0-i fault ! " [she]0-i answers faintly , turning dead - white . "[0-i] No ! " [he]2184-you says slowly , yet with agitation , "[0-i] it was not ! Perhaps [your]0-i being late that day may have accelerated it ; but it would have come anyhow , " with rising passion . " [Her]0-i hot fingers pick the cool mountain daisies . "[2184-you] [You]2184-you must do as [you]2184-you think best ! " [she]0-i murmurs , half in tears . How solemnly [the hills]2078-the hills are listening ! [The higher ones]4652-the higher ones , indeed , are out of sight ; so forwardly have [[grim Coniston Old Man]334-coniston 's younger brothers]4653-grim coniston old man 's younger brothers thrust [themselves]4653-grim coniston old man 's younger brothers before [him]2184-you . "[0-i] [I]0-i must do as [I]0-i think best ? " [he]143-rivers cries in passionate excitement , wholly carried away ; "[0-i] is that what [you]0-i tell [me]0-i ? Then [I]0-i think best to stay ! " "[0-i] But is it ? " [she]0-i says , shuddering , too late terrified by the wildness of [his]143-rivers look and the mad triumph of [his]143-rivers eyes ; "[0-i] is it ? " Is it indeed ? There has been a week in which to answer this question . "[0-i] It is putting [one]373-one into such a disagreeable position ! " says [Mrs. Churchill]185-mrs. churchill pettishly . But a passing frenzy seizes [her]134-belinda , bidding [her]134-belinda answer [him]4663-he , for once truly ; tell [him]4663-he , in so many words , face to face , why ; to throw the game up — have done with it ! " "[0-i] And [you]0-i have consented ? " ( very sharply , and with an accent of excessive astonishment ) . "[0-i] [Sarah]135-sarah , " [she]2366-her sister says slowly , and turning even whiter than [she]2366-her sister already is — though , indeed , that is scarcely needful—"do[135-sarah] [you]135-sarah remember once telling [me]0-i that [you]135-sarah were afraid [I]0-i was going to the devil , and that [I]0-i was taking"—a pause and a sort of gasp — "[143-rivers] [David Rivers]143-rivers with [me]0-i ? "[135-sarah] [My]0-i dear soul , " [she]0-i says bluntly , "[135-sarah] [you]135-sarah did not receive [my]0-i first exhortation in such a spirit as to make [me]0-i very anxious to hazard a second . " [Belinda]134-belinda 's head has sunk forward upon [her]134-belinda chest . "[135-sarah] [You]135-sarah were not very far wrong then ! " [she]134-belinda says faintly , "[135-sarah] but [you]135-sarah would be still nearer the truth now ! " There is a silence . [Sarah]135-sarah has begun to march unquietly up and down [the room]422-the room , with [her]135-sarah hands behind [her]135-sarah . Perhaps the confession just made [her]135-sarah does not partake much of the nature of a surprise . For there is less of astonishment than of genuine concern in [her]135-sarah face . "[135-sarah] And [you]135-sarah are going ? " [she]135-sarah says abruptly ; "[135-sarah] but who is to prevent [his]2227-he following [you]135-sarah ? " [Belinda]134-belinda 's lip trembles . "[2227-he] [He]2227-he will not , if [I]0-i tell [him]2227-he not . " [Her]134-belinda eyes wander wistfully away through the window to [mountain]4673-mountain and [mere]4674-mere . [The high peaks]4675-the high peaks are still withdrawn into the mystery of their morning vapours , but all [the lovely lake]4676-the lovely lake is at play with the sun . To - morrow , to - morrow , [he]2227-he was to have rowed [her]134-belinda on [that lake]4677-that lake ! Suddenly [her]134-belinda attitude of subdued wretchedness changes to one of more violent pain . "[0-i] What am [I]0-i thinking of ? " [she]134-belinda cries , starting up ; "[0-i] [I]0-i had forgotten ! [I]0-i shall not see [him]2227-he again ; [he]2227-he has been obliged to go to [Milnthorpe]73-milnthorpe to - day on business ; and by the time [he]2227-he gets back to - morrow , [we]2228-we shall be gone ! [we]2228-we shall be gone ! " "[2227-he] [He]2227-he will be after [you]0-i by [the next coach]2229-the next coach ! " replies [Sarah]135-sarah , with cynical good sense . [Belinda]134-belinda utters a low groan . "[2227-he] [I]0-i must write to [him]2227-he ! " "[2227-he] Do not ! " cries [Sarah]135-sarah dissuasively : "[2227-he] never write ! Whatever else [you]0-i give up , adhere to that one golden rule ! In [the length and breadth of [Europe]117-europe]2230-the length and breadth of europe , " says [Miss Churchill]152-miss churchill , with a modest pride , "[2227-he] there is not a square inch of [my]0-i handwriting to be obtained ! " Once again [Belinda]134-belinda moans . "[2227-he] If [I]0-i do not write , [he]2227-he will certainly find out where [we]2228-we have gone to ; unless " — [her]134-belinda eyes still taking that miserable farewell journey to [the lake—"unless]4678-the lake—"unless[2227-he] [I]0-i leave word that [we]2228-we do not wish it known . " "[0-i] That would scarcely do , " rejoins [Sarah]135-sarah drily ; "[0-i] it would be hardly advisable to take [the waiters]2231-the waiters into [our]2228-we confidence . " A pause . [Miss Churchill]152-miss churchill still pursuing [her]0-i restless walk , and undistracted even by the strains of the banjo clearly heard from below , and the sound of [a male]4679-a male , as well as a female voice , obviously accompanying it . "[0-i] [I]0-i suppose , " [she]0-i says by - and - by , sighing impatiently , "[0-i] that the end of it is , it will devolve upon [me]0-i : [our]2228-we rôles are reversed . All [my]0-i life [I]0-i have been asking [you]2232-you to undertake disagreeable commissions for [me]0-i , and now [I]0-i must do [you]2232-you [the same kind office]2233-the same kind office . [I]0-i suppose that [I]0-i must tell [him]2234-him ! " "[2232-you] [You]2232-you ? " cries [Belinda]134-belinda , wheeling suddenly round , a passionate dissent from this proposal in voice and eyes , and with a new rush of [her]134-belinda lately dormant old and senseless jealousy ; "[2232-you] why [you]2232-you ? " "[2232-you] Would [you]2232-you prefer [granny]721-granny ? " asks [Sarah]135-sarah quietly . "[2232-you] [Some one]2370-some one must tell [him]2234-him ; [you]2232-you can hardly suppose that [I]0-i very greedily covet [the office]417-the office ! " At the cool rationality of [[her]135-sarah sister]2366-her sister 's words , [Belinda]134-belinda 's rebel blood slowly subsides again , and [her]134-belinda head sinks once more upon [her]134-belinda breast . How thin [these floors]4681-these floors are ! [One]373-one can hear each word of the idiotic melody warbled by [Bellairs]282-bellairs and [the girl in red]2105-the girl in red ; but [Miss Churchill]152-miss churchill never flinches . [Belinda]134-belinda is the first to speak , though it is not at once easy to comprehend the drift of [her]134-belinda words , so unsure and muffled is [her]134-belinda voice . "[2232-you] [You]2232-you will tell [him]2234-him as kindly as [you]2232-you can ? " "[2232-you] Do [you]2232-you think it will kill [him]2234-him ? " replies [Sarah]135-sarah , with a touch of sarcasm ; "[2232-you] if [you]2232-you remember , [you]2232-you thought that [[his]2234-him father]2550-his father 's death would kill [him]2234-him , but it did not ! Pooh ! [They]2239-they take more killing than that ! " "[2239-they] Often , however , was there a question present to [me]0-i : should [some one]2370-some one now at the turning of that corner blow [thee]2241-thee suddenly out of [Space]118-space into [the other world]2242-the other world , or [no - world]2243-no - world , by pistol - shot , how were it ? " The wrench is accomplished . The coach that starts at eleven o'clock has started . Within [the close precincts of [its]4685-its interior]4684-the close precincts of its interior , it has carried away , among [other persons]3128-other persons , the cautiously - enveloped figure of [Professor Forth]136-professor forth ; and among [its mackintoshed and umbrellad outside passengers]4687-its mackintoshed and umbrellad outside passengers , [it]4685-its reckons [[his]136-professor forth wife]713-his wife . "[0-i] [I]0-i never was so glad of anything in [my]0-i life , " says [Mrs. Churchill]185-mrs. churchill , walking briskly back to the fire from the rain - blurred window , whence [she]185-mrs. churchill has been waving adieux of accented tenderness to [[her]185-mrs. churchill descendants]4689-her descendants . "[0-i] Not even when [you]0-i first hailed [him]2244-her as [grandson]2245-grandson ? " asks [Sarah]135-sarah caustically . [Mrs. Churchill]185-mrs. churchill reddens . "[0-i] [Poor soul]2246-poor soul ! " says [the girl]446-the girl , with an accent of heartfelt compassion , following with [her]446-the girl eyes [the departing vehicle]4691-the departing vehicle . "[0-i] [I]0-i never can understand why [you]0-i should pity [her]2244-her ! " retorts [the elder woman]2766-the elder woman , with irritation ; "[0-i] there is no greater mistake than to measure [everyone]3028-everyone by [one]373-one 's own foot - rule . " "[0-i] [I]0-i suppose that without offence to [anyone]494-anyone , [I]0-i may pity [her]2244-her for getting extremely wet , " replies [Sarah]135-sarah surlily . And certainly , on this count , [Mrs. Forth]271-mrs. forth , by the time of [her]271-mrs. forth arrival at [the Lodore Hotel]2206-the lodore hotel , does deserve as much compassion as [she]271-mrs. forth can get . Stiff and drenched , [she]271-mrs. forth has climbed down from [her]271-mrs. forth perch . Pouring as is the day , [the coach]2212-the coach has been crowded . [Belinda]134-belinda 's ribs on each side feel indented with the continued nudging of [[her]134-belinda companions]1169-her companions ' elbows ; and there has been such a cordial interchange of drips between all the umbrellas , that it would have been a sensibly drier course to have taken no umbrellas at all . Upon the tarpaulin that covers the luggage , lakes of water have collected , which , at each fresh jolt of [the coach]2212-the coach , discharge themselves refreshingly upon [the passengers]2095-the passengers ' knees . As far as any glimpse of mountain that the blanket - clouds have allowed [them]2095-the passengers to obtain is concerned , [they]2095-the passengers might as well have been in [Holland]119-holland . [Dunmail Raise]120-dunmail raise , [Skiddaw]121-skiddaw , Saddleback — what have [they]2095-the passengers been but various names for the one huge white pelt ? It is a grand day for the becks — the foaming , jumping , brimful becks , and they are the only cheerful things [she]134-belinda has seen ; they , and the long lythrums growing lushly beside [them]2095-the passengers . "[0-i] [You]2250-you have [no one]365-no one to blame but [yourself]2250-you , " says [Professor Forth]136-professor forth , emerging , dry and warm , from the steaming interior , and severely regarding [[his]136-professor forth half - drowned wife]4698-his half - drowned wife ; "[2250-you] had [you]2250-you taken [my]0-i advice — " "[2250-you] [I]0-i blame [no one]365-no one , " [she]134-belinda interrupts , apathetically ; "[2250-you] there is no great harm in being wet ; it is very easy to get dry again ! " "[2250-you] [You]2250-you have every appearance of having taken a chill , " scrutinizing [her]134-belinda shivering figure with an angry solicitude that might appear the outcome of an anxious affection ; "[2250-you] it would be extremely vexatious if , thanks to a mere caprice on [your]2250-you part , [you]2250-you were to be so soon again laid up . [I]0-i must insist upon [your]2250-you at once drinking a glass of hot brandy - and - water as a preventive ! " "[0-i] [I]0-i have taken no chill , " [she]134-belinda answers faintly , but [she]134-belinda obeys with a dull acquiescence . There is no draught [he]136-professor forth could offer [her]134-belinda , from [Socrates]340-socrates ' hemlock upwards or down - wards , that [she]134-belinda would not think it less trouble to take than to refuse . The rain pours on and on , all through the table - d'hôte , all through the long , long evening . There is [a public drawing - room to which , after dinner]4699-a public drawing - room to which , after dinner , [the other guests]4700-the other guests betake [themselves]4700-the other guests , shawl - wrapped , grumbling , and uttering aspirations for a fire . [Belinda]134-belinda has not the heart to accompany [them]4700-the other guests . [She]134-belinda climbs the stairs to [[her]134-belinda bedroom]2388-her bedroom in the roof , although at eight o'clock it is scarcely possible to go to bed . No sense , indeed , of the prematureness of the hour prevents [her]134-belinda flying to the blessed keeping of sleep ; but the knowledge that whatever moments are filched from consciousness now , will be asked back with [usury]4702-usury in the grey morning hours — those grim , grey hours that only the tiny minority of the quite happy and the completely innocent dare face . [Her]134-belinda window is open , and looks to the back ; to [the wooded hill rising so immediately behind [the house]2521-the house]4703-the wooded hill rising so immediately behind the house that it seems as if , with outstretched hand , one might touch it . The rain swishes past : now and then , when the freakish gust takes it , swishes in . [She]134-belinda sits down on [her]134-belinda bed and listens to it . For two hours [she]134-belinda will listen to its swishing ; and then , perhaps , [she]134-belinda may dare give [herself]134-belinda — tired body and sick heart — to slumber . With the rain mixes the never - ceasing noise of the waterfall . On a sultry summer night no doubt it is sweet and lulling , falling coolly beneath the stars ; but it seems to treble , to centuple the dreariness of this inclement drenching evening , cold as winter , and without winter 's palliatives of thick curtains and blazing logs . It gets upon [her]134-belinda nerves at last . It seems as if [she]134-belinda must stop it for one instant or die . If its wet din would fill [her]134-belinda brain , indeed , as it fills [her]134-belinda ears , crowding out other presences , [she]134-belinda would thank [it]4705-it , and bless [it]4705-it on [her]134-belinda knees ; but , on the contrary , its clamour seems to make thought sharper , memory intenser , fancy wilder . With what a dreadful liveliness does [she]134-belinda rehearse — set to the murderous monotony of its tune — the scene of [Rivers]143-rivers ' back - coming to - morrow ! It grows at last so hideously real that [she]134-belinda asks [herself]134-belinda in bewilderment , "[0-i] Has [she]2253-she really seen — is [she]2253-she really seeing it ? " [She]134-belinda passes [her]134-belinda hand across [her]134-belinda forehead and rubs [her]134-belinda eyes . In [what room of [the hotel]1708-the hotel]4706-what room of the hotel — in which often - trodden spot by wave - lipped mere will the blow fell [him]4708-him ? How will [he]4708-him take it ? Will it kill [him]4708-him ? [She]134-belinda laughs aloud . "[2253-she] Pooh ! as [Sarah]135-sarah says , ' [they]2254-they take more killing than that ! ' And how much killing will [she]135-sarah [herself]135-sarah take ? " This [Sarah]135-sarah has never told [her]134-belinda . How much of this slow death ? A great , great deal ! Was ever [anyone]494-anyone so full of obstinate life as [she]134-belinda ? [Other women]510-other women — [women who prayed to live]4711-women who prayed to live , [women with [little children]4713-little children 's chubby arms about [their]4711-women who prayed to live necks , with [passionate , fond husbands]4714-passionate , fond husbands , wetting [their]4714-passionate , fond husbands faint hands with good - bye tears]4712-women with little children 's chubby arms about their necks , with passionate , fond husbands , wetting their faint hands with good - bye tears — would have died of such an illness as [hers]134-belinda . [She]134-belinda , childless , hated and hating , has survived . A sense of impotent , dark rebellion fills [her]134-belinda soul . Of what use to save [her]134-belinda alive ? What sense in it ? To save [her]134-belinda alive in order to show [her]134-belinda just one small glimpse of what life might have been , and then to hurl [her]134-belinda back into what life is ! What life might have been ! Oh , the terrible vividness of that vision ! [She]134-belinda has fallen sideways upon [her]134-belinda bed , which , as well as [her]134-belinda whole body , is shaken with the force of [her]134-belinda silent sobs . [They]2255-they must be silent , for the walls are thin , and [[[her]134-belinda husband]3353-her husband 's attic]4661-her husband 's attic is next door . "[135-sarah] If [we]2255-they had once belonged to [each other]469-each other , " [she]0-i says , with a violent agony of emphasis , "[135-sarah] even if afterwards [I]0-i had seen [him]2257-him struck dead at [my]0-i feet , still , [I]0-i should have known what is the very best thing that life holds ; [I]0-i could have said , ' [I]0-i have lived ! ' but now [I]0-i shall lie down in [my]0-i grave , knowing that there has always been something immeasurably better than anything [I]0-i know , just beyond [me]0-i ! " After that , [she]0-i lies quite still , a sort of numb calm succeeding the hurricane , and outside the rain swirls always , and the waterfall tumbles . There must be more of soothing properties in their joint sound than [she]0-i gives [them]2255-they credit for , since by - and - by [their]2255-they sullen music grows dim in [her]0-i ears , and [she]0-i sleeps . [She]0-i awakes in the early morning , forlorn and cold , to find that [she]0-i has lain all night fully dressed , outside [her]0-i bed . [She]0-i is down in good time , and stands outside [the hall]3033-the hall - door , waiting for breakfast to be announced . The rain has ceased . The wind has torn and hurled the clouds apart , and let the sun look through ; and also swept clear little intensely blue islands in the sky . The shadows are flying , speedy as dreams , along [Skiddaw]121-skiddaw 's flanks , and [Derwentwater]116-derwentwater lies — all billowy and disturbed — at the foot of [her]0-i girdling fells . On the bit of marshy grass that intervenes between [Belinda]134-belinda and [the lake]2027-the lake , several horses are grazing , and two rolling . One can not roll quite over , which seems to annoy [him]4719-him . "[0-i] [I]0-i hope that [you]0-i are recovered from the effects of [your]0-i yesterday 's imprudence , " says a voice at [her]0-i elbow . [She]0-i starts . "[0-i] There were not any to recover from , " [she]0-i answers , with a shrug . "[0-i] In that case , " says [[her]0-i husband]3353-her husband stiffly , "[0-i] and since [you]0-i have every appearance of being in other respects perfectly restored to health , [I]0-i think [I]0-i am justified in proposing that [you]0-i should return to [your]0-i normal habits , which have been for so long , and at such great inconvenience to [myself]0-i , interrupted . " [Belinda]134-belinda smiles slightly . [She]134-belinda is well aware that it is only the presence of [[her]134-belinda grandomother]4721-her grandomother and [Sarah]135-sarah that has , up to this time , prevented the pack - saddle from being replaced upon [her]134-belinda back . It is being now , at the earliest opportunity , strapped on again . Well , what matter ? "[0-i] [I]0-i perfectly agree with [you]0-i , " [she]0-i answers hastily . "[0-i] [I]0-i have not the shadow of an excuse for any further idleness . After such a holiday , " catching [her]0-i breath in a sigh , "[0-i] a little work will do [me]0-i good . " But [people]523-people 's ideas as to what a little work is , differ . "[0-i] [I]0-i need scarcely tell [you]0-i , " says [the Professor]2365-the professor , when , after the table - d'hôte breakfast , [he]2365-the professor and [she]0-i have mounted to [[his]2365-the professor bedroom]4724-his bedroom , which , as at [Lowood]115-lowood , is also [[his]2365-the professor study—"indeed]4725-his study—"indeed[0-i] , it has once or twice struck [me]0-i with surprise that the idea of a spontaneous offer of assistance should not have occurred to [you]0-i — that [my]0-i correspondence is very seriously in arrears ; moderate application , however , will to - day reduce it in a great degree to order . [I]0-i have briefly indicated , upon each letter , the tenour of the answer [I]0-i wish drawn up . " As [he]2365-the professor speaks , [he]2365-the professor places before [her]0-i a large pile of docketed letters . If any dismay at its height and breadth enters [her]0-i soul , [she]0-i swallows it down in silence . The sun comes forth in summer strength , but though [the room]422-the room is not a tenth part as large as [[the Professor]2365-the professor 's Oxbridge study]4728-the professor 's oxbridge study , the window is as rigorously closed as ever [it]4729-it was there . [The garret]4730-the garret , like [her]0-i own , looks to the back , and in [it]4730-the garret there is no escape from the waterfall 's loud pouring . [She]0-i is still teased by that maniac notion that [she]0-i must make it stop or die . Unused , for the past couple of months , to close air , to confinement , to toil , [her]0-i head soon begins to ache , sometimes swims , burns always , but [she]0-i makes no complaint . The clock strikes one ; [she]0-i hears cheerful voices , and steps trooping down [the passage outside]4731-the passage outside to luncheon . [The Professor]2365-the professor is no great advocate of luncheon , even when [he]2365-the professor can eat it at [some one else]473-some one else 's expense ; at [an hotel]4734-an hotel [he]2365-the professor simply ignores the possibility of its existence . But [she]0-i can not complain . [He]2365-the professor is willing to share with [her]0-i such hospitality as [he]2365-the professor extends to [himself]2365-the professor . Biscuits bought at [a shop in [Ambleside]125-ambleside]4735-a shop in ambleside , so that there may be no danger of [their]4736-their figuring in the hotel bill , and weak brandy - and - water — the brandy also [his]2365-the professor own . [She]0-i declines the brandy , would fain decline the biscuits too ; to eat in such an air , and with such a heavy head , seems impossible , but [she]0-i dreads being scolded for [her]0-i sickliness if [she]0-i refuse . Two o'clock strikes ! Three ! Halfpast three ! Four ! Even now [her]0-i pile seems scarce perceptibly diminished . Two or three times [she]0-i has been thrown back , by having to draw up a fresh draft , [her]0-i muddled brain and wandering thoughts having led [her]0-i to mistake the sense of [his]2258-he directions . Hopeless tears fill [her]0-i eyes , as [she]0-i tears across each sheet and begins another . As the clock strikes four , the pen drops from [her]0-i numbed fingers . "[0-i] [I]0-i think [you]2258-he must excuse [me]0-i , " [she]0-i says faintly . "[2258-he] [I]0-i — [I]0-i — do not feel very well ! " "[0-i] Not well ? " returns [he]2258-he sharply ; "[0-i] then [your]0-i indisposition is , of course , attributable to the chill [you]0-i contracted yesterday ! " "[2258-he] The chill ? " replies [she]0-i , laughing hysterically , and pressing [her]0-i hot hands to [her]0-i throbbing forehead . "[2258-he] The chill ? Oh , how delightful it would be to have a chill ! No , no ! it is only the old story ! It is only that [I]0-i have broken down again ! " "[0-i] Impossible ! " [he]2258-he cries angrily ; "[0-i] in that case , [your]0-i health can never have been really re - established ! " "[0-i] [I]0-i suppose not , " assents [she]0-i dully . "[0-i] Well , may [I]0-i go ? " "[0-i] Why do [you]0-i ask ? " retorts [he]2258-he waspishly , and regarding with a dissatisfied air [her]0-i uncompleted task . "[0-i] Do [I]0-i ever put any check upon [your]0-i actions ? [I]0-i merely reserve to [myself]0-i the right of requesting that [you]0-i will not incur the risk of contracting another chill . " [She]0-i is very willing to buy [her]0-i liberty at the price of this most unnecessary promise . At what price would not [she]0-i buy air , the liberty to gasp , the privilege — beyond all value — of being alone ? Without much thought , [she]0-i has taken , on leaving [the hotel]1708-the hotel , [the Borrowdale road]4738-the borrowdale road , walks along [it]4738-the borrowdale road for some distance , confused and woolly - headed , conscious only of the relief of having temporarily escaped from suffocation — from [the waterfall]4642-the waterfall — from [him]2258-he ! But by - and - by the loveliness around [her]0-i wakes [her]0-i again — wakes [her]0-i to new and keener sufferings . [She]0-i is aware of [the road that winds in gentle companionship with the windings of [the Derwent]126-the derwent]4740-the road that winds in gentle companionship with the windings of the derwent ; [she]0-i is aware of the marvellous coloured water , tinted a strange fair green by the stones in its bed , and clear as the crystal stream in [the Apocalypse]127-the apocalypse . Above , the great crags rear their steepy heads ; [the Castle Crag that , at one point , seems to block [the valley]3636-the valley , guarding hid treasures behind [it]4741-the castle crag that , at one point , seems to block the valley , guarding hid treasures behind it]4741-the castle crag that , at one point , seems to block the valley , guarding hid treasures behind it , and saying austerely , "[2259-you] [You]2259-you shall not pass [me]0-i ! " [the Gate Crag]4743-the gate crag , that looks down , benignant though awful , on the prattle of [the river]463-the river curling round its feet , looks down with [its]4743-the gate crag solemn purplegrey rock - shelves and sheer slopes of slate . As [she]0-i nears [a village]4745-a village , [she]0-i turns off [a road]4746-a road to the left , and begins to climb [the hill]4747-the hill . [She]0-i proposes to [herself]0-i no goal . [She]0-i does not know where [she]0-i is , or whither [she]0-i is going . [She]0-i only knows that each step takes [her]0-i farther from [the waterfall]4642-the waterfall , and from [him]4642-the waterfall . Climbing , climbing , climbing , through a wood , up [a mountain path]4749-a mountain path , until at length , panting , [she]0-i attains the hill - crest , and turning , looks back upon all the beauty and majesty of [Borrowdale]128-borrowdale . But even here [she]0-i only halts to cast one breathless glance at [the great hills]4750-the great hills , thrown about as if in Titan play , and looking over [each other]469-each other 's shoulders , silent , wondrously - coloured , august ! [She]0-i is not far away enough , even yet . With knees that tremble and give beneath [her]0-i — for [she]0-i has been but little used to such a walk — a walk undertaken , too , almost fasting — [she]0-i descends [the hill on the other side]4752-the hill on the other side ; and at [its]4752-the hill on the other side foot finds [a most lonely tarn]4753-a most lonely tarn , here , in [the heart of [the fells]4649-the fells]4754-the heart of the fells . [A little ale - house]4756-a little ale - house , lonely too , sits near [it]4756-a little ale - house , backed by [three or four storm - wrecked Scotch firs]4757-three or four storm - wrecked scotch firs ; and around , the fells lift [their]4649-the fells harsh faces , scored by the channels of their winter weepings . [She]0-i asks [the stout housewife at [the little innfor]4759-the little innfor]4758-the stout housewife at the little innfor a drink of milk ; but [she]0-i does not inquire where [she]0-i is , nor in which direction [Lodore]342-lodore lies . [She]0-i would far rather not know . [She]0-i has lost [her]0-i way , and will be late for the table - d'hôte ! Well ? [He]4758-the stout housewife at the little innfor will be imagining that [she]0-i has contracted some new and expensive chill ! Well ? [She]0-i may go astray upon [the mountains]4760-the mountains , and perish like the sheep in winter ! Well ? The milk has a little revived [her]0-i flagging powers ; and [she]0-i walks on again . [Whither]343-whither ? [She]0-i neither knows nor cares . [She]0-i only knows that [she]0-i is among [friends]3553-friends — among [the stern , yet summer - softened hills that lend [her]0-i the sympathy of [their]3553-friends silence]4762-the stern , yet summer - softened hills that lend her the sympathy of their silence ; among the crisp and frolic mountain airs , and the beds of bog - myrtle that smells of bay - leaves ; while [— friendliest of all — blithe comforter and comrade]4763-— friendliest of all — blithe comforter and comrade — a mountain beck tinkles , a hand - breadth off , beside [her]0-i . But there is a limit even to the sustaining powers of a cup of milk ; and by - and - by [she]0-i sinks down , faint and spent , by that flower - lipped brook , upon the dainty bed of ferns and sundews with which it is set round . Why should [she]0-i ever move hence again ? What inducement is there to [her]0-i ever again to lift up [her]0-i tired limbs and leave the mute society of [these bald limestone crags and steeps of shingle]4764-these bald limestone crags and steeps of shingle and flint ? [Whither]343-whither could [she]0-i go to better [herself]0-i ? In what direction [on earth]1659-on earth 's broad face does any good for [her]0-i lie ? Why should not [she]0-i lie down and die here ? Die ! But is it such an easy thing to die ? Has not [she]0-i already tried hard and failed ? Oh , if [she]0-i could but gently depart here now ! Surely [no one]365-no one could ever wish for a sweeter , fragranter death - bed ! [She]0-i stretches [herself]0-i back upon the bog - myrtle and sundews , and closes [her]0-i eyes , trying to fancy that it is over , and that [she]0-i is dead . Oh , if [she]0-i might but be gently spunged out of being ! It seems such a small thing to ask , and yet [she]0-i might as well bid [the mountains]4760-the mountains bow down and the sun make obeisance to [her]0-i . [She]0-i asks for no other life instead . Has [her]0-i experience of this one been so pleasant that [she]0-i is greedy for more ? If there be [another world]4768-another world , what security is there that it is a better one ? May not it resemble this ? the same long hopes that go gradually , sickeningly out ; the same poniardstabs of recollection thrusting one through in the hour of the uncoloured dawn ; the same tiny , weakling joys ! [She]0-i has raised [herself]0-i from [her]0-i recumbent attitude , and [her]0-i head is bowed forwards upon [her]0-i knees , which [her]0-i long arms embrace . Neither by death nor by life is there any escape for [her]0-i ! But there is a mode of outlet for [her]0-i nearer at hand than [she]0-i wots of . It is noiseless walking upon the fine mountain herbage ; there the heaviest foot falls mutely — so noiseless that until [he]2260-you who has been approaching [her]0-i stoops and most gently touches [her]0-i on the shoulder , [she]0-i is unaware that [anyone]494-anyone is nigh . [She]0-i springs up staggeringly , with a loud cry . "[2260-you] [You]2260-you ! " "[0-i] Yes , [I]0-i ! " It seems as if [she]0-i had spent all [her]0-i breath on that one monosyllable , since , for a while , nothing more comes ; then , at last , a gasping whisper : "[135-sarah] Did not — [Sarah]135-sarah — tell [you]2260-you ? " "[135-sarah] Yes ; [she]135-sarah told [me]0-i . " [Her]0-i breath comes hard and laboured . How is it possible to interpose any words between such heart - beats ? At last : "[135-sarah] [You]2260-you — have — always bragged about [your]2260-you obedience to - [me]0-i , " [she]0-i says slowly ; "[2260-you] [you]2260-you have always boasted of doing what [I]0-i told [you]2260-you — is this doing what [I]0-i told [you]2260-you ? " [He]2260-you offers no exculpation . [He]2260-you only stands doggedly before [her]0-i , white and burning - eyed , but not trembling . "[0-i] This — it — is , " [she]0-i says , with that same slow intensity—"this[0-i] — it — is — to throw [yourself]2260-you upon [a man]2618-a man 's generosity ! " [His]2260-you lips twitch , but [his]2260-you eyes are still dogged . "[0-i] [I]0-i will go at [your]2260-you bidding ; [I]0-i will go at [no one else]1334-no one else 's ! " [She]0-i looks distractedly round at [[her]0-i silent friends]4770-her silent friends — [the scarped slopes]4771-the scarped slopes , where [the lady - birch]4772-the lady - birch finds difficult footing , but yet keeps [her]4772-the lady - birch place , and hangs [her]4772-the lady - birch delicate tresses : in [her]0-i sore need [she]0-i consults the beck , but [the hills]2078-the hills are speechless ; and though the beck talks fast , [she]0-i can not distinguish the meaning of its words . "[0-i] [I]0-i will go if [you]2260-you tell [me]0-i ; and [I]0-i will stay if [you]2260-you tell [me]0-i ! " [Her]0-i look still wanders wildly ; and [her]0-i ear detects the sound of [a little oozing runlet]4774-a little oozing runlet , lost hitherto in the noise of [[its]4774-a little oozing runlet elder brother]4775-its elder brother ; a runlet filtering through the red moss on [the hillside]4776-the hillside . "[2260-you] Which shall it be ? go or stay ? " [His]4775-its elder brother voice , that hitherto [her]0-i lightest word has awed into silence , presses , imperatively asking , upon [her]0-i hearing . ( Which shall it be ? Which ? which ? ) Oh , if [some one]2370-some one would but answer for [her]0-i ! If [mountain or runlet]4778-mountain or runlet would but take the responsibility of that one all - weighty word off [her]0-i ? Go ? "[2260-you] [I]0-i am waiting ! which shall it be ? " Hideous future ! Hideous past ! Hideous present ! [She]0-i has given [it]4779-it a fair trial . Let it be [hers]0-i now ! d "[2260-you] Which ? " [His]4775-its elder brother voice is no longer dogged ; heart - rendingly urgent only . "[2260-you] Which ? " [He]4775-its elder brother has taken [her]0-i hand , and has laid its palm upon [his]4775-its elder brother burning eyes . "[2260-you] Which shall it be ? go or stay ? " [Her]0-i look , staring yet unseeing , is fixed upon the little zigzag green paths on [the fell]4782-the fell , worn by the small feet of the mountain sheep . Not a bird 's voice breaks the silence of [the hills]2078-the hills . "[2260-you] It — shall — be — stay ! " [she]0-i says , almost inaudibly . Before [his]4775-its elder brother eyes the sun dances , and [the steady hills]4784-the steady hills go round . Yet , mixed with a joy so awful and utter that [his]4775-its elder brother whole strong frame reels beneath its weight , there comes too a pain keen to agony . [He]4775-its elder brother has prevailed . [[His]4775-its elder brother high goddess]4785-his high goddess has fallen from [her]4785-his high goddess pedestal , and it is [he]4775-its elder brother that has dragged [her]4785-his high goddess down ! [Her]4785-his high goddess divine fair head lies in the dust , and it is [he]4775-its elder brother that has laid it there ! "[2263-you] Do [you]2263-you know what [you]2263-you are saying ? " [he]4775-its elder brother cries , in suffocating excitement . "[2263-you] Some - times [I]0-i think that [you]2263-you say things of which [you]2263-you do not understand the meaning ! Do [you]2263-you understand what ' stay ' means ? It does not mean ' Stay to - day , and go tomorrow ; ' it means ' Stay always , ALWAYS , ALWAYS ! ' it is all or nothing for which [I]0-i am asking . Do [you]2263-you understand ? Which ? " [She]4785-his high goddess draws a long heavy breath , as [one recovering from a deep swoon]4786-one recovering from a deep swoon . "[2263-you] All ! " [she]4785-his high goddess answers , whispering ; and so breaks into an exceeding bitter cry of anguish and revolt : "[2263-you] [I]0-i will not die without having lived ! " Then , indeed , the pain goes , swallowed up and stifled in the enormity of [his]4775-its elder brother gladness . [He]4775-its elder brother knows that hereafter it will return , but now [he]4775-its elder brother is only , only glad ! Great God ! how glad ! [He]4775-its elder brother has thrown [himself]4775-its elder brother down before [her]4785-his high goddess , and is kissing [her]4785-his high goddess tired feet , and clasping [her]4785-his high goddess knees . " [he]4775-its elder brother cries , with a hideous revulsion of feeling ; "[2263-you] [you]2263-you have been fooling [me]0-i , then ! [you]2263-you are not in earnest ! "[0-i] [We]2264-they must be going [home]2345-home , " [she]4785-his high goddess says dully . [He]4775-its elder brother complies in silence , and [they]2264-they set out . Before [they]2264-they have gone far , one of those swift changes , so common in mountain weather , has sent a sharp storm driving in [their]2264-they faces . [She]4785-his high goddess is unprovided with umbrella or mackintosh , and the large drops soon saturate [her]4785-his high goddess light gown . [He]4775-its elder brother puts [his]4775-its elder brother arm in anxious protection round [her]4785-his high goddess . [Her]4785-his high goddess first impulse is to shrink away from [him]4775-its elder brother ; but , bethinking [herself]4785-his high goddess , [she]4785-his high goddess tamely submits . "[0-i] Shall [I]0-i stick at such a trifle — [I]0-i , that stick at nothing ? " It is evening . [Professor Forth]136-professor forth 's chilliness has for once vanquished [his]4775-its elder brother parsimony ; and in the grate of [[his]4775-its elder brother attic room]4788-his attic room , a small , carefully - nursed , never - poked fire burns sparingly cheerful . But [he]4775-its elder brother cowers over it , and stretches [his]4775-its elder brother hand to its frugal blaze alone . [One]373-one would have thought that such a walk as that undertaken by [Mrs. Forth]271-mrs. forth would have been enough to satisfy the energies of [any reasonable woman]4790-any reasonable woman ; and yet [she]4785-his high goddess is again out of doors . [She]4785-his high goddess is not walking , indeed ; [she]4785-his high goddess is standing upon the rustic bridge that leads to wood and waterfall ; standing there in the soft dusk — not alone ! [They]4791-they have passed the windows of [the garishly - lit public drawing - room]4792-the garishly - lit public drawing - room , where lamps and jets of gas are making a gaudy glare ; a heterogeneous assemblage of [people , forced into unnatural sociability , irksomely driving through an evening in common]4793-people , forced into unnatural sociability , irksomely driving through an evening in common . [Some]1065-some are working ; [some]1065-some are playing whist ; [some]1065-some are yawning ; [one]373-one is feebly singing ; and [all]2676-all are in the fullest blaze of the gas and the paraffin . How much better to be outside in the moist , sweet dark ! [His]4775-its elder brother arms are about [her]4785-his high goddess , [she]4785-his high goddess no longer resisting ; and [her]4785-his high goddess tired head is resting on [his]4775-its elder brother shoulder . "[2267-her] But through the dark [he]2266-you divines the agony of the blush that accompanies [her]2267-her words ; and again that sword - like pain , which had marred the first moments of [his]2266-you triumphant bliss , once more traverses [his]2266-you heart . There is not a breath of air . What has become of yesterday 's hustling [northwind]2268-northwind ? By the starlight [they]2269-they can dimly see that the clouds no longer fold the mountain - heads . [They]2269-they have dropped to [their]2269-they waists , and airily girdle [them]2269-they . [She]2267-her is resting [her]2267-her feverish hands on the wooden railing , wet with the recent showers , and looking down on the half - seen shining rocks , and the water flashing white in the semi - darkness . How pleasant is its continuous rush and low roar ; and yet there is something oppressive in it ; something that makes one out of breath ! " [You]2266-you will not be long away ? The next morning [he]2271-he goes — goes , leaving [her]2272-her to live through as best [she]2272-her may , the days that must intervene before [his]2271-he return . How — by what process as yet unconjectured by [her]2272-her — is [she]2272-her to live through [them]2273-them ? [They]2273-them will pass , of course . No day has yet dawned upon sad humanity that did not pass ; even [Damiens]344-damiens ' death - day passed . But how ? The weather , at all events , will not come to [her]2272-her help . It has changed from capricious showers back to such headstrong , hopeless rain as accompanied [their]2274-their drive from [Lowood]115-lowood . There will be no seeking escape in [mountain walks]2275-mountain walks ; no tiring down thought by tired muscles . " How am [I]2272-her to live through [them]2273-them ? The after - noon is four hours old , and the faint smell of the brandy - and - water that temperately irrigated [the Professor]2365-the professor 's luncheon is beginning to die out of [the close room]3813-the close room , when : " [Your]2272-her writing has become unsteady , "[2271-he] [he]2271-he says , looking critically over [her]2272-her shoulder ; " [I]2271-he presume that [your]2272-her hand is growing tired . Perhaps [we]4808-we had better desist until to - morrow . "[2271-he] " No ! no ! "[2272-her] [she]2272-her cries vehemently ; " why should [we]4808-we ? [I]2272-her am not at all tired ! it was only carelessness . [I]2272-her will take more pains . "[2272-her] [The Professor]2365-the professor dislikes the mention of death . " [Psha]345-psha ! "[2271-he] [he]2271-he says crossly ; " what is the use of indulging in puerile suppositions ? "[2271-he] But [she]2272-her has [her]2272-her will . Until the hour of dinner [she]2272-her toils on . [She]2272-her has not , indeed , attained [her]2272-her end — that state of numb woolliness to which yesterday a less portion of labour had brought [her]2272-her . To - day , overwork has had the contrary effect of sharpening to its highest capability every power of thought , memory , and imagination . [She]2272-her goes down to the table d'hôte alone . [The Professor]2365-the professor , labouring under some real or fancied accession to [his]2365-the professor ailments , has ( having , however , previously taken care to notify in good time [his]2365-the professor intention ) restricted [himself]2365-the professor to the delight of a basin of gruel over [his]2365-the professor own fire . [Belinda]134-belinda is placed at dinner beside [a couple who had been fellow - inmates with [her]2272-her of [the Lowood Hotel]4527-the lowood hotel]2283-a couple who had been fellow - inmates with her of the lowood hotel , and who , like [her]2272-her , had come on hither . [She]2272-her had been on terms of friendly civility with [them]2283-a couple who had been fellow - inmates with her of the lowood hotel , and [they]2283-a couple who had been fellow - inmates with her of the lowood hotel now express pleasure at having again met [her]2272-her , and try to draw [her]2272-her into conversation . But [she]2272-her repulses all [their]2283-a couple who had been fellow - inmates with her of the lowood hotel efforts with a surly brevity . [They]2283-a couple who had been fellow - inmates with her of the lowood hotel shall not have to say afterwards that [she]2272-her let [them]2283-a couple who had been fellow - inmates with her of the lowood hotel talk to [her]2272-her . And now the day — one day — is ended , and it is night . Oh , these nights ! Dreadful are they — dream - haunted , nightmareridden ! and yet neither dream nor nightmare are comparable for horror to [their]2283-a couple who had been fellow - inmates with her of the lowood hotel waking moments . And through [them]2283-a couple who had been fellow - inmates with her of the lowood hotel all , the waterfall pours , pours , in its maddening monotony . Sometimes [she]2272-her feels as if [she]2272-her must tell [some one]2370-some one ; must rush out to some of [the sleeping strangers]2286-the sleeping strangers and tell [them]2283-a couple who had been fellow - inmates with her of the lowood hotel ! Perhaps it would not sound so bad if it were told ! After all , such things happen every day . [Her]2272-her loss will be no loss to [[her]2272-her husband]3353-her husband ; an economy rather ! [She]2272-her laughs bitterly . [He]3353-her husband will be glad to be rid of [her]2272-her . Has [not everybody with whom [she]2272-her has lived hitherto been glad to be rid of [her]2272-her]2288-not everybody with whom she has lived hitherto been glad to be rid of her ? Could [[her]2272-her grandmother]2703-her grandmother contain [her]2703-her grandmother joy at having shaken [her]2272-her off ? [Professor Forth]136-professor forth , too , will be glad to be rid of [her]2272-her . By - and - by , [he]3353-her husband will be glad to be rid of [her]2272-her ! Oh , the despair of that thought ! [She]2272-her will see [him]3353-her husband growing tired of [her]2272-her ! [Loyal gentleman]2290-loyal gentleman as [he]3353-her husband is , [he]3353-her husband will try [his]3353-her husband best to hide it ; but [he]3353-her husband will not hide it from [her]2272-her ! [She]2272-her will be jealous of the very air for touching [his]3353-her husband face ; every day [she]2272-her will ask [herself]2272-her , " Is [he]3353-her husband quite the same ? Is [he]3353-her husband quite as glad to see [me]2272-her as [he]3353-her husband used to be ? Does [he]3353-her husband call [me]2272-her [[his]3353-her husband darling]4810-his darling quite as often as [he]3353-her husband did ? "[2272-her] [She]2272-her will see [his]3353-her husband love slowly sliding — sliding away from [her]2272-her . What will [she]2272-her have to bind [him]3353-her husband to [her]2272-her ? Not honour , for [she]2272-her will have cast off honour ; not real love , for real love goes only with respect , and [she]2272-her will have said good - bye to respect ; [she]2272-her will have shaken hands with shame . The cold sweat of agony stands on [her]2272-her brow . Whether or not there be a hell elsewhere , [she]2272-her has found [hers]2272-her here . The last day has come ; the last of the three that are to intervene between [his]3353-her husband going and the morning when [she]2272-her is to meet [him]3353-her husband at [Keswick railway station]2291-keswick railway station , bidding , for [his]3353-her husband sake , farewell to [husband]2192-husband , [friends]3553-friends , and good repute . Two nights such as the one [I]0-i have described ; two days which , though inferior in agony , seem yet to have been crammed as full of mental suffering as they can hold , have brought [her]2272-her to the verge of a nervous fever . At the lightest noise it seems as if [she]2272-her must scream out loud . [She]2272-her is , as usual , at [her]2272-her toil in [[[her]2272-her husband]3353-her husband 's room]4517-her husband 's room . [She]2272-her has changed [her]2272-her position , so that [she]2272-her may not see [him]3353-her husband as [she]2272-her writes ; so bitter is the remorse with which the sight of [his]3353-her husband withered face and shrunk figure fills [her]2272-her . [Poor old man]2296-poor old man ! What has [he]3353-her husband done to [her]2272-her , that [she]2272-her should deal [him]3353-her husband this murderous blow?—for a murderous blow it is to [his]3353-her husband honour , if not to [his]3353-her husband heart . By what right is [she]2272-her stabbing [him]3353-her husband in the dark ? Because [he]3353-her husband is old , sickly , and peevish ? Was not [he]3353-her husband all three — did not [she]2272-her know [him]3353-her husband to be all three — when [she]2272-her married [him]3353-her husband ? How little [he]3353-her husband suspects [her]2272-her ! Exacting and undemonstrative [he]3353-her husband may be , but how perfect is [his]3353-her husband confidence in [her]2272-her ! " [You]2272-her look feverish , "[3353-her husband] [he]3353-her husband says . There is , or [she]2272-her fancies it , a tone of kindness , almost compassion , in [his]3353-her husband voice ; and in a moment [she]2272-her has fallen on [her]2272-her knees . It is not too late , even yet ! [She]2272-her will tell [him]3353-her husband all . " What the deuce are [you]2272-her about ? "[3353-her husband] cries [he]3353-her husband acrimoniously . It is very seldom that [he]3353-her husband employs even so small an oath as the one recorded ; and [his]3353-her husband present indulgence in it is a measure of [his]3353-her husband irritation . " [You]2272-her have let fall a great blot of ink upon [Gregory Nazianzen]346-gregory nazianzen ! [I]2272-her — [I]2272-her — was going to look for it ! "[2272-her] The hours pass by . [They]2297-they seem at once to crawl and to rush . With [no one]365-no one but [[her]2272-her husband]3353-her husband does [Belinda]134-belinda exchange a word . [She]2272-her has sufficiently snubbed into silence , and rejected with eager rudeness , the efforts of [the civil visitors]2300-the civil visitors ; who , attracted by [her]2272-her beauty , and compassionating [her]2272-her apparent loneliness ( [the Professor]2365-the professor has adhered to [his]2365-the professor régime of solitude and gruel ) , have tried to include [her]2272-her in [their]2297-they talk . [She]2272-her has harshly rebuffed [a little child]2302-a little child , who , encouraged by former notice , has run up to make friends with [her]2272-her . [None of [them]2297-they]2349-none of them shall be able to say after - wards that [she]2272-her forced [her]2272-her company upon [them]2297-they — that company which [they]2297-they will then look upon as pollution . The dinner hour is near , and [she]2272-her is standing outside [the hotel]1708-the hotel door , drawing long gasping breaths . Is it a little easier to live out of doors than in ? It has been another wet day ; the sun has been neither seen nor heard of ; but now , so near the hour of [his]2365-the professor daily dying , [he]2365-the professor asserts [himself]2365-the professor . From beneath a lead - heavy pile of rain - clouds [he]2365-the professor is thrusting [his]2365-the professor head ; but [his]2365-the professor radiance is tempered to a weird , moony splendour . About [the hills]2078-the hills ' necks are thrown cobwebby kerchiefs of vapour ; and to all these [he]2365-the professor lends a nameless plae opulence . In the sky [he]2365-the professor builds up [an aërial city]2306-an aërial city , augustly fair as that one seen in trance at [Patmos]129-patmos ; and on the waters [his]2365-the professor sovran feet have trodden a straight path of quivering diamond . Across [this royal path]2307-this royal path [a little boat]2053-a little boat has the presumption to take its course ; and at once is harmonized into a solemn unity with [the transfigured water]2309-the transfigured water and [the mountain pinnacles]2310-the mountain pinnacles — pinnacles as of [the great City of [God]184-god]2311-the great city of god . [Belinda]134-belinda looks at it all with a wild , dry eye , and a choked throat . Oh , beautiful , cruel , terrible world ! Would not it be easier to endure if it were ugly and unsightly ? if there were not this horrible contrast between [its]2312-its fair shows and its hideous realities ? The sight is of such strange loveliness that at every window of [the hotel]1708-the hotel heads are thrust out to admire it . [A little group of people]2314-a little group of people have followed [Mrs. Forth]271-mrs. forth 's example , and issued out into [the road]392-the road .
